66b4(phal chen): cad du/ /'jig rten dag tu mthar dmigs med gyur cig /lus dang ngag dang yid rnams thams cad kyang / /rnam pa kun tu rnam dag mkhas gyur cig /spyod pa de dag thams cad ma
66b5(phal chen): lus par/ /kun kyang kun tu bzang por red gyur cig /ji ltar chos dbyings rlom pa'i sems med cing / /de la spros dang chags pa med pa dang / /mya ngan 'da' dang bsgribs pa med pa
66b6(phal chen): ltar/ /de bzhin sems la rlom sems med gyur cig /chos mkhas yongs su bsngo ba gang brjod pa/ /de ni rgyal bas gsungs pa'i bsngo ba ste/ /mkhas pa'i spyod pa ci nas
66b7(phal chen): 'grub 'gyur bar/ /dge ba yongs pa de yis yongs su bsngo/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis 'di la bslabs byas te/ /ji snyed gang yod thams cad ma lus par/ /khams rnams kun kyang
67a1(phal chen): yongs su bsdu byas te/ /ci nas bde gshegs stobs la 'jug par bsngo/ /yangs pa ji snyed rgyal bas gsungs pa dang / /kun tu bzang zhes gang la
67a2(phal chen): gdags pa yi/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams gang la gnas gyur pa'i/ /spyod pa dam pa de dag su 'dod pas/ /sems can ma lus thams cad bgrang bar nus/ /dus gsum
67a3(phal chen): sems kyang ma lus kun bgrang nus/ /gang la kun tu bzang por ming gdags pa/ /rgyal sras de yi yon tan mtha' med do/ /nam mkha' spu rtses bgrang bar nus kyang srid/ /
67a4(phal chen): zhing rnams kun gyi rdul kyang bgrang bar nus/ /gang la rgyal sras drang srong che gnas pa'i/ /spyod pa de dag bgrang bar mi nus so/ /chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa zhes bya ba ste/ yongs
67a5(phal chen): su bsngo ba bcu pa'o/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis yongs su bsngo ba'i le'u ste sum cu'o// //bam po bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi gnas kyi nor bu rin po che dam pa'i khang pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po thams
67a6(phal chen): cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang / gzhan nas 'dus pa sha stag kun kyang byang chub sems
67b1(phal chen): dpa'i ye shes kyi yul dang spyod yul thams cad rab tu thob pas gnas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi yul la 'jug cing gzhol ba'i spyod yul ma gtang
67b2(phal chen): ba| 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul bar bya ba'i dus bzhin du thogs pa med pa'i byin gyi rlabs rnam pa tha dad pas bya ba thams cad yang dag par ston pa
67b3(phal chen): la mkhas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrub cing bskal pa dang / zhing dang / dus su spyod pa la gnas pa'i rgyun mi gcod pa/ byang chub sems
67b4(phal chen): dpa'i bsod nams dang / ye shes dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs shing 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba mi zad pa la rab tu zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes
67b5(phal chen): rab dang / thabs thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo yang dag par bstan cing / shin tu
67b6(phal chen): bsgrub pa'i rgyun mi gcod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa
67b7(phal chen): dang / ye shes la rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pas bya ba thams cad yang dag par ston pa la mkhas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / stobs dang / dbang thams
68a1(phal chen): cad thob cing mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i sems skad cig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'dong ba la sngon du
68a2(phal chen): 'dren pa'i gtam gyi skyes bu dam pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par gzung ba dang / sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang / rim gro rgya chen po
68a3(phal chen): bya ba'i don du mngon par brtson pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i las thams cad yang dag par blang ba mnyam pa nyid kyis sbyor bas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus kyi
68a4(phal chen): gzugs brnyan rab tu 'byung ba/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du chags pa med pa'i dbyangs rab tu sgrog pas/ dus gsum thams cad du chags pa med pa'i sems dang ye
68a5(phal chen): shes kyi yul rgyas par 'gengs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan dang / nan tan yongs su rdzogs pa thams cad bskal pa brjod du med par rgyun mi 'chad par yang
68a6(phal chen): dag par bstan pa la yon tan bsngags shing / brjod pa zad mi shes pa sha stag ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang / byang chub sems
68a7(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+mo'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal
68b1(phal chen): gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+mo dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'
68b2(phal chen): sems dpa' chen po gtsang ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba dri ma med pa'i snying po
68b3(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyan rnam par dgod pa thams cad rab tu snang bar ston pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye
68b4(phal chen): shes rnam par snang ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal yid du 'ong ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tsan dan dpal
68b5(phal chen): gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po me tog dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po me tog rgyas pa'i dpal gyi snying
68b6(phal chen): po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal lha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub
68b7(phal chen): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan dpal gyi snying
69a1(phal chen): po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med
69a2(phal chen): pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma dang bral ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa sna tshogs
69a3(phal chen): rgyan gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po rab tu snang ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
69a4(phal chen): po 'od dri ma med pa'i dpal gyi gzi brjid bzang po'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gser bzang po dri ma med pa'i dbyig gis spras pa'i
69a5(phal chen): gzi brjid mdzes pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan thams cad kyis brgyan pas rnam par dag pa'i dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub
69a6(phal chen): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal gyi be'u rdo rje 'od 'phro bas brgyan pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od 'bar zhing 'phro ba'i
69a7(phal chen): dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma'i rgyal po 'od rab tu snang ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
69b1(phal chen): nam mkha'i mdzod ye shes bsgribs pa med pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgribs pa med cing nga ro snyan pa'i snying
69b2(phal chen): po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi snying po yon tan gyis 'gro ba thams cad kyi smon lam yang dag par 'dzin pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems
69b3(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgya mtsho'i rgyan gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri rab dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
69b4(phal chen): chen po yon tan thams cad rnam par dag pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
69b5(phal chen): dpa' chen po sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par grol ba'i zla ba dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems
69b6(phal chen): dpa' chen po tshad med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtshams
69b7(phal chen): med pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus pa sha
70a1(phal chen): stag dang thabs gcig tu zhugs so/ /de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po sangs rgyas kyi mthus theg pa chen po
70a2(phal chen): rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos/ byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin theg
70a3(phal chen): pa chen po rab tu snang ba de la mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag
70a4(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang mtshan rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya
70a5(phal chen): bar mthun pa sha stag gis zhal mngon par bstan te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar khyod byang chub sems
70a6(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin theg pa chen po rab tu snang ba la snyoms par zhugs pa legs so/ /legs so/ /'di ltar rigs kyi bu khyod la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
70a7(phal chen): 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang mtshan rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya bar mthun pa sha stag gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
70b1(phal chen): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad 'di'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs dang / khyod nyid kyi ye shes kyi khyad par gyis byang chub sems
70b2(phal chen): dpa' thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu brjod cing / ye shes kyi sa la 'jug par bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsdu ba
70b3(phal chen): dang | sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba la mkhas par bya ba dang / chos thams cad la ye shes shin tu yangs par bya ba dang / shin tu legs par gnas pa'i chos
70b4(phal chen): rab tu bstan pa dang / ye shes tha mi dad pa rnam par sbyang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis gos pa med par bya ba dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
70b5(phal chen): yongs su dag par bya ba dang / ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul khong du chud par bya ba nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul gyi bar du khong du chud par bya ba dang / 'di
70b6(phal chen): ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu brtsams pa rab tu thob par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa ma nor bar rnam par dgod pa shin tu bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
70b7(phal chen): cad la yang dag par dmigs par bya ba dang / zag pa med pa'i chos kyi bye brag rnam par bsgom pa dang / rnam par dbye ba shin tu rnam par phye ba'i shes rab kyi snang ba chen po la
71a1(phal chen): mkhas pa'i ye shes kyi rgyan thob par bya ba dang / shin tu brtags pa'i ye shes kyi sgo la 'jug par bya ba dang / gnas kyi rnam pa ci rigs su brjod pa
71a2(phal chen): dang / spobs pa'i snang ba dma' ba med par thob par bya ba dang / tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa chen po'i sa shin tu rtogs par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi sems la dran pa nyams
71a3(phal chen): pa med par bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / thams cad du song ba'i blo rnam par gdon mi za ba la mkhas pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i
71a4(phal chen): phyir byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do/ /de bas na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos kyi sgo rab tu dbye ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /
71a5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes snang ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su dag par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings shin tu sbyangs pa dang / sems can
71a6(phal chen): gyi khams thams cad la phan gdags pa dang / chos kyi sku'i ye shes kyi lus la 'jug par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba yang dag par blang ba dang /
71a7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du shin tu 'phags pa'i lus 'byung bar bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba dang /
71b1(phal chen): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi tshul yongs su dag par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir spobs pa skyed cig /de nas sangs rgyas
71b2(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la zil gyis mi non pa'i lus nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/ /thogs pa med pa'i spobs pas shin tu ston pa nye
71b3(phal chen): bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/ /shin tu sbyangs pa'i ye shes rnam par phye ba la 'jug pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/ /dran pa nyams pa med pa'i byin gyi rlabs nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/ /blo
71b4(phal chen): gros shin tu nges par rtogs pas mkhas pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/ /thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i blo'i rjes su 'gro ba nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
71b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi stobs thub pa med pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa che zhing zhum pa med pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i
71b6(phal chen): ye shes dang tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pas rnam par dbye ba'i chos kyi tshul shin tu rtogs par bya ba nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
71b7(phal chen): dang thugs kyi rgyan shin tu rnam par phye ba mngon par bsdu ba nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyi chos nyid rab tu thob pa dang / sngon gyi smon
72a1(phal chen): lam gyis mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu rnam par sbyangs pa dang / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu sbyangs pa dang / tshogs
72a2(phal chen): shin tu bsags pa dang / yongs su sbyangs pa shin tu byas pa dang / dran pa'i snod tshad med pa dang / mos pa rnam par dag cing 'od shin tu gsal ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo tha dad pa
72a3(phal chen): med par thob pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyas shin tu btab pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de dag na bzhugs bzhin du
72a4(phal chen): rdzu 'phrul gyis mthus so so nas phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po'i mgo la byug pa mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis
72a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la reg ma thag tu de nyid kyi tshe ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la smras pa/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /
72a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam 'di ni shin tu rnam par gdon mi za ba ste/ tha mi dad pa/ ltar med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par yangs pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi
72a7(phal chen): mthar thug pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad du rgyas par khyab pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob
72b1(phal chen): pa| de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyi brlabs pa ste/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
72b2(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes kyi sa la yang rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes kyi sa la yang rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /da
72b3(phal chen): ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes kyi sa la yang rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
72b4(phal chen): rnams kyi ye shes kyi sa rnams te/ gang la bsams te bdag gis de skad du smras pa de dag ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
72b5(phal chen): kyis gsungs so/ /gsung ngo / /gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po dang / dri ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba byang chub
72b6(phal chen): sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang / 'od byed pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa gsum pa dang / 'od 'phro ba can zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa bzhi pa dang / rgyal bar
72b7(phal chen): dka' ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa dang / mngon sum pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa dang / ring du song ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun
73a1(phal chen): pa dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa dang / legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa dang / chos kyi
73a2(phal chen): sprin ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa ste/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /de rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu ste/ de ni 'das pa
73a3(phal chen): dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so/ /gsung ngo / /gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /kye|rgyal ba'i sras dag /bdag gis ni sangs
73a4(phal chen): r gyas kyi zhing gang na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po 'di dag mi gsung ba de lta bu ma
73a5(phal chen): mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongs su sbyong ba'i chos snang ba'i
73a6(phal chen): sgo 'di ni yang dag phul zhes bya ba yin te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnam par dgod pa shin tu bstan pa'o/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /gnas 'di ni bsam gyi mi
73a7(phal chen): khyab pa ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis shes pa'o/ /de nas de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po 'di dag
73b1(phal chen): ming tsam zhig brjod de/ cang mi zer bar 'dug nas de las rab tu phye ste ma bshad pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu
73b2(phal chen): po de dag gi ming tsam zhig thos nas/ rab tu phye ste ma brjod pas skom par gyur nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos byang chub sems
73b3(phal chen): dpa'i sa bcu po de dag gi ming tsam zhig brjod de cang mi zer bar 'dug na/ de las rab tu phye zhing mi ston pa de la rgyu ni gang / rkyen ni ci zhig yod snyam pa dang / de'i tshe byang chub
73b4(phal chen): sems dpa' 'khor 'dus pa de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par grol ba'i zla ba zhes bya ba 'dus shing 'dug 'dug ste/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
73b5(phal chen): rnam par grol ba'i zla bas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la glu'i
73b6(phal chen): dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad de don de dris so/ /ci phyir rtog pa rnam dag cing / /dran dang ye shes ldan pa yis/ /sa yi mchog ni brjod byas te/ /mkhas pas rnam par phye mi
73b7(phal chen): bshad/ /'di kun nges par rtogs pa ste/ /byang chub sems dpa' grags chen yin/ /ci phyir khyod ni sa brjod de/ /rab tu phye ba bshad mi bgyi/ /rgyal sras 'jigs med 'di dag
74a1(phal chen): ni| |kun kyang shin tu nyan par 'dod/ /sa yi don tshul yang dag tu/ /rnam par phye ste bshad par mdzod/ /'khor 'di shin tu rnam dang ste/ /le lo med cing
74a2(phal chen): dge dang ldan/ /dag pa'i mchog la gnas pa ste/ /yon tan ye shes ldan pa yin/ /phan tshun gcig la gcig lta zhing / /kun kyang rim gro bcas par gnas/ /sbrang rtsi ji ltar
74a3(phal chen): spang min pa/ /de ltar bdud rtsi mchog kyang 'dod/ /rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs med pa/ /shes rab chen pos de thos nas/ /'khor rnams dga' bar bya ba'i phyir/ /bde bar gshegs
74a4(phal chen): pa'i sras la smras/ /sangs rgyas sku rab yang dag 'byung bas na/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab bstan cing / /sa rgyu dam pa rnam par dbye bya ba/ /de ni rmad byung mchog
74a5(phal chen): tu dga' ba yin/ /phra zhing blta dka' rnam par rtog pa spangs/ /sems kyi sa dang bral bas bsgrub par dga'/ /mkhas pa rnams kyi zag med spyod yul te/ /'gro ba rnams
74a6(phal chen): kyis de thos mos par 'gyur/ /rdo rje lta bur bsam pa rab bzhag ste/ /sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la mos byas shing / /bdag med pa yi sems kyi sa shes na/ /ye shes
74a7(phal chen): dam pa 'di gzod mnyan par nus/ /ji ltar bar snang tshon ris bri ba dang / /nam mkha'i dbyings la rlung gnas ji bzhin du/ /de ltar ye shes zag pa med pa yang / /shin tu
74b1(phal chen): lta dka' thub pas rnam par phye/ /de la bdag gi sems ni 'di snyam byed/ /sangs rgyas ye shes dam pa bsam yas la/ /'gro ba gang rnams dang bar byed dkon zhes/ /de yi phyir na ma
74b2(phal chen): smras ma bshad do/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras /
74b3(phal chen): 'khor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'di dag la bsam pa shin tu sbyangs pa/ kun tu rtog pa yongs su sbyangs pa/ spyad par bya ba shin tu spyad pa/ tshogs
74b4(phal chen): shin tu bsags pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong shin tu bsnyen bkur ba/ yon tan dang ye shes tshad med pa dang ldan pa/ the tshom dang nem nur med pa/ nyon mongs pa dang /
74b5(phal chen): bral ba/ mos pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa la rab tu gnas pa/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa sha stag tshogs pas yongs su dag pa yin gyi/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ de bzhin gshegs
74b6(phal chen): pa'i byin gyis legs par bshad pa mdzod cig dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag thams cad ni rnam par 'di lta bu'i gnas zab mo la mngon sum du gnas pa sha stag go /de nas
74b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas don 'di nyid gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ byang chub sems
75a1(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa bla med pa/ /sa rnams rab phye rnam dgod brtags pa yi/ /ye shes sbyong zhing byang chub 'thob byed pa/ /mchog dang dam pa zhi ba'i chos
75a2(phal chen): rnams shod/ /'khor 'di dag pa nyon mongs med pa'i mchog /mos dang bsam pa shin tu sbyangs pa ste/ /sangs rgyas bye ba mang la spyod pa spyad/ /sa 'di brtag la yid ches
75a3(phal chen): ldan pa yin/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla ba la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ 'khor 'di ltar
75a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu'i gnas zab mo la bsam pa shin tu sbyangs pa/ kun tu rtog pa yongs su sbyangs pa/ spyod pa shin tu spyad
75a5(phal chen): pa| tshogs shin tu bsags pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bsags pa/ yon tan dang ye shes tshad med pa dang ldan pa/ the tshom dang nem nur
75a6(phal chen): med pa/ nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ mos pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa la rab tu gnas pa/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa sha stag tshogs pas shin tu dag pa yang yin na/ 'on
75a7(phal chen): kyang sems can mos pa chung ngu gzhan dag gis zab mo'i rnam pa 'di lta bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas dag thos par gyur la/ thos nas kyang the tshom dang yid gnyis su gyur
75b1(phal chen): na| de dag la yun ring por gnod pa dang / don med pa dang / mi bde ba'i rgyur 'gyur bas/ 'di lta zhig tu snying brtse ba'i phyir/ bdag ni cang mi zer bar 'dug pa nyid du mos so/ /de nas byang
75b2(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos don 'di nyid gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /'khor 'di rnam dag shes rab yangs pa ste/ /zab cing gsal ba'i
75b3(phal chen): spyod ldan rtogs shes shing / /gzhan dring mi 'jog ri rgyal bzhin mi g.yo/ /bsam rtog mi 'khrug rgya mtsho chen po 'dra/ /'on kyang ma rtogs mi shes ma spyad pa/ /rnam shes yul gnas
75b4(phal chen): don la shes med pas/ /thos shing ma ches 'phral du ngan song lhung / /de dag snying brtses ye shes sa ma bshad/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas/ yang byang
75b5(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la gsol ba btab pa/ /kye|rgyal ba'i sras/ legs par bshad pa mdzod cig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rnam pa 'di lta bu bsam
75b6(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas 'di dag kyang gzhan du mi 'gyur ba dang / legs par yid ches par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ don 'di ltar sa shin tu bstan pa
75b7(phal chen): 'di bshad pa'i tshe chos nyid rab tu thob pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang dgongs par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang ye shes kyi sa 'di yongs su bsrung
76a1(phal chen): ba'i don du rab tu brtson par byed do/ /de yang ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni spyod pa'i sa dang po ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par 'grub
76a2(phal chen): pa'i gzhi yin no/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ yi ge dang 'bru 'grangs pa ji snyed du bstan pa de dag thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba'ang yi ge'i phyi mo'o/ /tha mar
76a3(phal chen): yang yi ge'i phyi mo la thug ste/ yi ge'i phyi mo bstan pas ma khyab pa de lta bu'i yi ge dang 'bru 'grangs pa bstan pa ni gang yang med do/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ de bzhin du sangs
76a4(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang spyod pas rab tu 'grub pas sa sngon du 'gro'o/ /rang byung gi ye shes kyi mthar thug par 'gyur bas sa'i mthar thug pa'o/ /de bas na/ /kye| rgyal ba'i
76a5(phal chen): sras/ shod cig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir byin gyis rlob pa mdzad do/ /de nas
76a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas don 'di nyid gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ sa dang
76a7(phal chen): spyod 'jug byang chub 'gyur ba ye shes sgrub byed pa/ /spyod pa rnam dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i sras kyis legs par shod/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba bde gshegs kun mgon
76b1(phal chen): 'dren pa ji snyed pa/ /khyu mchog de kun ye shes 'byung gnas ston la dgongs pa mdzad/ /'di ni dang po zhugs pa'i shes spyod 'di yi mthar thug ste/ rgyal ba'i ches rab gzhal yas
76b2(phal chen): ji snyed de dag 'byung gnas 'di/ /yi ge 'grangs pa'i phyi mo'i rjes 'gro sngon du de 'gro ltar/ /de bzhin sa mchog blo yi yul du tha ma thug par 'dod/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
76b3(phal chen): de dag thams cad kyis dbyangs kyi nga ro gcig tu glu'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad de/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la don 'di nyid kyi phyir gsol ba btab pa/ blo yangs
76b4(phal chen): dam pa'i phul mnga' ba/ /spobs pa mtha' yas rnam par dbye ba rtogs mkhyen pas/ /yid du 'ong ba'i gsung dbyangs kyis/ /kun la phan don dam pa bshad pa mdzod/ /dran dang dga'
76b5(phal chen): bas spyod dag pa/ /stobs bcu'i stobs kyi shugs sogs yon tan ldan pa yi/ /sa yi dam pa mchog gi rnams/ /tha dad yang dag don mkhyen spyod pas shod/ /zhi sdom bsgrub
76b6(phal chen): pa'i yid ldan pa/ /nga rgyal dregs dang lta ba'i nyon mongs zhir gyur pas/ /'khor 'dir the tshom bral ba ste/ /khyod kyis legs par bshad du re zhing sdod/ /skom pa bsil ba'i chu
76b7(phal chen): 'dod bzhin/ /bkres pa kha zas nad pa sman rab 'dod pa dang / /bung ba sbrang rtsi 'dod pa ltar/ /de bzhin 'khor 'di khyod kyi tshig la sdod/ /de bas shin tu blo yangs pas/ /rdul
77a1(phal chen): med rnams la sa yi dam par 'jug pa shod/ /chags med stobs bcu'i tshogs gyur pa/ /bde gshegs spyod pa ma lus bshad par mdzod/ /de nas
77a2(phal chen): d e'i tshe bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mdzod spu nas byang chub sems dpa'i stobs snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'khor gyi 'od zer brgya stong grangs med pa dang ldan pa byung
77a3(phal chen): ngo| |de byung nas phyogs bcu thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad ma lus par snang bar byas nas/ sems can thams cad kyi ngan song gi sdug
77a4(phal chen): bsngal thams cad rtse zil bar byas te/ bdud kyi khyim thams cad zil gyis mnan nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor snang bar byas te/ sangs
77a5(phal chen): rgyas kyi yul gyi rnam pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i mthu bstan nas/ phyogs bcu thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams
77a6(phal chen): cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du chos bstan pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus snang bar byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa
77a7(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan nas steng gi bar snang la 'od zer stug po'i sprin gyi dra ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa chen por byas te 'dug go / de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan
77b1(phal chen): 'das de dag gi mdzod spu dag nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'od snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'khor gyi 'od zer grangs med pa dang ldan pa dag byung bar gyur to/ /byung nas
77b2(phal chen): k yang de dag gis phyogs bcu thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa kun tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du chos bstan pa'i byin gyis byin du
77b3(phal chen): brlabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams snang bar byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di
77b4(phal chen): yang snang bar byas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di yang snang bar byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo
77b5(phal chen): rje'i snying po'i lus kyang snang bar byas nas/ steng gi bar snang la de bzhin du 'od zer stug po'i sprin gyi dra ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa chen por byas te 'khod do/ /de nas 'od zer stug
77b6(phal chen): po'i sprin gyi dra ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa chen po de dag nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis sgra'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ngo / /mi mnyam mnyam dang mnyam pa mkha' dang mnyam pa dag /
77b7(phal chen): stobs bcu'i khyu mchog mthu ldan tshad med yon tan can/ /'jig rten kun mchog mi yi dam pa phul gyi rnams/ /shAkya seng ge'i chos la byin rlabs dam pa mdzad/ /bde gshegs
78a1(phal chen): sras po 'dren pa'i byin gyis bshad par gyis/ /chos rgyal khyu mchog rnams kyi mdzod kyi dam pa phye/ /sa yi ye shes rnam phye spyod mchog rab yangs
78a2(phal chen): pa| |stobs bcu'i byin gyis ma thogs myur du bstan pa gyis/ /gang gis rna lam bsam par chos dam rin chen 'di/ /song bar gyur pa de dag bde gshegs byin gyis brlabs//
78a3(phal chen): rdul med sa kun rim gyis rab tu rdzogs byas nas/ /stobs bcu ldan pa'i rgyal ba dam par 'grub par 'gyur/ /rgya mtsho'i chu byung gyur cing bskal pa'i mes gdungs kyang / /gal
78a4(phal chen): te snod gyur sems can de dag 'di la nyan/ /gang rnams the tshom za zhing yid gnyis byed pa ni/ /de dag rna bas rnam pa kun tu thos mi 'gyur/ /de phyir sa yi ye shes lam
78a5(phal chen): mchog bstan par gyis/ /gnas dang rgyud dang 'phro ba rim gyis rab tu shod/ /spyod dang yul dang chos dang ye shes tshul rnams kyi/ /chos kyi tshul yang 'gro ba kun la phan phyir
78a6(phal chen): shod/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos phyogs bcur bltas nas 'khor thams cad de bas kyang dad par bya ba'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras
78a7(phal chen): so| |phra la shes dka' drang srong chen po'i lam/ /mi rtog rtog yul ma yin blta bar dka'/ /rang bzhin zhi zhing 'gag med 'byung ba med/ /mkhas gsal shes pas khong du
78b1(phal chen): chud pa yin/ /ngo bo nyid stong zhi zhing sdug bsngal zad/ /rgyud las rnam grol mnyam par mya ngan 'das/ /mtha' dang dbus med tshig gis brjod du med/ /dus gsum grol ba nam mkha'
78b2(phal chen): 'dra zhing mtshungs/ /bde gshegs spyod yul zhi zhing nye bar zhi/ /smra ba'i lam rnams kun gyis brjod par dka'/ /de dag sa dang spyod pa de 'dra bas/ /smra bar dka' na bstan par ga
78b3(phal chen): la nus/ /de ni bsam yas sems lam rnam par spangs/ /ye shes mngon bsgrubs rgyal ba'i spyod yul te/ /phung po skye mched khams kyis bskyed pa min/ /sems kyis mi
78b4(phal chen): shes yid kyis rnam ma brtags/ /ji ltar bar snang gnas kyi bya yi rjes/ /shin tu smra dka' bstan par mi nus pa/ /de ltar bde gshegs sras kyi sa rnams kyang / /yid dang sems kyi
78b5(phal chen): yul gyis shes mi nus/ /'on kyang byams dang snying rje'i smon lam gyis/ /de las phyogs tsam rim pa'i tshul bzhin du/ /bshad par bya ste sems kyi spyod yul min/ /ye shes tshul
78b6(phal chen): gyis rdzogs par bya ba'o/ /de 'dra'i spyod yul phra zhing blta dka' ba/ /rang rig yin pas brjod par ma nus kyang / /'on kyang bde bar gshegs pa'i mthus brjod kyi/ /thams cad mthun
78b7(phal chen): par nan tan gyis te nyon/ /ye shes sa dang spyod 'jug ci 'dra ba/ /bskal pa bye bar zad par mi nus te/ /yang dag don dngos gzhan min gnas pa las/ /mdo tsam bshad kyi de dag
79a1(phal chen): mnyan par gyis/ /mthun zhing nan tan yod par sta gon gnas/ /bde gshegs byin gyis bdag gis bshad par bya/ /dpe ldan 'thad la yi ge mnyam pa
79a2(phal chen): yi| |chos sgra dam pa bdag gis brjod par bya/ /'di ni tshig gis brjod par shin tu dka'/ /de ltar tshad med bde gshegs mthu dag las/ /chu thigs gcig 'dra bdag gi lus 'di
79a3(phal chen): la| |de ring zhugs kyi bshad pa mnyan par gyis/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bsags pa/ spyad pa shin tu spyod pa/ tshogs shin tu bsags
79a4(phal chen): pa| |sangs rgyas byung ba shin tu bsnyen bkur ba/ chos dkar po shin tu bsdus pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis shin tu bzung ba/ bsam pa yongs su dag pa/ lhag pa'i bsam
79a5(phal chen): pa shin tu rgya chen po can/ mos pa rgya chen po dang ldan pa/ snying rje dang snying brtse ba mngon du gyur pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mngon par mos pa rnams rnam pa thams cad
79a6(phal chen): mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mos pa dang / stobs bcu'i stobs thob par bya ba dang / mi 'jigs pa chen po thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid thob par bya ba
79a7(phal chen): dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab par bya ba dang / snying brtse ba dang snying rje chen po yongs su dag par bya ba dang / phyogs bcu ma lus par thogs pa med pa'i ye shes
79b1(phal chen): mngon du 'gyur ba bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams cad thogs pa med par yongs su sbyang bar bya ba dang / dus gsum thams cad skad cig gcig gis khong du chud
79b2(phal chen): par bya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo chen po rab tu bskor ba la khyu mchog gi mthu dbyung ba rgya chen po thob par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems snying rje chen po
79b3(phal chen): sngon du 'gro ba/ shes rab dang ye shes kyi dbang du gyur pa/ thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba/ bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pas rab tu brtan pa/ de bzhin gshegs
79b4(phal chen): pa'i stobs tshad med pa dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi stobs dang / blo'i stobs rnam par dbye bar bya ba/ shin tu rnam par phye ba/ chags pa med pa'i ye shes mngon du gyur pa/
79b5(phal chen): rang byung gi ye shes dang mthun pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la shes rab dang / ye shes kyi man ngag yang dag par tshol ba/ sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad las gdams
79b6(phal chen): ngag yang dag par blangs pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthar thug par gnas pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par skye bar 'gyur te/ sems bskyed pa de bskyed ma
79b7(phal chen): thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po so so'i skye bo'i sa las rab tu 'das pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa shin tu non pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs
80a1(phal chen): pa'i rigs su skyes pa yin/ rigs brjod pa la kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi lam thams cad las phyir log pa yin/ 'jig rten
80a2(phal chen): las 'das pa'i lam shin tu non pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid la gnas pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa la rab tu gnas pa yin/ dus
80a3(phal chen): gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba yin/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub la shin tu gzhol bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su nges pa yin/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /chos
80a4(phal chen): kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba la mi g.yo ba'i tshul gyis rab tu gnas so/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /
80a5(phal chen): de la byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni rab tu dga' ba mang ba yin/ yid bde ba mang ba yin/ mos pa mang ba yin/ rangs
80a6(phal chen): pa mang ba yin/ mgu ba mang ba yin/ spro ba mang ba yin/ 'tshe ba med pa mang ba yin/ khro ba med pa mang ba yin/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab
80a7(phal chen): tu dga' ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rjes su dran zhing rab tu dga' ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams rjes su dran zhing rab
80b1(phal chen): tu dga' ba yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rjes su dran zhing rab tu dga' ba yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rjes su dran zhing rab tu dga' ba yin/ pha
80b2(phal chen): rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa rjes su dran zhing rab tu dga' ba yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i khyad par rjes su dran zhing rab tu dga' ba yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul
80b3(phal chen): mi 'phrogs pa rjes su dran zhing rab tu dga' ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdams ngag dang lung rjes su dran zhing rab tu dga' ba yin/ sems can gyi don rab tu thob par
80b4(phal chen): bya ba rjes su dran zhing rab tu dga' ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la 'jug pa'i thabs rjes su dran zhing rab tu dga' ba yin/ yang de 'di snyam du sems
80b5(phal chen): te| bdag ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi yul las phyir log go zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi sa dang nye bar gyur to zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do/ /bdag
80b6(phal chen): ni byis pa'i sa las ring du gyur to zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do/ /bdag ni ye shes kyi sa dang nye bar gyur to zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do/ /bdag ni ngan song dang ngan 'gro'i
80b7(phal chen): 'jigs pa thams cad rgyun chad do zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do/ /bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur to zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do/ /bdag ni de
81a1(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ba dang nye bar gyur to zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do/ /bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul
81a2(phal chen): la yang dag par 'byung ngo zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do/ /bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid dang ldan par gyur to zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do/ /
81a3(phal chen): bdag ni 'jigs pa dang / bag tsha ba dang / dngangs pa dang / skyi g.ya' ba thams cad dang bral lo zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras
81a4(phal chen): dag / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba 'di thob ma thag tu 'jigs pa'i rnam pa 'di dag 'di lta ste/ 'tsho ba med pas 'jigs
81a5(phal chen): pa'am/ mi bsngags pas 'jigs pa'am/ 'chi bas 'jigs pa'am/ ngan song gis 'jigs pa'am/ 'khor du bag tsha bas 'jigs pa de dag thams cad de la med
81a6(phal chen): pa yin/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni bdag gi 'du shes dang bral bas/ de la bdag phangs par sems pa'ang med na/ yo byad thams cad la phangs par sems
81a7(phal chen): ba lta ga la yod de/ de'i phyir de la 'tsho ba med pas 'jigs pa med do/ /de ni su las kyang rim gror bya ba cung zad tsam yang re ba med la/ gzhan du na bdag nyid kyis
81b1(phal chen): sems can de dag la yo byad mang po thams cad kyis bstud par bya'o snyam du sems pas de'i phyir de la mi bsngags pa'i 'jigs pa med do/ /de bdag tu lta ba dang bral
81b2(phal chen): bas de la bdag gi 'du shes med de/ de'i phyir de la 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa med do/ /bdag shi nas kyang gdon mi za bar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dag dang mi
81b3(phal chen): 'bral bar 'gyur ro zhes de'i phyir de la ngan song gis 'jigs pa med do/ /de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bsam pa dang 'jig rten na mtshungs pa'ang su yang med na/ lhag pa
81b4(phal chen): lta ga la yod ces de'i phyir de la 'khor du bag tsha ba med do/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /de ltar 'jigs pa dang / dngangs pa dang / bag tsha ba dang / skyi g.ya' ba med pa'i byang
81b5(phal chen): c hub sems dpa' ni snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas lhag pa'i bsam pa ma nyams shing mi dma' bas de bas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir rab
81b6(phal chen): tu brtson par byed do/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /de dad pa la dbang sgyur ba dang / mos pa mang ba dang / yid ches pa shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / rtog pa mang ba dang / snying
81b7(phal chen): brtse ba dang / snying rjes mngon par sgrub pa dang / byams pa chen po dang ldan pa dang / yid skyo ba med pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa'i rgyan dang / bzod cing nges pa
82a1(phal chen): dang ldan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang /
82a2(phal chen): ri mo yod pa dang / nyin mtshan du mi ngoms par dge ba'i rtsa ba gsog pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa dang / chos kyi dga' bas dga' bar gnas pa dang /
82a3(phal chen): mi ngoms par mang du thos pa tshol ba dang / ji skad du thos pa'i chos la tshul bzhin du rtog pa dang / gnas med pa'i yid dang / 'thob pa dang / bkur sti dang / bsngags
82a4(phal chen): pa la chags pa med pa dang / yo byad thams cad la phangs par sems shing chags pa med pa dang / sems bskyed pa rin po che lta bus ngoms pa med par mngon par
82a5(phal chen): bsgrub pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sa la mngon par mos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
82a6(phal chen): pa la dmigs pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs yongs su tshol ba dang / sgyu dang g.yo yongs su spangs pa dang / ji skad du smras pa de ltar byed pa dang / rtag tu rgyun
82a7(phal chen): mi 'chad par bden pa'i tshig gi rjes su srung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la skyon du 'gyur bar mi byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa mi gtong
82b1(phal chen): pa dang / ri'i dbang po'i rgyal po che po ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems mi sgul ba dang / 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa dang / 'jig rten las
82b2(phal chen): 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i lam dang ldan pa dang / mi ngoms par byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshogs rab tu bsags pa dang / rtag tu rgyun mi chad par gong nas gong du khyad par du 'bogs
82b3(phal chen): pa'i lam tshol ba dang / sa yongs su sbyong ba'i chos kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga'
82b4(phal chen): ba la gnas pa yin te/ de byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba de la shin tu gnas shing / rnam pa 'di lta bu'i smon lam chen po dang / brtson pa chen po dang / mngon par
82b5(phal chen): bsgrub pa chen po 'di dag mngon par sgrub ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad ma lus pa lhag ma med pa mtha' dag la mchod cing rim gro bya ba'i phyir/ rnam pa'i mchog thams
82b6(phal chen): cad dang ldan pa/ mos pa rgya chen pos rnam par dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgya che ba/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa bskal pa
82b7(phal chen): 'grangs pa thams cad du sangs rgyas skye ba 'grangs pa la rim gro dang / mchod pa chen po bya ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po mngon par sgrub bo/ /'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs
83a1(phal chen): pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par gzung ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub yang dag par blang ba dang / yang dag
83a2(phal chen): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa yang dag par bsrung ba'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgya che ba nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa/ phyi ma'i
83a3(phal chen): mtha'i mur thug pa/ bskal pa 'grangs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'grangs pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po mngon par
83a4(phal chen): sgrub bo/ /'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad ma lus pa'i sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad kyi dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa na bzhugs pa la sogs te/
83a5(phal chen): 'pho ba dang / gshegs pa dang / dku na bzhugs pa dang / skye ba dang / gzhon nu'i rol pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka'
83a6(phal chen): ba spyad pa dang / snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa dang / bdud gdul ba dang / mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gsol ba gdab pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba dang / mya
83a7(phal chen): ngan las 'das pa chen po ston pa'i drung du 'gro zhing mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos yang dag par gzung ba'i sbyor ba la sogs pa thams cad dus gcig tu
83b1(phal chen): mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings kyi klas par rgya che ba/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa bskal pa 'grangs pa thams cad du sangs
83b2(phal chen): rgyas 'byung ba 'grangs pa'i drung du 'gro ba nas/ mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar gyi drung du 'gro ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po mngon par sgrub bo/ /'di lta ste/ byang
83b3(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ tshad med pa/ mi 'phrogs pa/ tha mi dad pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyis yang dag par bsdus pa/ sa yongs su sbyang
83b4(phal chen): ba'i yan lag dang / nye ba'i yan lag tu bcas pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / mtshan nyid dang / bye brag gi mtshan nyid du bcas pa dang / 'grub pa dang / 'jig pa dang / byang chub
83b5(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod par gtogs pa thams cad dang / sa ji lta ba bzhin dang / ji lta bur bstan pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang ba la gdams ngag dang / man ngag sbyin
83b6(phal chen): pas nye bar brtan pa'i sems bskyed pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgya che ba/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa
83b7(phal chen): bskal pa 'grangs pa thams cad du spyod pa 'grangs pa sems bskyed pas mngon par bsgrub pa/ rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po mngon par sgrub bo/ /'di lta ste/ sems
84a1(phal chen): can gyi khams thams cad ma lus pa/ lhag ma med pa mtha' dag gzugs yod pa dang / gzugs med pa dang / 'du shes yod pa dang / 'du shes
84a2(phal chen): med pa dang / 'du shes yod pa'ang ma yin pa dang / 'du shes med pa'ang ma yin pa dang / sgo nga las skyes pa dang / mngal nas skyes pa dang / drod gsher las skyes pa
84a3(phal chen): dang / rdzus te byung ba khams gsum du gtogs pa/ 'gro ba drug tu 'dus pa/ skye ba thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par
84a4(phal chen): bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzud pa dang / lam gyi rgyud 'grangs pa thams cad rgyun gcad pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dgod pa'i phyir/ chos kyi
84a5(phal chen): dbyings kyis klas par rgya che ba/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa/ bskal pa 'grangs pa thams cad dang / sems can 'grangs pa thams
84a6(phal chen): cad du sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par bya ba la rgyun mi 'chang pa'i smon lam chen po mngon par sgrub bo/ /'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams yangs pa dang /
84a7(phal chen): dogs pa dang / rgya chen po dang / tshad med pa dang / phra ba dang / che ba dang / snrel zhi dang / spyi'u tshugs su rgyu ba thams cad ma lus pa lhag ma med pa/ mtha' dag gzhi mnyam
84b1(phal chen): par yang dag par 'jug pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / mig 'phrul gyi rnam pa ltar phyogs bcu'i rnam pa tha dad pa ma lus pa'i rnam pa la 'jug pa/ rnam par phye ba'i ye shes khong
84b2(phal chen): du chud cing / mngon du 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgya che ba/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa/ bskal pa 'grangs pa thams
84b3(phal chen): cad du 'jig rten gyi khams 'grangs par 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la 'jug cing / yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/ smon lam chen po mngon par sgrub bo/ /'di lta ste/
84b4(phal chen): zhing thams cad zhing gcig tu yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba dang / zhing gcig zhing thams cad du yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba dang / yongs su sbyang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
84b5(phal chen): tshad med pa 'od mang po'i rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan par bya ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad bsal bas yongs su dag pa'i lam dang ldan pa dang / sems can ye shes
84b6(phal chen): kyi 'byung gnas tshad med pas yongs su gang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po la yang dag par gzhol zhing khong du chud par bya ba dang / bsam pa'i tshul bzhin du sems can
84b7(phal chen): rnams la yang dag par bstan cing shin tu tshim par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgya che ba/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa/
85a1(phal chen): bskal pa 'grangs pa thams cad du zhing 'grangs par sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po mngon
85a2(phal chen): par sgrub bo/ /'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang bsam pa gcig pa'i sbyor ba dang / ltod pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsags pa dang / byang chub
85a3(phal chen): sems dpa' thams cad dang dmigs pa gcig cing mnyam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'grogs shing mi 'bral ba dang / sangs rgyas
85a4(phal chen): 'byung ba ci dgar bstan pa dang / rang gi sems bskyed pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul dang / mthu dang / ye shes khong du chud par bya ba dang / ma nyams
85a5(phal chen): shing rjes su 'brang ba'i mngon par shes pa rab tu thob par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par rgyu bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi
85a6(phal chen): dkyil 'khor du gzugs brnyan 'byung ba yang dag par bstan pa dang / skye ba'i skye gnas thams cad du rang gi lus rjes su 'gro bar bya ba dang / theg pa chen po bsam gyis
85a7(phal chen): mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad spyad pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgya che ba/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug
85b1(phal chen): pa| phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa/ bskal pa 'grangs pa thams cad du spyod pa 'grangs par theg pa chen po mngon par bsgrub pa la rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po mngon
85b2(phal chen): par sgrub bo/ /'di lta ste/ phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo la yang dag par gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa dang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las don yod par
85b3(phal chen): bya ba dang / mthong ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi chos gdon mi za bar thob par bya ba dang / dbyangs brjod ma thag tu ye shes khong du chud par bya ba dang / dad par gyur ma thag tu nyon mongs
85b4(phal chen): pa phyir mi ldog par bya ba dang / bsam pa sman gyi rgyal po chen po lta bur rab tu thob par bya ba dang / lus yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu thob par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
85b5(phal chen): spyod pa thams cad spyad pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgya che ba/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa/ bskal pa 'grangs pa thams cad
85b6(phal chen): du phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo 'grangs par spyod pa thams cad 'bras bu yod pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po mngon par sgrub bo/ /'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams
85b7(phal chen): thams cad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang / skra'i sbubs gcig dang tha mi dad pa'i skra'i sbubs thams cad du tshe dang / skye ba dang /
86a1(phal chen): gzhon nu rol pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / snying po byang chub tu
86a2(phal chen): gshegs pa dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gsol ba gdab pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba
86a3(phal chen): chen po bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul dang mthu dang ye shes chen po khong du chud par bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs
86a4(phal chen): rgyas 'byung ba dang / skad cig gcig tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang / rab tu zhi ba thob par bya ba yang dag par bstan pa dang / mngon par 'tshang rgya ba gcig gis chos kyi
86a5(phal chen): dbyings thams cad 'phrul bas rgyas par dgang ba dang / dbyangs gcig brjod pas sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi sems dang / bsam pa shin tu tshim par
86a6(phal chen): bya ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yongs su bstan pa dang / spyod pa rnams rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba dang / theg pa chen po'i sa la chos thams cad rnam par dgod
86a7(phal chen): pa yang dag par bstan pa dang / chos shes pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi sgyu dang / mngon par shes pa dang / dbang gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad sprul bas rnam par dgang ba'i
86b1(phal chen): phyir/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgya che ba/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa/ bskal ba 'grangs pa thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba 'grangs
86b2(phal chen): par ye shes chen po'i mngon par shes pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po mngon par sgrub bo/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /de ltar rnam pa 'di lta bu'i smon lam chen po dang /
86b3(phal chen): brtson 'grus chen po dang / mngon par bsgrub pa chen po'i smon lam gyi sgo bcu po 'di dag la sogs pa/ smon lam brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu tshang ba dag /byang chub sems dpa'i
86b4(phal chen): sa rab tu dga' ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas thob bo/ /mngon par sgrub bo/ /smon lam de dag kyang mthar thug pa'i gnas bcus mngon par sgrub ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di
86b5(phal chen): lta ste/ sems can gyi khams kyi mthar thug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mthar thug pa dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug pa dang / chos kyi khams kyi mthar thug pa dang /
86b6(phal chen): mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams kyi mthar thug pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i khams kyi mthar thug pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi khams kyi mthar thug pa dang /
86b7(phal chen): sems kyi dmigs pa'i khams kyi mthar thug pa dang / ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i khams kyi mthar thug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi rgyud dang / chos kyi rgyud dang / ye shes kyi rgyud
87a1(phal chen): kyi khams kyi mthar thug pa dag go/ //bam po bzhi bcu drug pa/ de ltar smon lam chen po 'di dag sems can gyi khams kyi mtha' gang
87a2(phal chen): du thug pa de'i mthar thug par gyur cig / smon lam chen po 'di dag 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtha' gang du thug pa dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / mya ngan
87a3(phal chen): las 'das pa'i khams dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i khams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi khams dang / sems can gyi dmigs pa'i khams dang / ye shes
87a4(phal chen): mngon par bsgrub pa'i khams dang / 'jig rten gyi rgyud dang / chos kyi rgyud dang / ye shes kyi rgyud kyi khams kyi mtha' gang du thug pa de'i mthar thug par gyur cig /'di ltar sems
87a5(phal chen): can gyi khams mthar thug pa med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams dang / sangs rgyas 'byung
87a6(phal chen): ba'i khams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi khams dang / sems kyi dmigs pa'i khams dang / ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i khams dang / 'jig rten gyi rgyud
87a7(phal chen): dang / chos kyi rgyud dang / ye shes kyi rgyud kyi khams mthar thug pa med pa de bzhin du smon lam chen po 'di dag kyang mthar thug pa med par gyur te/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba
87b1(phal chen): 'di dag kyang mthar thug pa med par gyur cig / ces de ltar smon lam shin tu bsgrubs shing / phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'jam pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ las su rung ba'i
87b2(phal chen): sems dang ldan pa/ zhi ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ dul ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ nye bar zhi ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ gnyen pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ byams pa'i sems dang ldan
87b3(phal chen): pa| 'khrugs pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ glong ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa de ni legs par rtog pa mang zhing dad pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
87b4(phal chen): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'i rgyud la yid ches pa yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsdu ba la
87b5(phal chen): yid ches pa yin/ sa yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / khyad par du 'gyur ba la mngon par yid ches pa yin/ stobs yongs su 'grub pa la mngon par yid ches pa yin/ mi
87b6(phal chen): 'jigs pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba la mngon par yid ches pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa mi 'phrogs pa la mngon par yid ches pa yin/ sangs rgyas
87b7(phal chen): kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par yid ches pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi yul mtha' dang dbus med pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mngon par yid ches pa yin/ de
88a1(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba'i rjes su 'jug pa la mngon par yid ches pa yin/ 'bras bu yongs su grub pa la
88a2(phal chen): mngon par yid ches pa yin/ mdor bsdu na byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sa dang / ye shes kyi bar du shin tu bstan pa'i byin gyi
88a3(phal chen): rlabs la mngon par yid ches pa yin no/ /yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag de ltar rgya che zhing de ltar zab la de ltar dben zhing de ltar
88a4(phal chen): zhi ba ste/ de ltar stong la de ltar mtshan ma med cing / de ltar smon pa med la/ de ltar chags pa med de/ de ltar gos pa med cing / de ltar tshad med la/ sangs rgyas
88a5(phal chen): kyi chos de dag de ltar rlabs che na 'on kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo 'di dag lta ba ngan par lhung ba'i rgyud dang / ma rig pa'i mun nag dang / rab rib kyi thibs pos kun nas
88a6(phal chen): khebs pa'i yid dang / nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan shin tu bsgreng ba'i yongs su rtog pa dang / sred pa'i dra bas mngon par ye rngam pa'i yid la bya ba dang / sgyu dang g.yo'i
88a7(phal chen): thibs po la rjes su spyod pa'i sems dang / bsam pa dang / phrag dog dang / 'jungs pa can gyi kun nas 'khor bas lam gyi rgyud du skye ba'i kun tu 'brel ba dang /
88b1(phal chen): 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la spyod pa'i las shin tu bsags pa dang / khro ba dang / khon du 'dzin pas 'bar ba byas pa'i sems kyi me lce dang / phyin ci log
88b2(phal chen): dang bcas pa'i las mngon par bsgrub pa dang / 'dod pa dang / srid pa'i ma rig pa dang / lta ba dang / kun tu zag pa'i bag chags mtshams 'brel ba'i sems dang / yid
88b3(phal chen): dang rnam par shes pa'i sa bon gyis 'di lta ste/ khams gsum du ming dang gzugs lhan cig tu skyes shing tha mi dad par byung ba'i yang skye ba'i sdug bsngal gyi myu gu mngon par
88b4(phal chen): bskyed do/ /ming dang gzugs de rnam par 'phel nas/ skye mched drug gi tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /skye mched rnams byung bas phan tshun reg pa dang / phrad cing 'dus pas
88b5(phal chen): tshor ba mngon par 'byung ngo / /tshor ba myong ba de nyid la yang dang yang mngon par dga' bas sred pa dang / nye bar len pa rnam par 'phel lo/ /nye bar len pa rnam par 'phel bas
88b6(phal chen): srid pa kun tu 'byung ngo / /srid pa kun tu byung bas skye ba dang / rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams
88b7(phal chen): kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal gyi phung po bdag dang bdag gi med pa/ gsob/ gsog/ stong pa/ byed pa med pa/ sems med pa/ rtswa
89a1(phal chen): dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / sgang sgong dang / mig g.yor lta bu mngon par 'byung yang de ltar khong du mi chud do/ /ces de la byang chub sems dpas
89a2(phal chen): sems can de dag de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po dang 'bral mi myong ba mthong nas/ de'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po rgyas pa 'byung ste/ sems can 'di dag ni bdag gis yongs
89a3(phal chen): su bskyab par bya ba dag go / yongs su dgrol bar bya ba dag go /shin tu bde ba la dgod par bya ba dag go snyam ste/ de'i phyir de'i byams pa chen po rgyas pa 'byung ngo / /kye/
89a4(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' snying rje dang / byams pa de lta bu'i rnam pa dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang
89a5(phal chen): po la gnas pa'i tshe/ dngos po thams cad la phangs par sems pa'i sems yongs su spangs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mos pa dang / dad pa rlabs po che'i
89a6(phal chen): blos sbyin pa chen po la rab tu brtson par byed de/ de 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ nor dang 'bru'i mdzod dang / bang ba yongs su gtang bar bya ba dag gam/ gser dang / nor bu
89a7(phal chen): dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / rin po che shI la dang / byi ru dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram yongs su gtang bar bya ba dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang lhab lhub yongs su
89b1(phal chen): gtang ba'am/ rta dang / glang po dang / shing rta dang / rkang thang dang / bzhon pa yongs su gtang ba'am/ bran pho dang bran mo yongs su gtang ba'am/ grong dang grong khyer dang /
89b2(phal chen): ljongs dang / pho brang 'khor dang / rgyal po'i gnas yongs su gtang ba'am/ bza' shing gi ra ba dang / dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang / gtsug lag khang yongs su gtang ba'am/
89b3(phal chen): chung ma dang / bu dang bu mo yongs su gtang ba'am/ sdug cing yid du 'ong ba'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtang ba'am/ mgo dang / rna ba dang / rkang lag dang / mig dang / yan
89b4(phal chen): lag gi dam pa dang / lus thams cad yongs su gtang ba'am/ gtang bar bya ba'i dngos po de dag thams cad la chags pa med par byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la dad
89b5(phal chen): pa dang / mos pa'i blos yongs su gtong ste/ de ltar de byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po 'di la gnas pa'i tshe/ gtod pa chen po rab tu byed do/ /de de ltar byams pa dang / snying
89b6(phal chen): rje dang / gtong ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pas sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir yang dang yang 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i don yongs su tshol
89b7(phal chen): zhing don du gnyer to/ /de de ltar yongs su tshol zhing don du gnyer ba'i tshe yongs su skyo ba'i sems mi skye ste/ de'i phyir de'i yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems mngon par 'byung ngo / /
90a1(phal chen): yongs su skyo ba med pas gtsug lag thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa yin/ de'i phyir gtsug lag thams cad la rab tu shes pa yin te/ de de
90a2(phal chen): lta bu'i gtsug lag dang ldan pas bya ba dang / mi bya ba shin tu rtogs pa'i blos sems can rab dang / 'bring dang / tha ma la dad pa'i tshul ji lta ba dang / ci 'os pas ci nus su snying
90a3(phal chen): thag pa nas yang dag pa nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed do/ /nan tan du byed do/ /de'i phyir de 'jig rten shes pa yin te/ 'jig rten shes pas dus dang tshod du ran par
90a4(phal chen): spyod cing ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pas bsam pa shin tu brgyan pas/ bdag dang gzhan gyi don du rab tu brtson par byed de/ de'i phyir ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa yin/
90a5(phal chen): sbyor ba de dag la'ang 'byung bar spyod pa yin/ phyir mi ldog cing phyir mi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus dang / stobs kyis shugs kyang rab tu thob pa yin te/ de ltar de dga' ba'i stobs
90a6(phal chen): dang shugs yongs su skyes pa yin/ dga' ba'i stobs dang shugs rab tu thob pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing rim gror bya ba la rab tu brtson zhing bstan pa la'ang nan
90a7(phal chen): tan shin tu byed do/ /de ltar de'i sa yongs su sbyong ba'i chos 'di lta ste/ dad pa dang / snying rje dang / byams pa dang / gtong ba dang / skyo ba med pa dang / gtsug lag shes pa
90b1(phal chen): dang / 'jig rten shes pa dang / khrel yod cing ngo tsha shes pa dang / dga' ba'i stobs kyi shugs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing rim gro bya ba'i nan tan yongs su skyes
90b2(phal chen): pa yin no/ /de de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba 'di la gnas pa'i tshe/ lta ba rgya chen po dang / smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas mang po rab tu snang bar
90b3(phal chen): 'gyur te/ lta ba rgya chen po dang / smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po dang /
90b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig stong phrag mang po dang /
90b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro/ /des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
90b6(phal chen): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong nas/ bsams pa rgya chen pos rim gro byed do/ /bkur sti byed do/ /bsti stang byed do/ /mchod pa byed do/ /na bza' dang / bsod
90b7(phal chen): snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad dag kyang 'bul zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang yongs su 'bul lo/ dge
91a1(phal chen): 'dun gyi tshogs rnams la yang yang dag par mchod par byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs
91a2(phal chen): su bsngo'o/ /de ltar des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mchod pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba mngon par 'grub pa yin/ de bsdu ba'i dngos po sbyin
91a3(phal chen): pa dang / ngag snyan pa gnyis kyi shas che bas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/ /de'i mos pa'i shugs dang / stobs kyis bsdu ba'i dngos po gong ma gnyis kyang
91a4(phal chen): yongs su 'grub par 'gyur te/ ma lus par khong du chud par ni ma yin no/ /de'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu las sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i shas che ba yin te/ lhag ma rnams
91a5(phal chen): kyang ci tshul ci nus su yang dag par mi sgrub pa ma yin no/ /de ji lta ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa byed cing / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba
91a6(phal chen): la brtson pa dang / sa yongs su sbyong ba'i chos 'di dag yang dag par blangs te gnas pa de lta de ltar de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsdos pa/ de
91a7(phal chen): dag de bas kyang shas cher shin tu byang ba dang / yongs su dag pa dang / las su rung bar 'gyur ro/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di lta ste/ dper na/ mgar ba mkhas pas
91b1(phal chen): gser gyi sa le sbram ji lta ji ltar mer bsregs pa de lta de ltar shin tu byang zhing yongs su dag pa dang / ci dgar las su rung bar 'gyur ro/ /kye/ rgyal ba'i sras dag /de bzhin
91b2(phal chen): du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji lta ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa byed cing / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la brtson par byed pa dang /
91b3(phal chen): sa yongs su sbyong ba'i chos kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag yang dag par blangs te gnas pa de lta de ltar de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa de
91b4(phal chen): dag shin tu byang ba dang / yongs su dag pa dang / ci dgar las su rung bar 'gyur ro/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /gzhan yang sa dang po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
91b5(phal chen): sems dpa' chen pos/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po nyid kyi rnam pa dang / 'thob par bya ba dang / rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
91b6(phal chen): dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen las yongs su btsal zhing yongs su dri bar bya'o/ /sa'i yan lag yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir yang ngoms mi shes par byas te/ des byang
91b7(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i sa dang po 'di la gnas pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa dang / drug pa dang / bdun pa dang /
92a1(phal chen): brgyad pa dang / dgu pa dang / bcu pa'i rnam pa dang / 'thob bar bya ba dang / rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang /
92a2(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen las yongs su btsal zhing yongs su dri bar bya'o/ /sa'i yan lag yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir yang ngoms mi shes par bya'o/ /des sa'i phyogs
92a3(phal chen): dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la mkhas par bya'o/ /sa 'grub pa dang / 'jig pa la mkhas par bya'o/ /sa'i rnam pa dang / rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu la mkhas par bya'o/ /
92a4(phal chen): sa 'thob par bya ba dang / rnam par bsgom pa la mkhas par bya'o/ /sa'i rnam pa yongs su sbyang ba la mkhas par bya'o/ /sa nas sar 'phar ba la mkhas par bya'o/ /sa
92a5(phal chen): dang sa la rnam par gnas pa la mkhas par bya'o/ /sa nas sa'i gnas gzhan du 'pho bar bya ba la mkhas par bya'o/ /sa nas sar yongs su sbyang ba'i khyad par gyi
92a6(phal chen): ye shes la mkhas par bya'o/ /sa nas sa thob nas phyir mi ldog pa'i ye shes la mkhas par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su sbyang bas/ de bzhin gshegs
92a7(phal chen): pa'i sa gnan pa la mkhas par bya'o/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa
92b1(phal chen): ni sa dang po las gyen du ma bskyod par sa bcu'i bar du gnan cing 'thab par bya ba thogs pa med de/ thogs pa med par 'gro ba dang / sa'i ye shes snang bas sangs rgyas kyi ye
92b2(phal chen): shes snang ba'ang rab tu thob bo/ /kye/ rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di lta ste/ dper na/ ded dpon chen po mkhas pas lam grogs yongs su gdon pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/
92b3(phal chen): grong rdal chen po'i sar phyin par bya bar 'dod pa ni thog ma nas lam dang lam gyi yon tan dang / lam las gol ba'i nyes pa dang / lam gyi bar lam gyi khyad par dang /
92b4(phal chen): lam gyi bar lam 'khrul na nyes par 'gyur ba dang / lam du bya mi bya dang / brgyags bshams pa yongs su tshol zhing kun tu 'dri'o/ /thog ma'i lam gyi bar lam nas ma
92b5(phal chen): 'phags pa nas grong rdal du phyin gyi bar du shin tu mkhas pa yin te/ lam gyi bar lam de nas ma 'phags par de nyid nas shes pas shin tu brtags pa'i blo dang /
92b6(phal chen): brgyags kyi tshogs chen po phun sum tshogs pas lam grogs mang po rnams nyam nyes med par grong rdal chen po der phyin par byed de/ mya ngan dang dgon pa'i nyes
92b7(phal chen): pas bdag dang lam grogs rnams la gnod par mi 'gyur bar byed do/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras ngag /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ded dpon
93a1(phal chen): mkhas pa yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas shing / sa'i phyogs dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs la mkhas pa dang / sa
93a2(phal chen): 'grub pa dang / 'jig pa la mkhas pa dang / sa'i rnam pa dang / rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu la mkhas pa dang / sa 'thob par bya ba dang / rnam par bsgom pa la mkhas pa
93a3(phal chen): dang / sa'i yan lag yongs su sbyang ba la mkhas pa dang / sa nas sar 'phar ba la mkhas pa dang / sa nas sar rnam par gnas pa la mkhas pa dang / sa nas sar
93a4(phal chen): khyad par du 'gyur ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa dang / sa nas sa thob pa las phyir mi ldog pa la mkhas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad yongs su sbyang
93a5(phal chen): bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa gnon pa la mkhas par gyur pa de'i tshe bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po'i brgyags yongs su bzung ba dang / ye shes kyi tshogs chen po
93a6(phal chen): la rnam par dbye ba shin tu byas pa dang / sems can gyi lam grogs mang po yongs su gdon pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i grong rdal chen
93a7(phal chen): por phyin par bya bar 'dod cing thog ma nas sa'i lam dang / sa'i lam gyi yon tan dang / sa'i lam gol ba'i nyes pa dang / sa'i lam gyi bar lam gyi khyad par
93b1(phal chen): dang / sa'i lam gyi bar lam 'khrul na nyes par 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po'i brgyags bshams shing gsog pa dag kyang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
93b2(phal chen): dpa' dag dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag las yongs su tshol zhing yongs su 'dri ste/ de lam gyi bar lam dang po nas gyen du 'phags par thams cad mkhyen pa'i grong rdal
93b3(phal chen): chen por phyin par bya ba'i bar du mkhas pa yin/ de de ltar ye shes kyis rnam par rtogs pa'i blo dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs chen po'i brgyags phun sum tshogs
93b4(phal chen): pas sems can gyi lam grogs kyi tshogs chen po yongs su smin pa'i tshul bzhin du 'khor ba'i mya ngan dang / dgon pa ba rgal dka' ba las bsgral te/ thams cad mkhyen
93b5(phal chen): pa'i ye shes kyi grong rdal chen po'i bar du phyin par byed cing / 'khor ba'i mya ngam dang / dgon pa'i nyes pas sems can lam grogs sam/ bdag la gnod par yang mi
93b6(phal chen): 'gyur bar byed do/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su skyo ba med pa'i yid kyis sa yongs su sbyang ba'i khyad
93b7(phal chen): par la brtson par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sa gnon pa'i bar du yang mkhas par bya'o/ /kye/ rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni byang chub sems
94a1(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po rab tu dga' ba'i sgor 'jug pa mdor bsdus te bstan pa'o/ /rgya cher ni
94a2(phal chen): shin tu bstan pa brgya stong grangs med pa la rnam pa'i mur thug pa med pa ste/ bskal pa grangs med pa'i mthar thug par shin tu bstan pa'i tshul gyi khong du chud par bya'o//
94a3(phal chen): de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phal cher 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal por 'gyur te/ srid chen po la dbang sgyur ba rab tu thob cing chos kyis
94a4(phal chen): yongs su bskyang ba dang / sems can rnams sbyin pa chen pos yongs su bsdu ba la mkhas shing mthu yod pa yin/ sems can rnams kyis 'jungs pa'i dri ma bzlog pa
94a5(phal chen): la mkhas pa yin/ sbyin pa chen po rtsom pas yongs su dub par mi 'gyur ba yin/ de sbyin pa'am/ ngag snyan pa'am/ don bsgrub pa'am/ don mthun pas dge ba'i
94a6(phal chen): rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang rung ste/ de thams cad ji ltar na sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur/ gtso bor 'gyur/ thu bor 'gyur/ phul du 'gyur/ dam par 'gyur/
94a7(phal chen): bla na med par 'gyur/ 'dren par 'gyur/ rnam par 'dren par 'gyur/ yongs su 'dren par 'gyur ba nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rten pa'i bar du
94b1(phal chen): 'gyur snyam ste/ sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang / chos yid la bya ba dang / dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
94b2(phal chen): yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la bya ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang / stobs yid la bya ba dang / mi 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang / sangs rgyas
94b3(phal chen): kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin/ de 'dod na
94b4(phal chen): skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu/ khyim dang / chung ma dang / srid thams cad yongs su spangs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ba dang / rab tu byung nas kyang
94b5(phal chen): skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu ting nge 'dzin brgya rab tu 'thob cing snyoms par 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas brgya mthong ba dang / de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par
94b6(phal chen): shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya bskyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyar 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya snang bar bya ba dang / sems can brgya yongs
94b7(phal chen): su smin par bya ba dang / bskal pa brgyar gnas par bya ba dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa brgya la rab tu 'jug pa dang / chos kyi sgo brgya rnam par 'byed
95a1(phal chen): pa dang / lus brgya yongs su bstan pa dang / lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor brgya yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i brtson 'grus
95a2(phal chen): kyi rnam pa de lta bu rtsom mo/ /de yan chad byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi mthu can rnams smon lam gyi khyad par gyis rnam par 'phrul te/ de dag gi lus sam/
95a3(phal chen): 'od dam/ rdzu 'phrul lam/ mig gam/ spyod yul lam/ dbyangs sam/ spyod pa'am/ rgyan tam/ byin gyi rlabs sam/ mos pa'am/ mngon par 'du byed pa dag
95a4(phal chen): kyang bskal pa du ma dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du
95a5(phal chen): mas kyang bgrang bar dka'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos sa'i don 'di nyid yang brtag par bya ba dang / bstan par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad
95a6(phal chen): pa 'di dag smras so/ /de dag dkar bo'i chos bsags dge ba phun ldan zhing / /bde gshegs yongs su bsnyen bkur snying rje byams ldan la/ /dad pa rgya che dge sems dang
95a7(phal chen): tshul dag ldan pa/ /rgyal ba'i ye shes don du rlabs chen sems kyang bskyed/ /rgyal ba'i chos rdzogs 'gro ba yongs su bskyab don du/ /thams cad mkhyen pa sangs rgyas
95b1(phal chen): stobs sbyong brtan mthu can/ /brtse rab chen pos chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bya bas/ /rgyal ba'i zhing sbyong sems kyi dam pa rab tu bskyed/ /'gro bar rnam pa sna tshogs
95b2(phal chen): dus rnams bstan pa'i phyir/ /'dren pa kun gyi yon tan thams cad 'dod tshol zhing / /dus gsum skad cig gcig tu mi rtog shes byed pa'i/ /mkha' 'dra shin tu
95b3(phal chen): yangs pa'i sems dang ldan par byed/ /shes rab dbang sgyur snying rje sngon 'gro thabs ldan zhing / /mos dang bsam pa rnam dag stobs kyis tshad med la/ /chags
95b4(phal chen): med mngon gyur gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa/ /bde gshegs rnams dang mnyam gyur sems kyi dam pa bskyed/ /bde gshegs sras sems rin chen yang dag skyes
95b5(phal chen): 'phral du/ /byis pa'i spyod bral sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod dang ldan/ /stobs bcu mnga' rigs kha na ma tho med par skyes/ /bde gshegs mnyam nyid rjes rtogs byang
95b6(phal chen): chub mchog tu nges/ /'di 'dra'i sems dang sa thob lhan cig mngon par skyes/ /bsam pa mi g.yo ri yi rgyal po 'dra bar gnas/ /rab tu dga' zhing spro mang dad dang
95b7(phal chen): ldan pa ste/ /mos pa'i shugs yangs rtag par sems kyi mchog dang ldan/ /'khrug dang 'tshe ba med cing khro ba med pa ste/ /ngo tsha shes shing srid zhu drang ldan shin tu
96a1(phal chen): bsdams/ /'gro ba yongs su bskyab pa'i mtshungs med ye shes dran gyur cing / /'dod par bya ba'i gnas dang ldan gyur dga' ba bskyed/ /sa
96a2(phal chen): thob gyur ma thag tu 'jigs pa lnga dang bral/ /'tsho ba med dang 'chi dang mi bsngags ngan 'gro dang / /'khor gyi 'jigs bral de la bag tsha'i rnam pa med/ /ci'i phyir zhe na de
96a3(phal chen): la bdag gi gnas med do/ /de dag bag chags bral zhing snying rje byams dang ldan/ /bsti stang dang ldan dga' ba phun sum yon tan mang / /nyin dang mtshan du
96a4(phal chen): dge ba'i phyogs la sten byed cing / /sems can don du chos brtson 'dod bskyed phyir ma yin/ /dge ba'i chos thos bsam la mkhas shing gnas med spyod/ /thob
96a5(phal chen): sems sred bral byang chub sems la rtag par dga'/ /bde gshegs ye shes 'dod cing gzhan du sems pa med/ /pha rol phyin pa tshol zhing sgyu dang g.yo yang
96a6(phal chen): spangs/ /ci smras de bzhin byed pas bden pa'i tshig la gnas/ /rgyal ba'i rigs skyon mi 'gyur byang chub slob la spyod/ /'jig rten las kyi bsam bral 'gro ba'i
96a7(phal chen): don du brtson/ /dkar pos ngoms pa med par phyir zhing gong du rtsol/ /de dag 'di 'dra'i chos brtson yon tan don dang ldan/ /rgyal ba blta ba'i don du smon lam
96b1(phal chen): mngon par sgrub/ /dam chos yongs su gzung zhing drang srong drung 'gro dang / /spyod pa mchog gi don du smon lam mngon par sgrub/ /sems can yongs su smin bya sangs
96b2(phal chen): rgyas zhing sbyangs te/ /de yi zhing mchog rgyal sras kun gyis gang 'gyur zhing / /rgyal sras rnams dang bsam pa gcig cing don mthun phyir/ /skra sbubs kun tu don gyi dam
96b3(phal chen): pa mngon 'tshang rgya/ /de dag smon lam du ma mngon par sgrub pa byed/ /de dag mtha' yas yangs shing mthar thug med dang ldan/ /nam mkha'i khams dang chos nyid mya
96b4(phal chen): ngan 'das khams dang / /'jig rten mthar thug rgyal ba 'byung dang ye shes sa/ /sems kyi yul dang ye shes 'jug pa'i mthar thug dang / /rnam gsum rgyud rnams mthar
96b5(phal chen): thug 'gro ba'i mur thug pa/ /rnam pa de tshul bdag smon mthar yang thug gyur cing / /de dag mthar thug ji bzhin bdag spyod de 'drar shog /de ltar mngon bsgrubs 'jam
96b6(phal chen): zhing byams pa'i sems ldan pa/ /sangs rgyas yon tan yid ches sems can rnam par lta/ /sems can sdug bsngal nyon mongs bdag gis bskyab ces te/ /rten
96b7(phal chen): 'brel 'byung 'jug snying rje byams dang ldan pa ni/ /de dag don du sna tshogs sbyin pa yang du rtsom/ /rgyal srid mchog dang rin chen sna tshogs glang po rta/ /mgo dang
97a1(phal chen): rkang lag mig dang de bzhin bdag gi sha/ thams cad yongs su gtong yang zhum pa'i yid med do/ /gtsug lag sna tshogs tshol
97a2(phal chen): yang yongs su skyo ba med/ /gtsug lag 'jig rten spyod pa'i rjes kyang rab tu snyogs/ /'jig rten shes dang ldan zhing khrel yod dga' dang ldan/ /bde gshegs
97a3(phal chen): gcig min rim gro rjes su mchod pa byed/ /de ltar mkhas pa nyin mtshan rtag tu brtson pa yi/ /dge ba mer bcug gser bzhin shin tu dag par 'gyur/ /de dag
97a4(phal chen): sa rnams bcu po 'di la sbyangs byas shing / /thogs pa med par chags med rab tu thob par 'gyur/ /ji ltar ded dpon lam grogs mang la phan brtson pa/ /lam
97a5(phal chen): gyi yon tan dris shing bde ba'i grong du skyel/ /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' dang po'i sa gnas pa/ /'gro ba'i don bshams chags med sa bcu rab tu 'thob/ /'di
