128b4(phal chen): dag thams cad yongs su dag cing shin tu 'od gsal bar 'gyur ro/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di lta ste/ dper na/ gser gyis le sbram de nyid mgar ba mkhas pas
128b5(phal chen): rgyan du byas pa ni/ de ma yin pa'i gser gyi sa le sbram gzhan rgyan du ma byas pas mi 'phrogs shing mi thub pa yin/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
128b6(phal chen): s ems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od 'phro ba can 'di la gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'og ma rnams la
128b7(phal chen): gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas mi 'phrogs shing mi thub pa yin/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che 'od dang
129a1(phal chen): ldan pa/ 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa can/ snang ba rab tu gtong pa ni de ma yin pa'i rin po che'i rnam pas mi 'phrogs
129a2(phal chen): shing mi thub pa yin/ rlung langs pa dang / chu dang / char bab pas 'od mi chod pa yin/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
129a3(phal chen): chen po/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od 'phro ba can 'di la gnas pa'ang de ma yin pa'i sa 'og ma la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mi 'phrogs shing
129a4(phal chen): mi thub pa yin/ bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i rgyud rnams kyis ye shes mi chod pa yin/ de'i bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi las/ don mthun pa'i shas che ba yin/ pha rol
129a5(phal chen): tu phyin pa bcu las brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i shas che ba yin te/ lhag ma rnams kyang ci tshul ci nus su yang dag par mi sgrub pa ma yin no/ /kye/ rgyal ba'i
129a6(phal chen): sras dag/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa bzhi pa ste/ 'od 'phro ba can zhes bya'o/ /de la gnas pa'i byang
129a7(phal chen): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phal cher lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe mar 'gyur te/ sems can rnams kyi 'jig tshogs la lta ba mang po yang dag par gzhom
129b1(phal chen): pa la mkhas shing mthu yod pa yin/ de sbyin pa'am/ ngag snyan pa'am/ don bsgrub pa'am/ don mthun pas dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang rung ste/ de thams cad ji ltar na/
129b2(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur/ gtso bor 'gyur/ thu bor 'gyur/ phul du 'gyur/ dam par 'gyur/ bla na med par 'gyur/ 'dren par 'gyur/ yongs su 'dren
129b3(phal chen): par 'gyur ba nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rten pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam ste/ sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang / chos yid la bya ba dang / dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang /
129b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la bya ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang / stobs yid la bya ba dang / mi
129b5(phal chen): 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la
129b6(phal chen): bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin te/ de 'dod na skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu ting nge 'dzin khrag khrig rab tu thob cing de dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig
129b7(phal chen): mthong zhing de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams khrag khrig spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig tu 'gro ba dang / 'jig
130a1(phal chen): rten gyi khams khrag khrig snang bar bya ba dang / sems can khrag khrig yongs su smin par bya ba dang / bskal pa khrag khrig tu gnas par bya ba
130a2(phal chen): dang | sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa khrag khrig la rab tu 'jug pa dang / chos kyi sgo khrag khrig rnam par 'byed pa dang / lus khrag khrig yongs su bstan
130a3(phal chen): pa dang / lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor khrag khrig yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam pa de lta bu rtsom mo/ /de yan chad byang chub
130a4(phal chen): sems dpa'i smon lam gyi mthu can rnams smon lam gyi khyad par gyis rnam par 'phrul te/ de dag gi lus sam/ 'od dam/ rdzu 'phrul lam/ mig gam/ spyod yul
130a5(phal chen): lam| dbyangs sam/ spyod pa'am/ rgyan tam/ byin gyi rlabs sam/ mos pa'am/ mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang /
130a6(phal chen): bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma'i bar gyis kyang bgrang bar dka'o/ /de nas byang chub
130a7(phal chen): sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos sa'i don 'di nyid yang brtag par bya ba dang / bstan par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sa gsum 'od byed pa
130b1(phal chen): la shin tu sbyangs byas shing / /nam mkha'i khams dang yid kyi khams dang khams gsum dang / /sems can spyod dang chos dang 'jig rten dpyod byed cing / /mos dang bsam
130b2(phal chen): pa rnam par dag pa yang dag gnon/ /'od 'phro yod pa'i sa thob 'phral du mthu chen rnams/ /ston pa'i rigs su yang dag skyes pas phyir mi ldog /sangs rgyas chos dang dge
130b3(phal chen): 'dun dkon mchog dad mi phyed/ /skye zhing 'jig dang gnas ma byed pa med par lta/ /'jig rten rgyu ba'i las dang byed dang srid skye dang / /mya ngan 'das 'khor zhing dang sems
130b4(phal chen): can rnam par sgom/ /sngon dang phyi mtha' zad dang skye med grub pa dang / /las la ston pa'i rigs kyi rjes su 'brang zhing sgom/ /de dag 'di 'dra'i chos ldan phan dang bder
130b5(phal chen): sems pa/ /lus dang dran pa tshor ba sems dang chos sgom ste/ /dran pa nyer gzhag bsgom pa rten pa rnams spangs pa/ /phyi dang nang gi gnyis ka'i rnam par mkhas pa sgom
130b6(phal chen): sdig to zad cing dge chos rnam par 'phel 'gyur ba'i/ /yang dag spong ba bzhi la'ang mkhas pa sgom par byed/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi dang stobs dang dbang po dang /
130b7(phal chen): byang chub yan lag rin chen lam rab yid 'ong sgom/ /de dag kun kyang 'gro la lta ba'i blo sgom ste/ /snying brtse byams pa sngon 'gro smon lam nye bar rton/ /stobs kyi dam
131a1(phal chen): pa go 'phang mchog gi rjes sems shing / /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sangs rgyas zhing la smon/ /ston pa'i 'jigs med rnams dang
131a2(phal chen): chos rnams 'phrogs med dang / /sangs rgyas gsung gi mchog la brten pa smon byed cing / /rin chen lam zab rnam par thar pa'i gnas rnams dang / /che ba'i thabs
131a3(phal chen): rnams yang dag bsgrub phyir sgom par byed/ /'jig tshogs lta med lta ba drug cu gnyis kyang med/ /bdag dang bdag gi med cing srog tu dmigs pa med/ phung
131a4(phal chen): po skye mched rnams dang khams kyi gnas dang rten/ /kun kyang mkhas pas bzhi pa'i sa la rab tu spangs/ /des ni gang dang gang rnams rgyal bas smad mdzad pa'i/ /
131a5(phal chen): las dang nyon mongs bcas pa don du mi 'gyur rnams/ /de dag yongs su spangs shing mkhas pa khong nas dag /'gro ba bskyab pa'i don du las rab dge ba brtson//
131a6(phal chen): mkhas pa de ni byams pa'i sems ldan bag kyang yod/ /gnyen 'jam sems ldan phan dang bde byed dran dang ldan/ /dam pa'i don rnams thams cad skyon med yongs
131a7(phal chen): su tshol/ /ye shes dbang bskur mngon mos 'gro ba'i don kyang byed/ /bla ma rim gror byed dang ldan zhing nan tan brtson/ /drin bzo khro ba med cing nga lo bde dang ldan//
131b1(phal chen): sgyu med thibs po med cing shin tu nges pa ste/ /yang dag sgrub byed brtson 'grus phyir ldog med pa yin/ /yid du 'ong ba'i sa 'di la ni de gnas tshe/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa
131b2(phal chen): nyid dang bsam dga' thob par 'gyur/ /mos pa rab tu 'byung 'gyur dge chos rnam par 'phel/ /dri ma rnyog pa the tshom yid gnyis thams cad bsal/ /'di la gnas pa'i
131b3(phal chen): mi rab khyu mchog rgyal ba'i sras/ /bde gshegs bye ba du ma mngon par mchod pa byed/ /chos kyang nyan byed bstan pa de la rab tu 'byung / /rgyan du byas pa'i gser ltar mi
131b4(phal chen): 'phrogs thub pa med/ /mkhas pa 'di la gnas pa'i yon tan bsam pa dang / /ye shes thabs dang spyod pa rnam dag lam la yang / /rnam par bzlog par bdud rnams
131b5(phal chen): bye bas mi nus te/ /rin chen 'od la rlung gis chod par mi 'gyur bzhin/ /mi dang lhas mchod 'os pa 'di la gnas pa yi/ /dbang phyug mtshe ma'i dam pa chos la spyod par
131b6(phal chen): 'gyur/ /lta ba'i thibs po rnams las sems can rnam par bzlog /rgyal ba'i ye shes don du dge ba'i rab tu brtsom/ /brtson 'grus ldan pas mi yi khyu mchog khrag
131b7(phal chen): khrig brgya/ /gzhan du mi sems shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas mthong / /yan chad smon lam dam pa yon tan don spyod pa/ /ye shes 'byung gnas bskal pa mang por
132a1(phal chen): mngon par sgrub/ /de ltar sa mchog bzhi pa 'di/ /rnam dag dag pa'i spyod ldan zhing / /yon tan ye shes don ldan pa/ /bde bar gshegs
132a2(phal chen): pa'i sras kyis bstan/ /'od 'phro can zhes bya ba ste/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa bzhi pa'o// //bam po bzhi bcu brgyad pa/ mkhas pa rnams kyi sa mchog
132a3(phal chen): spyod pa thos gyur nas/ /chos kyi shes pas rgyal sras rnams ni mgu zhing dga'/ /dga' ba'i yid kyis mkha' las me tog char yang 'bebs/ /bdag nyid che ba'i
132a4(phal chen): bde gshegs sras po dge zhes brjod/ /lha yi bdag po dbang sgyur lha yi tshogs rnams dang / /dga' bas mkha' la 'phags te bde gshegs mchod pa'i phyir/ /
132a5(phal chen): me tog sna tshogs sprin chen mdog sdug yid 'ong ba/ /dga' zhing mos pas bde bar gshegs la mngon par gtor/ /glu dbyangs snyan pa yid 'ong sil snyan rnga yi sgra/
132a6(phal chen): lha tshogs mang pos rgyal ba mchod pa'i don du byas/ /rgyal ba de tshe rab tu 'phrul ba'i sku yang ston/ /sgra dbyangs rnam pa kun las 'di 'dra'i sgra byung ngo / /yun ring mchog
132a7(phal chen): gis thub pa'i dgongs pa rdzogs/ /yun ring mchog gis thub pas byang chub brnyes/ /lha mi phan pa yun ring mchog gis mthong / /lha yi gnas su shAkya thub pa
132b1(phal chen): gshegs/ /yun ring mchog gis rgya mtsho'i chu yang g.yos/ /yun ring mchog gis 'od bzang thub pas bkye/ /yun ring mchog gis sems can bde bar 'gyur/ /thugs
132b2(phal chen): rje che gsung yun ring mchog gis thos/ /yun ring mchog gis thub pa che dang phrad/ /yon tan kun gyi mtha' phyin da byon to/ /nga rgyal dregs snyems mun pa kun spangs te/ /
132b3(phal chen): mtshungs med mchod par 'os la mchod par gyis/ /de la mchod byas bde 'gro'i lam du 'gro /de la mchod byas bde ba rnam pa mang / /de la mchod byas sdug bsngal thams
132b4(phal chen): cad 'byang / /de la mchod byas rgyal ba'i ye shes 'thob/ /rgyal ba mkha' ltar rnam par dag pa ste/ /'gro bas mi gos pad+mo'i chu dang 'dra/ /shin tu 'phags pa rgya mtsho'i ri rab
132b5(phal chen): bzhin/ /spro ba'i sems kyis rgyal ba mchod gyis shig /de skad dbyangs su brjod byas nas/ /lha yi bu mo brgya mang ba/ /dga' bas rgyas pas rab tu lta/ /shin tu dga' bas
132b6(phal chen): rim gror byed/ /de nas rdo rje'i snying po la/ /rnam thar zla bas smras pa ni/ /sa lnga'i rnam pa ci 'dra ba/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis bshad par mdzod/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i
132b7(phal chen): snying pos smras pa/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa'/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bzhi pa la sa'i lam yongs su rdzogs pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i
133a1(phal chen): sa lnga pa la 'jug ste/ de sems kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid bcus 'jug go /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'das pa'i sangs
133a2(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos kyis bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / da ltar byung ba'i
133a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / tshul khrims kyis bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / /sems kyis bsam pa rnam
133a4(phal chen): par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / lta ba dang / nem nur dang / dogs pa bsal bas bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / lam dang lam yin pa shes pas bsam
133a5(phal chen): pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / nan tan dang spong ba shes pas bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad gong nas
133a6(phal chen): gong du rnam par bsgom pas bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya bas bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa
133a7(phal chen): nyid de/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /sems kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa bcu po 'di dag gis de la 'jug ste/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga
133b1(phal chen): thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni byang chub kyi phyogs dang / lam gyi yan lag de dag nyid la sbyang ba shin tu byas shing lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu sbyangs pas de'i gong du
133b2(phal chen): lam gyi khyad par tshol zhing / de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su zhugs pa dang / smon lam gyi mthu dang / shugs dang / snying rje dang / byams pas sems can yongs su mi gtong ba dang /
133b3(phal chen): bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rab tu bsags pa dang / yongs su rgyun chad pa med pa dang / thabs la mkhas pas mngon par bsgrub pa dang / gong nas gong du sa'i snang
133b4(phal chen): ba blta ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs btsal ba dang / dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rig pa dang / blo'i stobs dang shugs kyi sa yid la bya ba'i phyir mi zlog par
133b5(phal chen): byas te/ 'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba/ 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa/
133b6(phal chen): 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de kun rdzob kyi bden pa la mkhas pa yin/ don
133b7(phal chen): dam pa'i bden pa la mkhas pa yin/ mtshan nyid kyi bden pa la mkhas pa yin/ rnam par dbye ba'i bden pa la mkhas pa yin/ brtag pa'i bden pa la mkhas pa yin/ dngos
134a1(phal chen): po'i bden pa la mkhas pa yin/ 'byung ba'i bden pa la mkhas pa yin/ byang zhing mi skye ba'i bden pa la mkhas pa yin/ lam gyi ye shes la
134a2(phal chen): 'jug pa'i bden pa la mkhas pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i rim pa mtshams sbyar ba grub par bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yang dag par bskyed pa'i
134a3(phal chen): bar du mkhas pa yin te/ de sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du shin tu dga' bar byed pas kun rdzob kyi bden pa yang rab tu shes so/ /
134a4(phal chen): theg pa gcig tu yang dag par gzhol bas don dam pa'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so/ /chos kyi rang gi mtshan nyid khong du chud pas mtshan nyid kyi bden pa yang rab tu shes
134a5(phal chen): so| |chos kyi bye brag rnam par dgod pa khong du chud pas rnam par dbye ba'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so/ /phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnam par dgod pas rtog ba'i
134a6(phal chen): bden pa yang rab tu shes so/ /lus dang sems la gnod pa nyams su 'bab pas dngos po'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so/ /'gro ba'i rgyud kyi mtshams sbyor bas 'byung
134a7(phal chen): ba'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so/ /rims dang yongs su gdung ba thams cad shin tu zhi bas byang zhing mi skye ba'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so/ /mi gnyis pas mngon
134b1(phal chen): par bsgrub pas lam gyi ye shes la 'jug pa'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so/ /rnam pa thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa rim pa thams cad
134b2(phal chen): mtshams sbyar ba rab tu bsgrub pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yang dag par 'byung ba'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so/ de 'ang mos pas shes pa'i stobs dang / shugs
134b3(phal chen): kyis te lhag ma ma lus par ye shes khong du chud pas ni ma yin no/ /de de ltar bden pa la mkhas pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'i blos 'dus byas thams cad gsob gsog rdzun pa
134b4(phal chen): bslu ba'i chos can dku byed pa/ byis pa 'drid par yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de sngon pas kyang sems can thams cad la snying rje mngon du 'gyur ro/ /byams
134b5(phal chen): pa chen po'i snang ba yang rab tu 'byung ste/ de de ltar ye shes kyi stobs dang shugs rab tu thob cing sems can thams cad la lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mngon par
134b6(phal chen): mos pas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' rab tu rtog ste/ 'di ltar sngon gyi mtha'i ma rig pa dang / srid pa dang / sred pa las rab tu byung
134b7(phal chen): ba'i sems can 'khor ba'i rgyud du 'bab pa/ phung po'i gnas las ma 'phags pa/ sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po/ bdag med pa/ sems can med pa/ srog med pa/ gso
135a1(phal chen): ba med pa/ gang zag med pa/ bdag dang bdag gi dang bral ba/ rnam par 'phel lo zhes de'ang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /'di
135a2(phal chen): ltar phyi ma'i mtha' med pa la rmongs pa'i 'dod pa 'di nyid rgyun gcad pa dang / mthar dbyung ba dang / 'byung bar bya ba dang / yod pa dang med pa de yang yang dag pa ji lta ba
135a3(phal chen): bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de 'di snyam du sems so/ /de ltar lus grangs med pa zhig 'gags la 'gag par 'gyur zhing 'gag bzhin te/ 'di ltar rgud par 'gyur
135a4(phal chen): yang lus la skyo ba mi skyed cing / sdug bsngal gyi 'khrul 'khor je bas je 'phel du byed pa dang / 'khor ba'i rgyud las phyir mi ldog cing / phung po'i gnas mi gtong ba dang /
135a5(phal chen): khams kyi sbrul gyis skyo bar mi 'gyur ba dang / nga rgyal dang lta ba'i zug rngu mi 'byin cing / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi me lce 'bar ba zhi bar mi byed pa
135a6(phal chen): dang | ma rig pa'i mun pa chen po mi sel cing / srid pa'i mtsho mi skem la/ stobs bcu'i ded dpon mi tshol zhing / bdud kyi bsam pa thibs po'i rjes su song ste/ 'khor
135a7(phal chen): ba'i rgya mtsho rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs kyi chu srin gyis dkrugs pas yongs su g.yeng bar 'khod cing / byis pa so so'i skye bo de dag de ltar mi shes shing rmongs pa ni ngo
135b1(phal chen): mtshar che'i/ ma la/ bdag gis sems can de ltar sdug bsngal gyis mnar ba/ mgon med pa/ dpung gnyen med pa/ skyabs med pa/ gnas med pa/ gzhi med pa/
135b2(phal chen): rten med pa/ long bar gyur pa/ ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dang / pris yog pa/ mun pas khebs pa de dag gi don du bdag gcig pu gnyis su med pas bsod nams dang / ye
135b3(phal chen): shes kyi tshogs kyi rnam par bsags par bya ba/ ji lta bur bsags pas sems can de dag shin tu rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / stobs bcu'i stobs kyi ye
135b4(phal chen): shes chags pa med pa'i bar gyi mthar thug pa thob par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de lta bu'i bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs bsags par bya'am ci snyam ste/ de de ltar shin
135b5(phal chen): tu brtags pa'i ye shes kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i blos dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang de dag thams cad sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang / sems can
135b6(phal chen): thams cad la phan pa dang / sems can thams cad la bde ba dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang / sems can thams cad la gtse ba med pa dang / sems can
135b7(phal chen): thams cad yongs su dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad drang ba dang / sems can thams cad dad par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad gdul ba dang / sems can thams
136a1(phal chen): cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir rab tu rtsom ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa shin tu khyab par dga' ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub
136a2(phal chen): sems dpa' de ni/ de bas kyang nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i chos nyid kyis dran pa dang ldan pa yin/ shin tu nges par rtogs pa'i ye shes kyis blo gros dang ldan pa yin/
136a3(phal chen): mdo'i don dang / tshul dang / ldem po dag khong du chud pas rig pa dang ldan pa yin/ bdag de gzhan gyi sems rjes su srung bas ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa yin/ sdom
136a4(phal chen): pa dang tshul ma bor bas dga' ba dang ldan pa yin/ gnas dang gnas pa ma yin pa la mkhas shing shin tu brtags pas blo dang ldan pa yin/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog
136a5(phal chen): pas ye shes dang ldan pa yin/ don dang don ma yin pa'i tshig yang dag par dbye ba la mkhas pas shes rab dang ldan pa yin/ bsgom pa mngon par bsgrub pa la
136a6(phal chen): mkhas pas mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa thob pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi rjes su 'brang bas thabs la mkhas pa yin/ bsod nams kyi tshogs nye bar gsog pas ngom
136a7(phal chen): mi shes pa yin/ ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su tshol bas brtson 'grus rgyun mi 'chad pa yin/ byams pa dang snying rje chen po'i tshogs yang dag par gsog pas
136b1(phal chen): skyo ba med pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yongs su tshol bas snyom
136b2(phal chen): las med par yongs su tshol ba la brtson pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsgrub pa dang / rgyan mngon par shom pas mngon par bsgrub pa'i yid dang ldan pa yin/ mtshan
136b3(phal chen): dang dpe byad bzang po yang dag par bsgrub pas dge ba rnam pa sna tshogs la brtson pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyan yongs su tshol
136b4(phal chen): bas rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par brtson pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / chos smra ba thams cad la rim gro byed pas bsnyen bkur dang / sri zhu chen po'i ngang tshul
136b5(phal chen): can yin/ byang chub kyi sems dang thabs mkhas pa chen po'i ngang tshul dang ldan par 'jig rten du rgyu bas khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/ sems can
136b6(phal chen): thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la mngon par brtson pas nyin mtshan du gzhan du sems pa'i yid yongs su spangs pa yin te/ de de ltar mngon par brtson pas
136b7(phal chen): sbyin pas kyang sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ /ngag snyan pa dang / don bsgrub pa dang / don mthun pa dang / gzugs kyi lus kun tu bstan pa dang / chos bshad
137a1(phal chen): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid smos pa dang / 'khor ba'i nyes pa bstan pa
137a2(phal chen): dang | sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi yon tan yongs su grags par bya ba dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa chen po mngon par bsgrub pa dang / bya ba dang / thabs
137a3(phal chen): rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sbyor bas sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ /de ltar sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mngon par brtson pa dang ldan zhing / sangs
137a4(phal chen): rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rjes su song ba'i bsam pa can/ dge ba'i rtsa ba phyir mi ldog pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa/ khyad par can gyi chos yongs su btsal ba la mngon par
137a5(phal chen): brtson pa de gang 'di 'jig rten na yod pa'i yi ge dang / gtsug lag dang / lag brda dang / grangs dang / rtsis dang / shod thabs la sogs pa dang / khams kyi cho ga
137a6(phal chen): dang | gso ba'i cho ga dang / skem pa dang / brjed byed dang / 'byung po'i gdon bsal pa dang / dug dang ro langs kyi sbyor ba bsal ba dang / rang bzo dang / gar gyi cho
137a7(phal chen): ga dang / gtam dang / rol mo dang / sgrung gtam la dga' bskyed pa dang / grong dang grong khyer dang / bza' shing gi ra ba dang / chu klung dang / mtshe'u dang / lteng ka dang /
137b1(phal chen): rdzing bu dang / me tog dang / shing tog dang / rtsi dang / nags tshal mngon par bsgrub pa dang / gser dang / dngul dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang /
137b2(phal chen): rin po che shI la dang / byi ru dang / rin po che rnams kyi 'byung gnas bstan pa dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / sa g.yo ba dang / ri dwags kyi ltas dang / rmi
137b3(phal chen): lam dang ltas bstan pa la 'jug pa dang / yan lag dang / nying lag gi mtshan dang / spyod pa'i mtshan dang / sdom pa dang / tshul dang / bsam gtan dang / mngon par shes
137b4(phal chen): pa dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i gnas rnams dang / gzhan yang gang sems can la 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ba'i sbyor ba dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa
137b5(phal chen): dang | bde bar 'gyur ba yod dgu de dag thams cad 'jig rten la snying brtse bas rim gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir mngon par sgrub bo/ /byang chub sems
137b6(phal chen): dpa'i sa shin tu rgyal bar dka' ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lta ba rgya chen po dang / smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas mang po snang bar 'gyur te/ lta
137b7(phal chen): ba rgya chen po dang / smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas
138a1(phal chen): bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrig khrig brgya phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig
138a2(phal chen): stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po snang bar 'gyur ro/ /des de bzhin gshegs
138a3(phal chen): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong nas bsam pa rgya chen pos rim gro byed do/ /bkur sti byed do/ /bsti stang byed do/ /mchod pa byed do/ /
138a4(phal chen): na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad dag kyang 'bul zhing byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang yongs su 'bul
138a5(phal chen): lo| |dge 'dun gyi tshogs rnams la'ang yang dag par mchod pa byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/ /
138a6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la rim gro byed cing de dag las rim gro dang / zhe sa dang / bsti stang du chos bstan pa
138a7(phal chen): nyan to/ /len to/ /'dzin to/ /thos nas kyang ci tshul du nan tan gyis yang dag par sgrub ste/ de dag las phal cher de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi bstan pa la rab tu
138b1(phal chen): 'byung ngo / /rab tu byung nas kyang thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa'i chos smra bar 'gyur ba yin/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa shin tu rgyal bar dka' ba 'di la
138b2(phal chen): gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bskal pa du mar shin tu byang ba dang / yongs su dag pa dang / 'od rab tu gsal bar gnas so/ /bskal pa brgya
138b3(phal chen): phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag
138b4(phal chen): khrig brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar dge ba'i
138b5(phal chen): rtsa ba de dag shin tu byang ba dang / yongs su dag pa dang / rab tu 'od gsal bar gnas so/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /gser gyi sa le sbram de nyid rin po che mu sa ra gal bas btab
138b6(phal chen): na| de bas kyang yongs su 'tsher ro/ /yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /'od shin tu gsal zhing dang bar 'gyur ro/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i
138b7(phal chen): sa shin tu rgyal bar dka' ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thabs dang shes rab kyis rnam par spyad pa yang de bas kyang shin tu byang ba dang / yongs su dag pa dang /
139a1(phal chen): rab tu 'od gsal zhing dang ba yin/ ye shes kyi sbyor ba'i yon tan mngon par bsgrubs pa dang ldan pa yin/ mi
139a2(phal chen): 'phrogs shing shin tu brtags pa yin/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / skar ma dang / rgyu skar gyi gzhal med khang gi 'od snang ba ni
139a3(phal chen): rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis mi 'phrogs shing / rlung dang thun mong du mi spyod pa yin/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa shin tu rgyal bar
139a4(phal chen): dka' ba 'di la gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thabs dang / shes rab dang / ye shes dang / sems kyis shin tu brtags pa dang ldan pa yang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
139a5(phal chen): kyis mi 'phrogs pa yin/ 'jig rten pa dang thun mong du mi spyod pa yin/ de'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu las bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa shas che ba yin te/ lhag ma
139a6(phal chen): rnams kyang ci tshul ci nus su mi sgrub pa ma yin no/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa shin tu rgyal bar dka' ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems
139a7(phal chen): dpa'i sa lnga pa mdor bstan pa'o/ /de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phal cher lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan du 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyi mu stegs
139b1(phal chen): kyi gnas thams cad rnam par bzlog pa la mkhas shing mthu yod pa yin/ de sbyin pa'am/ ngag snyan pa'am/ don bsgrub pa'am/ don mthun pas dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci
139b2(phal chen): rtsom yang rung ste/ de thams cad ji ltar na sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur/ gtso bor 'gyur/ thu bor 'gyur/ phul du 'gyur/ dam par 'gyur/ bla na med par 'gyur/
139b3(phal chen): 'dren par 'gyur/ yongs su 'dren par 'gyur ba nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rten pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam ste/ sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang / chos yid la
139b4(phal chen): bya ba dang / dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la
139b5(phal chen): bya ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang / stobs yid la bya ba dang / mi 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas/ rnam pa'i mchog
139b6(phal chen): thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin te/ de 'dod na skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu ting nge 'dzin khrag khrig
139b7(phal chen): phrag stong rab tu 'thob cing / de dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig phrag stong mthong zhing de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa dang / 'jig
140a1(phal chen): rten gyi khams khrag khrig phrag stong skyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig phrag stong du 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams khrag
140a2(phal chen): khrig phrag stong du snang bar bya ba dang / sems can khrag khrig phrag stong yongs su smin par bya ba dang / bskal pa khrag khrig phrag stong du gnas par bya ba dang / sngon
140a3(phal chen): gyi mtha' dang phyi mi'i mtha'i bskal pa khrag khrig phrag stong la rab tu 'jug pa dang / chos kyi sgo khrag khrig phrag stong rnam par 'byed pa dang / lus khrag khrig phrag
140a4(phal chen): stong yongs su bstan pa dang / lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor khrag khrig phrag stong yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi rnam pa
140a5(phal chen): de lta bu rtsom mo/ /de yan chad byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi mthu can rnams smon lam gyi khyad par gyis rnam par 'phrul te de dag gi lus sam/ 'od dam/
140a6(phal chen): rdzu 'phrul lam/ mig gam/ spyod yul lam/ dbyangs sam/ spyod pa'am/ rgyan tam/ byin gyi rlabs sam/ mos pa 'am/ mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal
140a7(phal chen): pa du ma dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas kyang bgrang
140b1(phal chen): par dka'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos sa'i don 'di nyid yang brtag par bya ba dang bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /
140b2(phal chen): rgyal ba'i spyod pa bzhi po de ltar rnam sbyangs te/ /dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su sems byed cing / /tshul khrims sems dang nan tan lam rnams rnam dag pas/ /nem nur
140b3(phal chen): med pa'i mkhas pa lnga pa yongs su gnon/ /dran pa'i gzhu dang dbang po mda' rno phyir mi ldog /yang dag spong ba rta yin gzhon pa rdzu 'phrul rkang / /stobs lnga go cha dgra
140b4(phal chen): rnams kun gyis tshugs mi nus/ /dpa' bas mi ldog mkhas pa lnga pa yongs su gnon/ /ngo tsha khrel yod gos yin mkhas pa'i tshul gtsang spos/ /byang chub yan lag phreng ba
140b5(phal chen): byug pa bsam gtan mchog / shes rab rnam par dpyang dang thabs mchog rgyan yin te/ /bza' shing ra ba ting 'dzin dga' ldan yang dag gnon/ /rdzu 'phrul bzhi po
140b6(phal chen): rkang pa dran pa rnam dag mgrin/ /byams brtse rnam dag mig yin shes rab mche ba mchog /bdag med nga ros nyon mongs dgra rnams rab tu 'joms/ /mkhas pa mi yi seng
140b7(phal chen): ge sa lnga yongs su gnon/ /de dag sa mchog lnga pa'i phyogs su phyin gyur nas/ /yongs su dag pa'i lam rnam phyir zhing gong du sbyong / /bsam dag mkhas pa rgyal ba 'thob
141a1(phal chen): par bya don du/ /skyo ba med par snying rje byams pa'i rjes su sems/ /bsod nams tshogs bsags de bzhin ye shes rab ldan pa/ /sa rnams
141a2(phal chen): snang bar bya phyir gcig min thabs rtog cing / /sangs rgyas byin gyis dran dang blo gros blo thob pas/ /bden pa bzhi po ma lus yang dag khong du chud/ /don dam bden pa
141a3(phal chen): de bzhin kun rdzob mtshan bden dang / /rnam par dbye ba'i bden pa de bzhin brtag bden dang / /'byung zhing 'jug dang dngos po bzhi lam bden pa nas/ /sgrib med bden pa'i
141a4(phal chen): bar du yang dag rab tu rtogs/ /de ltar bden pas yongs su sbyangs pa'i blo phra yang / /rnam thar dam pa sgrib med de ni thob pa min/ /ye shes mos yangs yon tan
141a5(phal chen): rnams kyi 'byung gnas te/ /'gro kun dgra bcom rang rgyal rnams ni zil gyis gnon/ /de dag bden pas de ltar rang gi blos bsgrubs pas/ /'dus byas rdzun zhing
141a6(phal chen): rang bzhin snying po med par shes/ /sems can don du bde gshegs ye shes tshol ba'i tshe/ /bde gshegs thugs brtse byams pa snang ba rab tu 'thob/ /'dus byas sngon
141a7(phal chen): dang phyi mtha' mkhas pa rab tu lta/ /gti mug mun gnag mun pas 'khrugs shing sred chags pa'i/ /'gro rnams sdug bsngal phung po lta ba bdag med cing / /srog
141b1(phal chen): bral rtswa shing 'dra ba mngon par sel ba byed/ /nyon mongs rjes 'gro 'di dag 'das dang ma 'ongs pa'i/ /sdug bsngal rgyun gcod mthar phyin gzhal bar yong mi byed/ /kyi hud
141b2(phal chen): 'gro ba de ltar 'khyams zhes snying rje skye/ /gti mug 'khrul pas 'khor ba'i rgyud du phyir mi ldog /phung po'i gnas dang khams sprul lta bu'i zug rngu can/ /mes gdungs yid
141b3(phal chen): can sgrib pa'i mun pas bsgribs gyur pa/ /don rnams rnam par ma brtags sred pa'i mtshor lhung zhing / /rgyal ba'i ded dpon bral ba sdug bsngal rgya mtshor gnas/ /de ltar
141b4(phal chen): rig nas bag yod phyir zhing rab tu rtsom/ /ci rtsom kun kyang 'gro ba rnam thar don du ste/ /phyir zhing dran ldan blo gros rig dang ldan pa yin/ /khrel yod dga' ldan mkhas pa blo ldan
141b5(phal chen): shes rab ldan/ /bsod nams bsags dang ye shes dam pas mi ngoms shing / /rtag tu skyo med le lo med par thos pa tshol/ /zhing sgrub rgyal ba'i mtshan dang sangs rgyas
141b6(phal chen): gsung tshol zhing / /sems can phan par brtson pa'i bya bas ngoms mi shes/ /'gro ba smin bya'i don du mkhas pas bzo yi gnas/ /yi ge lag brda grangs dang rtsis dang gso
141b7(phal chen): ba'i thabs/ /'byung po'i gdon dang las rnams sna tshogs bsal ba'i phyir/ /snying brtse byams pa'i blo gsal gtsug lag kun la gzhol/ /rang bzo mchog dang gar sdug
142a1(phal chen): sna tshogs dga' byed dang / /chu klung ra ba shing tog me tog 'dug gnas dang / /bya ba sna tshogs sgrub byed sems can bde don du/ /rin chen 'byung
142a2(phal chen): gnas du ma'ang nye bar ston pa byed/ /sa g.yo nyi zla gza' skar kun kyang de bzhin du/ /sems can yan lag mtshan ma'i dpyad dang rgyal srid gnas/ /gzugs med
142a3(phal chen): bsam gtan mngon shes mchog dang tshad med pa/ /'gro la bde dang phan pa'i don 'dod mngon par bsgrub/ /shin tu rgyal dka' 'di thob shes rab mchog spyod pa//
142a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas bye ba mchod byed chos rnams nyan par byed/ /de dag dge dang bsam pa phyir zhing dag par 'gyur/ /gser sbram ji ltar mu sar gal bas btab pa bzhin/ /
142a5(phal chen): ji ltar bar snang gza' yi rin chen gzhal med khang / /rlung la rgyu ste 'on kyang rlung gis 'phrogs pa min/ /de ltar 'gro ba'i don spyod 'jig rten chos spyod kyang / /ji ltar pad+mo
142a6(phal chen): chus mi chags bzhin 'phrogs pa min/ /'di la gnas pa dga' ldan dbang po mkhas par 'gyur/ /mu stegs spyod dang lta ba mang po'i gnas kyang sel/ /stobs
142a7(phal chen): rnams bcu po sems can bskyab par bya'o zhes/ /dge ba de dag rgyal ba'i ye shes don du rtsom/ /'di na sa gong du brtson 'grus rtsom byed mthu thob pa/ /khrag khrig
142b1(phal chen): bye ba stong gi bde gshegs mchod pa byed/ /ting 'dzin thob nas khrag khrig zhing yangs mkhas pas bskyod/ /yan chad smon lam khyad par yon tan 'byung gnas so/ /de ltar sa mchog
142b2(phal chen): lnga pa 'di/ /thabs kyi rnam pa khrag khrig gis/ /sems can gtso la yang dag tu/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis bstan pa yin/ /shin tu rgyal bar dka' ba zhes bya ba ste/ byang chub sems
142b3(phal chen): dpa'i sa lnga pa'o/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis mchog spyod pa rab thob nas/ /rgyal sras dga' zhing mkha' las me tog char 'bebs so/ /nor bu rin chen rnam dag 'od gsal rgya
142b4(phal chen): chen 'byung ba dag / bde bar gshegs la mngon 'thor dge zhes rnam par brjod/ /lha rnams brgya phrag stong grangs dga' zhing bar snang las/ /lha rdzas yid 'ong rin chen
142b5(phal chen): sna tshogs phye ma'i rnams/ /bde bar gshegs la mngon 'thor byug pa phreng ba spos/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan se mo do yang 'bul/ /lha yi dbang po dbang sgyur lha tshogs mang
142b6(phal chen): po dang / /steng gi nam mkha' la 'khod cing rin chen sprin yangs pa/ /rgyal ba mchod pa'i don du bde bar gshegs la 'thor/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis rgyal sras legs zhes rnam par
142b7(phal chen): brjod/ /bar snang gnas las lha yi bu mo stong gis kyang / /glu dbyangs yid 'ong rol mo'i sgra dbyangs snyan pa phyung / /sgra rnams kun gyi dbyangs las 'di skad tshig kyang byung / /
143a1(phal chen): rgyal ba'i gsung ni yid 'ong nyon mongs gdung ba sel/ /chos rnams thams cad stong zhing dngos zhi mtshan ma med/ /nam mkha'i dbyings dang
143a2(phal chen): mtshungs mnyam rnam dag rnam mi rtog / 'gro dang gnas las rnam 'das ma lus spros pa med/ /de bzhin nyid du chos rnams yang dag mnyam mi rtog /chos rnams
143a3(phal chen): kun la snang ba khong du sus chud pa/ /de la dngos dang dngos med g.yo ba gang yang med/ /snying rje brtse bas 'gro ba dgrol phyir brtson pa ni/ /de dang de dag rgyal sras chos
143a4(phal chen): kyi sku skyes pa'o/ /mtshan ma thams cad spangs shing sbyin pa'i spyad pa spyod/ /tshul khrims shin tu sems dam sngon nas zhi zhing dul/ /'gro ba'i don du chos kyi ye shes ma
143a5(phal chen): nyams bzod/ /brtson 'grus stobs dang ldan zhing chos rnams kun gyis dben/ /nyon mongs bsal cing rnam dag bsam gtan tshul la zhugs/ /dngos po thams
143a6(phal chen): cad snga nas zhi zhing rnam par phye/ /ye shes spyod dang stobs phyug rtag tu 'gro don brtson/ /rgyal sras de dag sdig zhi che ba nyid dang ldan/ /de skad sgra dbyangs snyan pa
143a7(phal chen): stong grangs brjod byas nas/ /lha yi bu mo mi smra dad par thub la lta/ /rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs med la/ /thar pa'i zla bas yang smras pa/ /sa mchog lnga yi gong ma
143b1(phal chen): de| |rnam pa ci 'dras 'grub par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos smras pa/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa la sa'i lam
143b2(phal chen): yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sa drug pa la 'jug go /de chos mnyam pa nyid bcus 'jug ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
143b3(phal chen): chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad mi skye ba mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad
143b4(phal chen): ma byung ba mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad dben pa mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad snga nas rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad spros pa med pa mnyam
143b5(phal chen): pa nyid dang / chos thams cad blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / sgra brnyan dang / chu'i zla ba dang /
143b6(phal chen): gzugs brnyan dang / sprul pa dang mtshungs pa mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad dngos po yod pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / gnyis ka ma yin pa mnyam pa nyid de/ kye|
143b7(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras dag / chos mnyam pa nyid bcu po 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa la 'jug go /de chos thams cad la rang bzhin de 'dra bar rab tu rtog cing spyod
144a1(phal chen): pa dang mthun par sems shing mi mthun par mi byed pas byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa mthun pa'i bzod pa rnon pos 'thob ste/ 'on
144a2(phal chen): kyang da dung mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa mngon du gyur pa ni thob pa ma yin no/ /de chos thams cad la rang bzhin de ltar rtog pa'i tshe/ de bas kyang snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba
144a3(phal chen): dang | snying rje chen po la dbang bsgyur bas snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ 'jig rten 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa la rnam par lta'o/ /de 'jig rten 'byung
144a4(phal chen): ba dang / 'jig pa la lta ba'i tshe/ 'di snyam ste/ 'jig rten kun tu rgyu ba'i skye ba ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bdag tu mngon par shes pa las 'byung ste/ bdag tu mngon
144a5(phal chen): par zhen pa dang bral na 'byung ba yang med par 'gyur ro/ /byis pa'i blo can bdag tu mngon par zhen pa/ mi shes pa'i rab rib kyis bsgribs pa yod pa dang med pa la
144a6(phal chen): mngon par mos pa/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa la gzhol ba/ yang dag pa ma yin par rab tu zhugs pa/ log pa'i rjes su 'brang ba de dag ni bsod nams dang
144a7(phal chen): bsod nams ma yin pa'i 'du byed nye bar gsog ste/ 'du byed de dag gis yongs su bsgos pa'i sems kyi sa bon zag pa dang bcas pa/ nye bar len pa dang bcas pa ni/
144b1(phal chen): ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba dang / rga shi dang / yang srid pa mngon par 'grub pa 'byung ba nye bar song ba yin te/ las kyi zhing gi gzhi dang / ma rig pa'i mun pa dang / sred pa'i snum
144b2(phal chen): dang | nga'i nga rgyal gyis brlan pa'i lta ba'i rnam pa dang / dra ba rab tu 'phel bas ming dang gzugs kyi myu gu 'byung ste/ byung nas rnam par 'phel lo/ /ming dang gzugs kyi myu gu
144b3(phal chen): rnam par 'phel nas/ dbang po lnga 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang po lnga byung nas/ phan tshun 'dus shing phrad pas reg par 'gyur ro/ /reg pa 'dus pas tshor ba 'byung ngo / /tshor
144b4(phal chen): ba de'i rjes su mngon par smon pas sred pa 'byung ngo / /sred pa ni nye bar len pa rnam par 'phel bar byed do/ /nye bar len pa rnam par 'phel ba las srid pa 'byung bar 'gyur
144b5(phal chen): ro| |srid pa byung nas phung po lnga po 'byung bar 'gyur te/ phung po lnga byung nas lam gyi rgyud lngar rim gyis dengs par 'gyur ro/ /dengs nas 'bral bar 'gyur te/ dengs
144b6(phal chen): shing bral bas mi dga' zhing yongs su gdung bar 'gyur ro/ /mi dga' ba dang yongs su gdung ba'i rgyus mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid
144b7(phal chen): mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa 'byung bar 'gyur yang de dag las su yang 'byung bar byed pa med do/ /rang bzhin dang lhun gyis grub par 'jig par 'gyur yang de dag la 'jig
145a1(phal chen): par byed pa su yang med do/ /zhes de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lugs su mthun par rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba
145a2(phal chen): la rab tu rtog go / de 'di snyam du sems te/ bden pa mngon par mi shes pa ni yang dag par ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pas byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa ni 'du byed
145a3(phal chen): rnams so/ /'du byed la gnas pa'i sems dang po ni rnam par shes pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig tu skyes pa'i nye bar len pa'i phung po bzhi ni ming dang gzugs
145a4(phal chen): so| |ming dang gzugs rnam par 'phel ba ni skye mched drug go / dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes pa gsum phrad pa zag pa dang bcas pa ni reg pa'o/ /reg pa'i
145a5(phal chen): rjes las skyes pa ni tshor ba'o/ /tshor ba la chags pa ni sred pa'o/ /sred pa rnam par 'phel ba ni nye bar len pa'o/ /nye bar len pa las byung ba'i las zag pa dang bcas
145a6(phal chen): pa ni srid pa'o/ /las dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni skye ba'o/ /skye ba ni phung po 'byung ba'o/ /phung po yongs su smin pa ni rga ba'o/ /rgas nas phung po 'jig pa ni 'chi
145a7(phal chen): ba'o| |'chi zhing 'bral ba'i tshe myos shing chags par 'gyur ba'i sems la yongs su gdung ba ni mya ngan to/ /mya ngan las byung ba'i tshig tu brjod pa ni smre sngags 'don
145b1(phal chen): pa'o| |dbang po lnga'i nyams su bab pa ni sdug bsngal lo/ /yid kyis lta ba'i nyams su bab ni yid mi bde ba'o/ /sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba mang po byung ba ni 'khrug
145b2(phal chen): pa ste| de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po dang / sdug bsngal gyi sdong po 'ba' zhig byed pa po dang / tshor ba po med pa mngon par grub par 'gyur ro/ /de 'di snyam du sems
145b3(phal chen): te| byed pa po la mngon par chags pas las rnams yod par gyur te/ gang na byed pa po med pa de na don dam par na las kyang mi dmigs so/ /de 'di snyam du sems te/
145b4(phal chen): 'di ltar khams gsum pa 'di ni sems tsam ste/ gang 'di srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu phye ste bka' stsal ba de dag thams cad
145b5(phal chen): kyang sems gcig la gnas pa dag go / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po gang la 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems skyes pa de ni rnam par shes pa'o/ /dngos po ni 'du byed do/ /
145b6(phal chen): 'du byed la mgo rmongs pa ni ma rig pa'o/ /ma rig pa'i sems dang lhan cig skyes pa ni ming dang gzugs so/ /ming dang gzugs rnam par 'phel ba ni drug gi skye mched do//
145b7(phal chen): dgru gi skye mchod dang 'brel ba ni reg pa'o/ /reg pa dang lhan cig skyes pa ni tshor ba'o/ /tshor bas mi ngoms pa ni sred pa'o/ /sred pas mnar te sdug cing mi gtong ba ni nye
146a1(phal chen): bar len pa'o/ /srid pa'i yan lag 'byung ba 'di dag ni srid pa'o/ /srid pa 'byung ba ni skye ba'o/ /skye ba yongs su smin pa ni rga ba'o/ /rga ba
146a2(phal chen): dang bral ba ni 'chi ba'o/ /de la ma rig pa ni bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te/ sems can rnams kyang dmigs pa la rmongs par byed do/ /'du byed mngon par
146a3(phal chen): bsgrub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to/ /'du byed rnams kyang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te/ ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par smin pa yang mngon par 'grub par byed do/ /rnam
146a4(phal chen): par shes pa mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to/ /rnam par shes pa'ang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te/ srid pa'i nying gi mtshams kyang sbyor ro/ /ming
146a5(phal chen): dang gzugs mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to/ /ming dang gzugs kyang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te/ phan tshun nye bar rton par yang byed do/ /skye mched
146a6(phal chen): drug mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to/ /drug gi skye mched kyang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te/ rang gi yul rnam par phye ba yang ston to/ /reg pa
146a7(phal chen): mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to/ /reg pa yang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te/ dmigs pa la reg par yang byed do/ /tshor ba mngon par 'grub
146b1(phal chen): pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to/ /tshor ba yang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te/ yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba dang / gnyis ka ma yin par tshor ba yang skyed do/ /
146b2(phal chen): sred pa mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to/ /sred pa yang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te/ chags par 'gyur ba'i dngos po la mngon par chags par yang
146b3(phal chen): byed do/ /nye bar len pa mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to/ /nye bar len pa yang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te/ kun nas nyon mongs pas 'ching bar
146b4(phal chen): yang byed do/ /srid pa mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyu yang 'byin to/ /srid pa yang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te/ srid pa'i rgyud gzhan du yang gnas par byed do/ /skye
146b5(phal chen): ba mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to/ /skye ba yang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te/ phung po 'byung bar yang byed do/ /rga ba mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yang
146b6(phal chen): 'byin to/ /rga ba yang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te/ dbang po yongs su 'gyur bar yang byed do/ /'chi bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu yang 'byin to/ /'chi ba yang bya ba
146b7(phal chen): gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te/ 'du byed 'jig par yang byed do/ /yongs su ma shes pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to/ /de la ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed
147a1(phal chen): rnams so zhes bya ba ni/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams rgyun mi 'chad cing rton pa'o/ /'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa'o zhes bya
147a2(phal chen): ba ni| 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa rgyun mi 'chad cing rton pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba ni/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen
147a3(phal chen): gyis ming dang gzugs rgyun mi 'chad cing rton pa'o/ /ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis drug gi skye mched ces bya ba ni/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis drug gi skye mched rgyun mi
147a4(phal chen): 'chad cing rton pa'o/ /drug gi skye mched kyi rkyen gyis reg pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ drug gi skye mched kyi rkyen gyis reg pa rgyun mi 'chad cing rton pa'o/ /reg pa'i rkyen gyis
147a5(phal chen): tshor ba'o zhes bya ba ni/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rgyun mi 'chad cing rton pa'o/ /tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa rgyun mi 'chad
147a6(phal chen): cing rton pa'o/ /sred pa'i rkyen gyis nye bar len pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis nye bar len pa rgyun mi 'chad cing rton pa'o/ /nye bar len pa'i rkyen gyis sred pa'o zhes
147a7(phal chen): bya ba ni/ nye bar len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa rgyun mi 'chad cing rton pa'o/ /srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba'o zhes bya ba ni/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba rgyun mi 'chad cing rton
147b1(phal chen): pa'o| |skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi'o zhes bya ba ni/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi rgyun mi 'chad cing rton pa'o/ /ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed rnams 'gag go zhes bya ba de ni/ ma
147b2(phal chen): rig pa'i rkyen med pas 'du byed rnams nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o/ /'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag go zhes bya ba ni/ 'du byed kyi rkyen med pas
147b3(phal chen): rnam par shes pa nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag go zhes bya ba ni/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen med pas ming dang
147b4(phal chen): gzugs nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o/ /ming dang gzugs 'gags pas drug gi skye mched 'gag go zhes bya ba ni/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen med pas drug gi skye
147b5(phal chen): mched nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o/ /drug gi skye mched 'gags pas reg pa 'gag go zhes bya ba ni/ drug gi skye mched kyi rkyen med pas reg pa nye bar zhi zhing rton pa
147b6(phal chen): med pa'o/ /reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag go zhes bya ba ni/ reg pa'i rkyen med pas tshor ba nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o/ /tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag go
147b7(phal chen): zhes bya ba ni/ tshor ba'i rkyen med pas sred pa nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o/ /sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag go zhes bya ba ni/ sred pa'i rkyen med pas len pa nye
148a1(phal chen): bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o/ /nye bar len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag go zhes bya ba ni/ nye bar len pa'i rkyen med pas srid pa nye bar zhi zhing
148a2(phal chen): rton pa med pa'o/ /srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag go zhes bya ba ni/ srid pa'i rkyen med pas skye ba nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o/ /skye ba 'gags pas rga shi 'gag
148a3(phal chen): go zhes bya ba ni/ skye ba'i rkyen med pas rga shi nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o/ /de la ma rig pa dang / sred pa dang / nye bar len pa ni/ nyon mongs pa'i lam gyi rgyun mi 'chad
148a4(phal chen): pa'o| |'du byed dang / srid pa ni/ las kyi lam gyi rgyun mi 'chad pa'o/ /lhag ma rnams ni/ sdug bsngal gyi lam gyi rgyun mi 'chad pa'o/ /rab tu rnam par phye bas sngon
148a5(phal chen): gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' 'gags pas lam gyi rgyun mi 'chad pa'o/ /de ltar lam 'di gsum ni bdag med cing bdag dang bdag gi dang bral bar 'byung zhing
148a6(phal chen): 'jig pa ste/ rang bzhin gyis mdud khyim lta bu'o/ /de ltar ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba 'di ni/ sngon gyi mtha' la bltas pa'o/ /rnam par shes
148a7(phal chen): pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / drug gi skye mched dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba 'di dag ni/ da ltar byung ba la bltas pa'o/ /sred pa dang / nye bar len pa dang / srid pa dang /
148b1(phal chen): skye ba zhes bya ba 'di ni/ phyi ma'i mtha' la bltas pa ste/ de phan chad du yang de dag rgyun du 'byung ngo / /ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed rnams 'gag ces bya ba 'di ni blta
148b2(phal chen): ba rgyun chad pa ste/ lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /yang 'di ltar srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis po 'di dag gi rgyus sdug bsngal gsum 'byung ste/ de la ma rig pa dang /
148b3(phal chen): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / drug gi skye mched ces bya ba 'di ni 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal lo/ /reg pa dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi
148b4(phal chen): yang sdug bsngal lo/ /sred pa dang / nye bar len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba nas 'khrug pa zhes bya ba'i bar 'di ni 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal lo/ /ma rig ba 'gags pas 'du byed
148b5(phal chen): rnams 'gag ces bya ba 'di ni sdug bsngal gsum gyi rgyun 'chad pa'o/ /ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba ni 'du byed rnams rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba ste /
148b6(phal chen): lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag ces bya ba ni 'du byed rnams med pa ste/ lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis
148b7(phal chen): 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba ni skye ba rnam par 'brel ba ste/ lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag ces bya ba ni 'jig pa rnam par 'brel
149a1(phal chen): ba ste/ lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba ni srid pa lugs su mthun par brtag pa ste/ lhag
149a2(phal chen): ma rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag ces bya ni zad pa dang / 'jig pa'i lugs su mthun par brtag pa ste/ lhag ma rnams kyang de
149a3(phal chen): bzhin no zhes de ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la lugs su mthun pa dang / mi mthun pa'i tshul du rab tu rtog ste/ 'di ltar srid pa'i yan lag rjes su 'brel pa dang /
149a4(phal chen): sems gcig tu yang dag par 'du ba dang / rang gi las ma 'dres pa dang / ched du byed pa med pa dang / lam gsum gyi rgyud du 'brang ba dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / da
149a5(phal chen): ltar byung ba dang / phyi ma'i mtha' la blta ba dang / sdug bsngal gsum 'byung ba dang / rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba dang / skye ba dang 'jig pa rnam par 'brel ba dang / srid
149a6(phal chen): pa'i lugs su mthun pa dang / zad par 'gyur bar rab tu rtog pa'o/ /de de ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rnam pa bcur rab tu rtog cing bdag med pa dang /
149a7(phal chen): srog med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa dang / rang bzhin gyis byed pa po dang / tshor ba po med par rab tu rtog pa'i tshe/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam par
149b1(phal chen): thar pa'i sgo skyes pa yin/ srid pa'i yan lag 'di dag gi rang bzhin 'gags shing rnam par thar pa la shin tu nye bar gnas pas chos kyi mtshan ma gang yang mi skye ste/ des
149b2(phal chen): de'i mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo skyes pa yin/ de ltar de stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa la zhugs pas snying rje chen po sngon du gtong zhing sems can yongs
149b3(phal chen): su smin par bya ba ma gtogs par 'dod pa gang yang mi skye ste/ des de'i smon pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo skyes pa yin/ de rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po 'di dag sgom
149b4(phal chen): pas| bdag dang pha rol gyi 'du shes dang bral ba dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang bral ba dang / yod pa dang / med pa'i 'du shes dang bral bas byang chub kyi
149b5(phal chen): yan lag yongs su ma tshogs pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po sngon du btang ste/ de bas kyang shin tu brtson par byed do/ /de 'di snyam du sems te/
149b6(phal chen): 'du ba yod pas ni 'dus byas 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /'du ba dang bral bas ni 'phel ba med do/ /rgyu rkyen dang ldan pas ni 'du byed 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyu rkyen dang mi
149b7(phal chen): ldan pas ni 'phel ba med do/ /de lta bas na bdag gis de lta bu 'dus byas nyes pa mang po'i skyon can shes par bya ste/ 'du ba dang / rgyu rkyen dang ldan pa 'di dag rgyun gcad par
150a1(phal chen): bya'o/ /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'du byed rnams shin tu zhi ba'ang mngon du mi bya'o zhes te/ kye|rgyal ba'i sras dag /de de ltar
150a2(phal chen): 'du byed kyi rnam pa de ltar nyes pa mang po'i skyon can/ snying po dang / rang bzhin med pa/ skye ba med pa/ 'gag pa med pa'i rang bzhin du rab tu rtog pa dang / snying rje
150a3(phal chen): chen por rab tu sgrub pa dang / sems can yongs su mi gtong bas chags pa med pa'i ye shes mngon sum zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa snang ba'i
150a4(phal chen): tshul du mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /de de lta bu ye shes dang ldan zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pas snang bar gyur nas kyang / byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su
150a5(phal chen): sdud pa'i rkyen nye bar gsog cing yang dag par sdud do/ /'dus byas dang 'grogs par yang mi gnas so/ /'du byed rnams rang bzhin gyis zhi ba'ang rab tu rtog go /'on
150a6(phal chen): kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma rdzogs pa'i phyir de la mi gnas te/ de byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum 'di la gnas pa'i tshe/ 'jug pa stong pa zhes bya ba'i
150a7(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin skye bar 'gyur ro/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / 'du ba stong pa nyid dang / mngon par sgrub pa stong pa
150b1(phal chen): nyid dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par rtog pa'i stong pa nyid dang / ltos pa stong pa nyid dang / tha dad pa dang / tha dad pa med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang skye
150b2(phal chen): bar 'gyur te/ de dag la sogs pa stong pa nyid kyi sgo'i ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag bcu de la mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du mtshan ma med pa'i sgo'i ting nge 'dzin brgya stong
150b3(phal chen): phrag bcu dang / smon pa med pa'i sgo'i ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag bcu mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems
150b4(phal chen): dpa' de phyir zhing mi phyed pa'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa 'thob bo/ /nges pa'i bsam pa dang / dge ba'i bsam pa dang / zab pa'i bsam pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i bsam pa
150b5(phal chen): pa dang / rgyun mi 'chad pa'i bsam pa dang / dri ma med pa'i bsam pa dang / mtha' yas pa'i bsam pa dang / ye shes la mngon par mos pa'i bsam pa dang / thabs dang shes
150b6(phal chen): rab tu ldan pa'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa 'thob ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa 'di bcu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi rjes su song ba yin/ phas kyi rgol
150b7(phal chen): ba thams cad kyis phyir mi ldog pa yin/ ye shes kyi sa la yang dag par gzhol ba yin/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las rnam par log pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi ye
151a1(phal chen): shes mngon du bya ba la shin tu nges pa yin/ bdud dang nyon mongs pa kun nas rgyu ba thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i
151a2(phal chen): snang ba la shin tu gnas pa yin/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos yang dag par spyad pa yongs su bsgoms pa yin/ thabs dang shes rab
151a3(phal chen): dang ye shes rnam par dpyad pa dang ldan pa yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos mngon par bsgrub pa dang rnam par 'dres pa yin/ de ltar de byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon
151a4(phal chen): sum 'di la gnas pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i shas che ba yin/ chos de dag la tshul bzhin du mthun par byed cing mi mthun par mi byed pas/
151a5(phal chen): mthun pa'i bzod pa gsum pa rab tu rno ba rab tu skyes pa yin/ de ltar de byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum 'di la gnas pa'i tshe/ de'i lta ba rgya chen po dang /
151a6(phal chen): smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas mang po snang bar 'gyur te/ lta ba rgya chen po dang / smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas stong
151a7(phal chen): phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig
151b1(phal chen): brgya phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po
151b2(phal chen): snang bar 'gyur ro/ /des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong nas/ bsam pa rgya chen pos rim gro byed do/ /bkur
151b3(phal chen): sti byed do/ /bsti stang byed do/ /mchod pa byed do/ /na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad dag kyang 'bul zhing byang chub sems
151b4(phal chen): dpa'i bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang yongs su 'bul lo/ /dge 'dun gyi tshogs rnams la yang yang dag par mchod pa byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bla na med pa yang
151b5(phal chen): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la bsnyen bkur byed cing rim gro dang /
151b6(phal chen): bkur stis nan tan du chos nyan cing len to/ /'dzin to/ /thos nas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du snyoms par 'jug pa dang / shes rab dang ye shes kyi snang bas
151b7(phal chen): rab tu brtson par byed do/ /nan tan gyis yongs su 'dzin pas de sngon pas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod rab tu thob pa yin/ de ltar de byang chub sems
152a1(phal chen): dpa'i sa mngon sum 'di la gnas pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong
152a2(phal chen): phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig brgya phrag du ma
152a3(phal chen): dang | bskal pa khrag khrig stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar sngon pas kyang ches byang ba
152a4(phal chen): dang | ches 'od gsal zhing dang bar gnas so/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gser gyi sa le sbram de nyid baiDUR+Yas btab na sngon pas kyang shin tu
152a5(phal chen): 'tsher la 'od gsal zhing dwangs par 'gyur ro/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
152a6(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang shes rab dang ye shes kyis shin tu brtags pas sngon pas kyang shin tu byang la 'od gsal zhing dwangs pa yin te/ phyi phyir zhing yang rab tu zhi
152a7(phal chen): bas mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ro/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di lta ste/ dper na/ zla ba'i 'od ni sems can gyi lus kyang sim par byed la/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor
152b1(phal chen): chen po bzhis kyang mi 'phrogs pa yin/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum 'di la
152b2(phal chen): gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sngon pas kyang sems can du ma'i bsam pa'i nyon mongs pa 'bar ba yang zhi zhing sim par byed la/ bdud kyi lam gyi rgyud bzhis kyang mi 'phrogs
152b3(phal chen): pa yin/ de'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i shas che ba yin te/ lhag ma rnams kyang ci tshul ci nus su yang dag par mi sgrub pa ma yin no/ /kye |rgyal
152b4(phal chen): ba'i sras dag / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum zhes bya ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa'o/ /de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phal cher lha'i
152b5(phal chen): rgyal po rab 'phrul dgar 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyi lhag pa'i nga rgyal zhi bar bya ba la mkhas shing mthu yod pa yin/ nyan pa thams cad kyi yongs su dri
152b6(phal chen): bas mi 'phrogs pa yin/ de sbyin pa'am/ ngag snyan pa'am/ don bsgrub pa'am/ don mthun pa sa dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang rung ste/ de thams cad ji ltar na sems can
152b7(phal chen): thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur/ gtso bor 'gyur/ thu bor 'gyur/ phul du 'gyur/ dam par 'gyur/ bla na med par 'gyur/ 'dren par 'gyur/ yongs su 'dren par
153a1(phal chen): 'gyur ba nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la brten pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam ste/ sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang / chos yid la bya ba dang /
153a2(phal chen): dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la bya ba dang /
153a3(phal chen): pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang / stobs yid la bya ba dang / mi 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas/ rnam pa'i
153a4(phal chen): mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin te/ de 'dod na skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu ting nge 'dzin
153a5(phal chen): khrag khrig brgya stong rab tu 'thob cing de dag la mnyam par gzhog pa dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya stong mthong ba dang / de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par
153a6(phal chen): shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams khrag khrig brgya stong skyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig brgya stong du 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams khrag khrig brgya
153a7(phal chen): stong snang bar bya ba dang / sems can khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su smin par bya ba dang / bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong du gnas par bya ba dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang /
153b1(phal chen): phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong la rab tu 'jug pa dang / chos kyi sgo khrag khrig brgya stong rnam par 'byed pa dang / lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su bstan
153b2(phal chen): pa dang / lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor khrag khrig brgya stong yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam pa de lta bu rtsom mo/ /de yan chad byang
153b3(phal chen): chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi mthu can rnams smon lam gyi khyad par gyis rnam par 'phrul te/ de dag gi lus sam/ 'od dam/ rdzu 'phrul lam/ mig gam/ spyod
153b4(phal chen): yul lam/ dbyangs sam/ spyod pa'am/ rgyan tam/ byin gyi rlabs sam/ mos pa'am/ mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang / bskal pa brgya phrag
153b5(phal chen): du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma'i bar gyis kyang bgrang bar dka'o/ /de nas
153b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos sa'i don 'di nyid yang brtag par bya ba dang / bstan par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /mkhas pas
153b7(phal chen): lam gyi spyod pa lnga por yongs rdzogs nas/ /chos rnams mtshan med mtshan nyid med dang ma skyes dang / /ma byung snga nas yongs su zhi zhing spros med pa/ /yongs su sgom
154a1(phal chen): pas ye shes blo can drug pa gnon/ /chos rnams dben zhing len med rnam par rtog med dang / /sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gnyis kyi dngos las
154a2(phal chen): rnam grol bas/ /chos kyi tshul la 'gal med rjes su mthun byed cing / /ye shes ldan pa'i dam pa drug pa yongs su gnon/ /mthun pa rno la gnas shing ye shes stobs
154a3(phal chen): ldan pa/ /'jig rten kun gyi 'byung dang 'jig la rab tu rtog /gti mug mun pas 'gro ba 'byung ba kun tu bskyed/ /gti mug de nyid bral bas 'byung ba med pa yin/ /
154a4(phal chen): rkyen gyi rnam pa don dam stong par rnam pa 'byed/ /bya ba mi 'gal rgyu rkyen byed pa mnyam par shes/ /yang dag ji bzhin byed pa med par las shes nas/ /'dus byas
154a5(phal chen): sprin sdug lta bur byed pa med par shes/ /bden pa mi shes de ni yang dag ma rig pa/ /las ni sems kyi stobs kyis mgo rmongs byung bar 'gyur/ /sems la rten te
154a6(phal chen): lhan cig byung ba ming dang gzugs/ /de ltar sdug bsngal phung po chen po'i bar du 'byung / /khams gsum sems kyi rgyu las byung ba der 'jug ste/ /srid pa'i yan
154a7(phal chen): lag bcu gnyis 'di dag sems gcig rten/ /'dod chags skyes pa de las sems su brjod pa yin/ /de bzhin srid pa'i dngos po sems kyi rnam pa'o/ /ma rig bya ba
154b1(phal chen): gnyis byed rmongs bya'i dngos po la/ /rmongs par byas shing de nas sems pa'i rgyu yang 'byin/ /de bzhin rga ba phung po gzhig bya 'jig byed par/ /de las sdug bsngal ming
154b2(phal chen): thogs thams cad mi zad 'byung / /ma rig rkyen gyis chad par 'gyur ba yod pa min/ /rnam par chad cing rgyu rkyen bral bas yod pa 'gag /gti mug sred pa nyer len
154b3(phal chen): nyon mongs lam yin te/ /las dang srid pa sems pa lhag ma sdug bsngal yin/ /gti mug skye mched bar du 'dus byas sdug bsngal te/ /reg dang tshor ba de dag sdug
154b4(phal chen): bsngal sdug bsngal yin/ /yan lag lhag mar 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal rnam 'phel ba/ /bdag med shes pas sdug bsngal gsum po 'chad par 'gyur/ /mun pa sems
154b5(phal chen): dang 'dus byas 'di ni sngon bltas yin/ /rnam par shes nas tshor ba'i rgyud du da ltar byung / /sred dang srid par sdug bsngal 'byung ba phyi ma'i mtha'/ /'gags shing zad pa
154b6(phal chen): de dag lta ba chad pa yin/ /gti mug rkyen gyis de dag rnam par 'brel pa 'byung / /zad pas byang chub rkyen rnams rnam par 'brel pa yin/ /rgyu las rgyu 'byung med na rgyu yi
154b7(phal chen): rgyun chad 'gyur/ /bde phan shes ldan rang bzhin stong pa de ltar rtog /rgyud du mthun pa gti mug mun pas byung ba yin/ /mi mthun bzlog pa gti mug zad pas mi 'byung ba'o/ /
155a1(phal chen): zad pa'i rkyen dang de dag yod dang med pa las/ /gnas pa med blo rnam pa bcur ni de ltar rtog /srid pa'i yan lag mtshams dang sems
155a2(phal chen): gcig las mthun dang / /ched du mi byed rgyud gsum rjes 'brang sngon mtha' dang / /sdug bsngal gsum dang rgyus byung skye dang 'jig pa dang / /srid pa'i mthar phyin zad
155a3(phal chen): dang rkyen gyi lugs mthun par/ |de ltar rten 'brel 'byung la yang dag 'jug byed pas/ /sgyu 'dra yang dag ma yin tshor bar byed med cing / /rmi lam 'dra ba de bzhin
155a4(phal chen): mig yor 'dra ba ste/ /byis pa slu ba'i smig rgyu rang bzhin mtshungs mnyam pa/ /de ltar bsgom pa mkhas pa'i stong pa nyid kyi sgo/ /rkyen rnams med pa de ni mtshan ma
155a5(phal chen): med pa ste/ /log par shes pas nam yang smon pa med pa yin/ /gzhan du sems can snying brtse'i don du skye ba 'dzin/ /de 'dra'i rnam thar sgo la sgom byed mthu che
155a6(phal chen): ba| |snying brtse ba yi blo ldan sangs rgyas yon tan mngon 'dod cing / /'dus byas 'dus pa mkhas pa yongs su rtog byed pas/ /bsam pa nges shing gcig min legs
155a7(phal chen): dang ldan pa yin/ /stong nyid ting 'dzin stong phrag bcu rnams yongs su rgyas/ /de bzhin brtan pa mtshan ma med dang smon med ldan/ /shes rab shas che mthun pa'i bzod
155b1(phal chen): pa mchog can te/ /mkhas pa'i rnam thar ye shes chags pa med dang ldan/ /de 'dra'i bsam pas drang srong che mang mchod byed pas/ /rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'di la shin tu
155b2(phal chen): bsngags pa yin/ /de ni sangs rgyas mdzod thob khong du chud pas na/ /bai DUR+Yas btab gser mdog bzhin du sngon pas gsal/ /zla ba'i 'od ni 'gro ba'i lus la sim par byed/ /
155b3(phal chen): rlung bzhi langs pas yongs su 'phrogs par mi nus so/ /rgyal sras 'od kyang bdud kyi lam las shin tu 'das/ /nyon mongs yongs su gdung dang sdug bsngal nad kyang sel//
155b4(phal chen): sa 'di phyogs su phyin pa lha yi bdag por 'gyur/ /'phrul dga'i dam pa lhag pa'i nga rgyal sel la mkhas/ /ye shes lam dang ldan pa de ni ci rtsom yang / /nyan thos lam
155b5(phal chen): las 'das te brtan zhing mi 'phrogs pa'o/ /bde gshegs sras po brtson 'grus ldan pa 'dod gyur na/ /ting 'dzin bye ba brgya stong tshang pa 'thob par byed/ /skad cig gcig tu
155b6(phal chen): phyogs bcur sangs rgyas mang po lta/ /dpyid kyi nyi ma gsal zhing lhan par byed pa bzhin/ /zab cing blta dka' phra ba ste/ /nyan thos rang rgyal shes mi nus/ /bdag nyid che
155b7(phal chen): la sa drug pa/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis bshad pa yin/ /mngon sum zhes ni bya ba ste/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa'o// //bam po bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa/ de nas
156a1(phal chen): sna tshogs yid 'ong sprin/ /lha tshogs mang po mkha' la gnas shing mngon par mthong / /tshig snyan rnam par rjod pa byed/ /dga' ba'i dam
156a2(phal chen): pa mchog gis yongs su rgyas/ /dge'o don dam sems mdzad cing / /yon tan brgya dang yan lag ldan zhing dbang sgyur ba/ /mi yi puN+Da ri ka yin/ /'gro la phan pa'i
156a3(phal chen): spyod rab yang dag bshad/ /yid 'ong 'od mchog ldan khyod dang / /mi yi gtso bo mya ngan yongs su sel mdzad la/ /dbang phyug chen po mkha' gnas shing / /spos sprin yid
156a4(phal chen): 'ong dam pa mngon par 'thor/ /tshig snyan rab tu rjod pa byed/ /lha tshogs mang po mkha' las dgar 'gyur dbyangs sgrog cing / /gang gis sa bstan 'di thos pa/ /de
156a5(phal chen): dag thob pa bzang po thob ces zer/ /rol mo brdung dkrol dbyangs snyan pa/ /brgya mang lha yi bu mos dga' bar byas/ /bde bar gshegs dang khyod mthu yis/ /tshig
156a6(phal chen): rab 'di 'dra rab tu brjod par 'gyur/ /zhi dang nges spyod dam pa can/ /ma dul 'dul mdzad 'jig rten kun gyis mchod byas pa/ /'jig rten kun las 'das pa
156a7(phal chen): yi| |'jig rten spyod pa shin tu phra ba bstan/ /sna tshogs lus kyang rab tu bstan/ /lus dang lus la chos nyid phun sum tshogs shing ldan/ /rnam dpyod zhi gnas mthus
156b1(phal chen): bcil pas/ /dbyangs su sgrog kyang yi ge brjod mi byed/ /zhing rnams brgyar yang 'dod byed cing / /mgon po mchod par 'os la mchod par byed/ /zhing rgyal bdag tu 'du shes
156b2(phal chen): pa| |ye shes dbang sgyur mchog gi rab tu sel/ /sems can yongs su smin byed kyang / /bdag dang gzhan gyi 'du shes rnam pa kun tu med/ /dge ba yangs pa yang dag
156b3(phal chen): gsog / 'on kyang dge ba gsog la gnas pa med/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gis/ /'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'bar bar mthong gyur cing / /'du shes thams cad
156b4(phal chen): rnam spangs nas/ /snying brtse ldan par brtson 'grus rab tu rtsom/ /lha mang lha yi bu mo yis/ /gsung ba'i mchog la mchod byas nas/ /kun kyang mi smra dgar gyur te/ /drang srong
156b5(phal chen): che la lta zhing gnas/ /thar pa'i zla bas yang smras pa/ /'khor rnams shin tu rnam par dang / /sa bdun pa yi rnam pa dag /rgyal ba'i sras kyis bshad pa mdzod/ /byang chub
156b6(phal chen): sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa la de ltar sa'i lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
156b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa yongs su gnon to/ /de thabs dang shes rab kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i lam brtsam pa'i khyad par bcus yongs su gnon te/ bcu
157a1(phal chen): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa'i yid dang yang ldan la/ bsod
157a2(phal chen): nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs chen po yang yang dag par gsog pa yin/ bdag med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med pa'i chos la'ang rab tu 'jug la/
157a3(phal chen): tshad med pa bzhi mngon par sgrub pa yang yongs su mi gtong ba yin/ bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis shin tu mtho ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub pa'ang mngon par
157a4(phal chen): sgrub la/ chos gang la yang mngon par chags pa med pa yin/ khams gsum pa las dben par gyur pa'ang thob la khams gsum pa bsdu ba dang / rgyan mngon par
157a5(phal chen): bsgrub pa'ang mngon par sgrub pa yin/ nyon mongs pa 'bar ba thams cad shin tu zhi zhing rab tu zhi ste/ nye bar zhi ba yang yin la/ sems can thams cad kyi 'dod
157a6(phal chen): chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa'i me lce rab tu zhi bar mngon par bsgrub pa'ang mngon par sgrub pa yin/ sgyu ma dang / rmi lam dang / mi yor
157a7(phal chen): dang | sgra brnyan dang / chu'i zla ba dang / gzugs brnyan dang / sprul pa'i rang bzhin lta bur yod pa dang / med pa dang / gnyis ka ma yin pa thams cad kyang khong du chud
157b1(phal chen): la| las dang bya ba rnam par phye ba tshad med pa'i bsam pa yang mngon par sgrub pa yin/ zhing gi tha gru nam mkha' dang mnyam par shin tu bsgoms pa'i yid dang ldan
157b2(phal chen): la| sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong zhing bsgrub pa dang / rgyan kyang mngon par sgrub pa yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang / chos dang / sku nam mkha'
157b3(phal chen): lta bur yang rab tu 'jug la/ gzugs dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po bsdu zhing rgyan mngon par bsgrub pa yang mngon par sgrub pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs
157b4(phal chen): pa'i gsung rang bzhin gyis zhi zhing brjod du med pa'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan par yang yid ches la/ sems can thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par phye ba'i rgyan
157b5(phal chen): mngon par bsgrub pa yang mngon par sgrub pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis skad cig gcig tu dus gsum thugs su chud par yang khong du chud la/
157b6(phal chen): dus dang bskal pa'i grangs mtshan nyid tha dad pa la'ang sems can gyi bsam pa rnam par bsgom pa'i phyir rjes su 'jug pa yin te/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /thabs
157b7(phal chen): d ang shes rab kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i lam brtsam pa'i khyad par 'di bcus byang chub sems dpa' sa drug pa la rnam par dbye ba shin tu byas pa sa bdun yongs su
158a1(phal chen): gnon to/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam gyi tshogs thabs dang shes rab kyis
158a2(phal chen): mngon par bsgrubs pa'i khyad par snang bar gyur pa 'di dag mngon par bsgrubs pas byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun yongs su gnon ces bya ste/ de ltar byang chub
158a3(phal chen): sems dpa'i sa bdun pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni sems can gyi khams tshad med pa la 'jug go / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems
158a4(phal chen): can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / 'dul ba'i 'phrin las tshad med pa la 'jug go/ 'jig rten gyi khams mang po tshad med pa la 'jug go /sangs rgyas bcom
158a5(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa tshad med pa la 'jug go / chos tha dad pa tshad med pa la 'jug go /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
158a6(phal chen): ye shes mngon par 'tshang rgya ba tshad med pa la 'jug go / bskal pa'i grangs tshad med pa la 'jug go /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dus gsum thugs su chud
158a7(phal chen): pa tshad med pa la 'jug go / sems can gyi mos pa'i khyad par tshad med pa la 'jug go /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan dang / sku gzugs dang /
158b1(phal chen): sku sna tshogs ston pa tshad med pa la 'jug go/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / dbang po tha dad pa tshad med pa la 'jug go /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
158b2(phal chen): kyi gsung brjod pas sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa tshad med pa la 'jug go / sems can rnams kyi sems dang spyod pa tshad med pa la 'jug go /sangs rgyas
158b3(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes 'byams klas pas thugs su chud pa tshad med pa la 'jug go / nyan thos kyi theg pas 'byung ba la mos pa tshad med pa la 'jug go/ sangs
158b4(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi lam shin tu bstan pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa tshad med pa la 'jug cing mos par byed do/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yang dag par
158b5(phal chen): bsgrub pa shin tu rdzogs par bya ba tshad med pa la 'jug go / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes zab mo'i sgor 'jug pa bstan pa tshad med pa la 'jug
158b6(phal chen): go |byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sbyor ba tshad med pa la 'jug go / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi theg pa chen po yang
158b7(phal chen): dag par bsgrub pa la 'jug pa shin tu bstan pa tshad med pa la 'jug go / de 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
159a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ni de ltar tshad med pa ste/ de ni bskal pa brgya phrag khrag khrig dang / bskal pa stong phrag khrag khrig
159a2(phal chen): dang | bskal pa brgya stong phrag khrag khrig nas de snyed kyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis kyang bgrang bar dka' ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyod
159a3(phal chen): yul de bdag gis lhun gyis grub par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rtog pa med pa dang / rnam par rtog pa med par yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes de de ltar shin tu
159a4(phal chen): brtags pa'i ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa dang ldan zhing / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mngon par brtson pa ni thabs dang shes rab kyis yongs su bsgoms
159a5(phal chen): pa'i lam gyi tshogs rgya chen po'i ye shes la mi g.yo ba'i tshul gyis yongs su gnas pa yin/ de skad cig gcig tu yang lam mngon par bsgrub pa las ldang bar
159a6(phal chen): mi byed de/ de 'gro yang de lta bu'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin/ 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / rmi lam dag tu yang sgrib pa med cing / spyod lam
159a7(phal chen): thams cad la gnas kyang rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'du shes yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin/ de'i sems bskyed pa re re la yang / byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu
159b1(phal chen): phyin pa bcu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yang dag par bsgrub pa yang dag par 'byung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
159b2(phal chen): po de snying rje chen po sngon du btang ba'i sems bskyed pa byung ba re re zhing yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi don
159b3(phal chen): du yongs su bsngo bas/ de la gang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su tshol zhing / sems can rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su gtong ba 'di ni de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
