159b4(phal chen): pa'o| |gang nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba thams cad rab tu zhi ba 'di ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /gang snying rje dang byams pa sngon du 'gro bas sems
159b5(phal chen): can thams cad la 'tshig pa med pa 'di ni de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /gang gong nas gong du dge ba'i chos tshol pas mi ngoms par dam 'cha' ba 'di ni de'i
159b6(phal chen): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /gang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon du bya ba'i phyir 'gyod pa med pa'i lam dang ldan pa 'di ni de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol
159b7(phal chen): tu phyin pa'o/ /gang rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa mngon du gyur pa 'di ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /gang ye shes tshad med pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di ni de'i
160a1(phal chen): thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /gang gong nas gong du ye shes la dmigs shing mngon par bsgrub pa 'di ni de'i smon lam gyi pha
160a2(phal chen): rol tu phyin pa'o/ /gang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad dang / bdud kyi tshogs thams cad kyis lam yongs su mi chod pa 'di ni de'i stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /gang
160a3(phal chen): chos thams cad la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa 'di ni de'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i sa
160a4(phal chen): ring du song ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po de dag de ltar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi yang yongs su rdzogs
160a5(phal chen): par 'gyur ro/ /byin gyi rlabs bcu dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mdor bsdu na byang chub kyi yan lag gi chos
160a6(phal chen): thams cad skad cig skad cig tu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas byang chub sems dpa' sems
160a7(phal chen): dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye|rgyal ba'i sras/ ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di
160b1(phal chen): la gnas pa 'ba' zhig gis byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad skad cig skad cig tu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ram/ 'on te ma yin gyi/ sa bcu po thams cad la'ang de bzhin
160b2(phal chen): du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pas/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ sa bcu po kun la yang byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi yan
160b3(phal chen): lag thams cad skad cig skad cig tu yongs su rdzogs par lta 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la ni de dag pas lhag par yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
160b4(phal chen): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'di ni nan tan du bya ba'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa
160b5(phal chen): yongs su gnon pa ste/ de ltar/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la ni smon lam thams cad la lhag par dmigs pas byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub
160b6(phal chen): kyi yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gnyis pa la sems kyi dri ma thams cad gsal bas/ gsum pa la smon lam rnam par 'phel ba dang / chos kyi snang ba
160b7(phal chen): thob pas/ bzhi pa la lam la 'jug pas/ lnga pa la 'jig rten gyi spyod pa'i rjes su 'brang bas/ drug pa la chos zab mo'i sgor 'jug pas byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad
161a1(phal chen): y ongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te| byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su sgrub pas byang chub kyi
161a2(phal chen): yan lag thams cad skad cig skad cig tu yongs su grub par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po nas bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa
161a3(phal chen): b dun pa'i bar du byang chub sems dpas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa'i sbyor ba'i yan lag de dag byang chub sems dpa' sa brgyad pa yan chad
161a4(phal chen): lhun gyis grub par yongs su 'grub bo/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / shin tu dag pa'i 'jig rten
161a5(phal chen): gyi khams dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar ni smon lam dang / thabs dang / shes rab dang / mngon par shes pa'i stobs dang / shugs
161a6(phal chen): chen po ma gtogs par 'dod 'dod brgal bar mi nus so/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'dres pa dang / yongs su dag pa'i bar yang smon
161a7(phal chen): lam dang / thabs dang / shes rab dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ye shes kyi stobs dang / shugs chen po ma gtogs par 'dod 'dod brgal bar mi nus so/ /byang
161b1(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas smras pa/ kye|rgyal ba'i sras/ 'o na ci byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun rnams la/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa nyon mongs
161b2(phal chen): pa'i spyod pas kun nas nyon mongs par yid ches par bya ba yin nam/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/ kye|rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po rab tu
161b3(phal chen): d ga' ba nyid bzung ba yan chad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa'i dbang gis nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa dang bral bar gar 'os pa'i tshul gyis
161b4(phal chen): lam mnyam pa nyid kyis yid ches par bya ste/ de tsam gyis sa bdun po rnams su nyon mongs pa'i spyod pa las yang dag par 'das zhes mi bya'o/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di lta ste/
161b5(phal chen): dper na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po ni lha rdzas kyi glang po rin po che la zhon zhing gling bzhi dag tu 'ang 'gro/ mi'i sdug bsngal dang / phongs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i
161b6(phal chen): nyes pa rnams kyang rab tu shes te/ 'on kyang nyes pa de dag gis gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /de tsam gyis mi'i lus las yongs su 'das pa'ang ma yin te/ nam mi'i lus spangs te
161b7(phal chen): tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes par gyur pa de'i tshe ni tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang na gnas shing / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyang mthong / de dag du'ang 'gro/ tshangs pa'i gzugs
162a1(phal chen): brnyan yang kun tu ston te/ mi zhes kyang mi brjod do/ /kye/ rgyal ba'i sras/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po bzung ba yan chad/ byang
162a2(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa la zhon zhing 'gro ba thams cad du rgyu ba'i tshe/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa rnams kyang rab tu shes te/ yang dag pa'i lam du
162a3(phal chen): zhugs pas kun nas nyon mongs pa de dag gis gos par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /'on kyang de tsam gyis sa bdun po rnams la/ nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa rnams las yang dag par 'das
162a4(phal chen): zhes ni mi bya ste/ nam sbyor ba can gyi spyod pa thams cad spangs te/ sa bdun po nas sa brgyad pa yongs su non par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa yongs su dag pa la
162a5(phal chen): zhon zhing 'gro ba thams cad du rgyu ba'i tshe/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa thams cad kyang rab tu shes te/ 'jig rten gyi bya ba kun las 'das pas nyes pa de dag gis kun nas
162a6(phal chen): nyon mongs par gyur ces mi bya'o/ /kye/ rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs
162a7(phal chen): pa mang po thams cad las kyang shin tu shas che bar 'da' ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni nyon mongs pa can zhes kyang mi
162b1(phal chen): bya| nyon mongs pa med pa zhes kyang mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa thams cad rgyu ba med pas nyon mongs pa can zhes mi bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mngon par
162b2(phal chen): 'dod cing bsam pa yongs su ma rdzogs pas nyon mongs pa med pa zhes kyang mi bya'o/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni lhag
162b3(phal chen): pa'i bsam pas yongs su dag pa'i lus kyi las dang ldan pa yin/ lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su dag pas ngag gi las dang ldan pa yin/ lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su dag pa'i
162b4(phal chen): yid kyi las dang ldan pa yin/ de ni 'di ltar mi dge ba'i las kyi lam de bzhin gshegs pas smad pa kun nas nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa de dag las thams cad kyi thams cad du yang dag
162b5(phal chen): par 'das pa yin/ gang 'di dag dge ba'i lam yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa de dag gi rjes su rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'brang ba yin/ gang yang byang chub
162b6(phal chen): sems dpa'i sa lnga pa la bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas ji ltar mngon par bsgrubs pa de dag thams cad kyang lhun gyis grub pa rab tu 'byung ngo / /de ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
162b7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams na slob dpon du bya ba yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa yan chad kyi
163a1(phal chen): b yang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par su yang de dang bsam pa'am sbyor bas mnyam pa med de| 'di ltar yang gang 'di dag bsam gtan rnams
163a2(phal chen): dang | ting nge 'dzin dag dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa dag dang / rnam par thar pa rnams kyang thams cad kyi thams cad du bsgom pa mngon par
163a3(phal chen): bsgrub pa'i sgo'i tshul gyis mngon du 'gyur te/ 'on kyang da dung byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa la ji ltar de bzhin du ni rnam par smin pas yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin no/ /de
163a4(phal chen): l tar byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa thams cad la shes rab dang thabs dang bsgom pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs
163a5(phal chen): par 'gyur te/ sngon pas kyang byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /de de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i tshe/ byang
163a6(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par dbye ba shin tu rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba la mnyam par gzhog ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin don shin tu bsam pa zhes bya
163a7(phal chen): ba dang / khyad par gyi blo gros zhes bya ba dang / rab tu phye ba'i don gyi mdzod ces bya ba dang / chos ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba dang / rtsa ba shin tu gnas pas
163b1(phal chen): bstan pa zhes bya ba dang / ye shes dang mngon par shes pa'i sgo zhes bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings yongs su sbyangs pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba
163b2(phal chen): dang | don sna tshogs kyi mdzod 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo zhes bya ba la yang mnyam par gzhog ste/ de dag la sogs pa mngon par shes pa dang / ye shes chen po sgo'i
163b3(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin sa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba la snyoms par 'jug go / de thabs dang shes rab kyis yongs su sbyang ba'i ting nge 'dzin de dag rab tu thob pa dang /
163b4(phal chen): snying rje dang snying brtse ba'i mthus nyan thos kyi sa las 'das pa yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das pa yin/ shes rab dang ye shes kyis rnam par dpyad pa'i sa mngon sum du gyur
163b5(phal chen): pa yin/ de ltar de byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i tshe/ lus kyi las tshad med pa mtshan ma dang bral bar rab tu 'byung ngo / /ngag gi las tshad med pa mtshan
163b6(phal chen): ma dang bral ba rab tu 'byung ngo / /yid kyi las tshad med pa mtshan ma dang bral ba shin tu rnam par sbyangs pa mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pas snang bar gyur pa tshad med pa rab tu 'byung ngo /
163b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas smras pa/ kye/ rgyal ba'i sras/ de lta go/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas pa'i tshe'ang byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang /
164a1(phal chen): ngag dang yid kyi las tshad med pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa las yang dag par 'das na ci rob/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying
164a2(phal chen): pos smras pa/ kye/ rgyal ba'i sras/ de lta'ang ma yin te/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la dmigs pa'i mthur zad kyi rang gi blos rnam par dpyad pa ni ma yin no/ /byang chub sems
164a3(phal chen): dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la ni rang gi blo'i spyod yul rnam par dpyod pa rab tu thob pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa yin/ kye/ rgyal ba'i sras/
164a4(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgyal po'i rigs su skyes pa'i rgyal po'i mtshan dang ldan pa ni btsas ma thag tu rgyal po'i byin gyis blon po'i tshogs thams cad zil gyis gnon gyi /
164a5(phal chen): rang gi blos rnam par dpyad pas ni ma yin no/ /nam nar son par gyur pa de'i tshe rang gi blo'i mthus blon po thams cad kyi byed pa'i tshul las shin tu 'das pa yin/ kye/ rgyal ba'i
164a6(phal chen): sras| de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'ang sems bskyed ma thag tu lhag pa'i bsam pa'i bdag nyid chen pos nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon te//
164a7(phal chen): rang gi blos rnam par brtags pas ni ma yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni rang gi yul gyi ye shes kyi stobs kyis shugs
164b1(phal chen): kyis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byed pa'i tshul las shin tu 'das pa yin no/ /kye/ rgyal ba'i sras/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems
164b2(phal chen): dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i tshe/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las zab cing dben la/ rgyu ba med pa dang ldan pa'ang rab tu thob pa yin te/ khyad par gong du btsal ba'i
164b3(phal chen): brtson 'grus kyang yongs su mi gtong ngo / /yongs su btsal ba'i brtson 'grus des kyang yang dag pa'i mthar gnas pa la'ang khyad par gong ma shin tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yang
164b4(phal chen): dag pa'i mtha' mngon du'ang mi byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas smras pa/ kye/ rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa gang yan chad du byang chub
164b5(phal chen): sems dpa'i 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug / byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/ kye/ rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa yan chad byang chub
164b6(phal chen): sems dpa'i 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems skad cig re re la yang 'gog pa
164b7(phal chen): la snyoms par 'jug ste/ 'gog pa mngon du byas zhes ni mi bya'o/ /de bas na de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las dang ldan zhes bya ba yin no/ /kye/
165a1(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pas kyang gnas la/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du yang mi
165a2(phal chen): byed pa ni ngo mtshar che'o/ /kye/ rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi la la zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i gru chen por zhugs te/ rgal ba'i thabs la mkhas shing rlung la mkhas
165a3(phal chen): pa dang / chu la mkhas pa ni/ rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i nyes pas mi gos so/ /kye/ rgyal ba'i sras/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ byang chub sems dpa'i
165a4(phal chen): sa bdun pa 'di la gnas shing pha rol tu phyin pa'i gru chen por zhugs pa yang yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pas kyang gnas la/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du yang mi byed do/ /de
165a5(phal chen): ltar de ye shes kyi stobs dang shugs thob pa ni ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes kyi stobs dang shugs kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i blo dang / thabs dang shes rab kyi stobs dang / shugs
165a6(phal chen): chen pos 'khor pa'i sgo yang ston la/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsam pa dang yang mi 'bral ba yin/ 'khor mang pos kun nas bskor bar snang yang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems kyi
165a7(phal chen): dben pa'ang rab tu thob pa yin/ khams gsum du skye ba yang smon lam gyi dbang gis mngon par sgrub la/ 'jig rten gyi nyes pas kyang mi gos pa yin/ zhi zhing rab tu zhi ba yin
165b1(phal chen): la| thabs kyis rab tu 'bar te/ de ltar 'bar yang tshig par mi 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la'ang yongs su 'jug la/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis las kyang phyir mi ldog
165b2(phal chen): pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mthil du yang phyin la/ bdud kyi yul na'ang 'dug par snang ba yin/ bdud kyi lam bzhi las kyang yang dag par 'das la bdud kyi yul dang spyod yul yang
165b3(phal chen): yang dag par ston pa yin/ mu stegs can gyi gnas thams cad na'ang 'dug par snang la/ sangs rgyas kyi mu stegs kyi gnas kyi bsam pa yang mi gtong ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi bya
165b4(phal chen): pa thams cad dang yang ldan par snang la/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul la yang yang dag par gzhol ba yin/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
165b5(phal chen): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po thams cad las lhag pa'i rgyan dang / lhab lhub shin tu
165b6(phal chen): bsgrub pa'ang rab tu thob la/ chos la dga' ba yid la bya ba'ang mi spong ba yin/ de ltar de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan par byang chub sems dpa'i sa ring du song ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang
165b7(phal chen): chub sems dpa' de'i lta ba rgya chen po dang / smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas mang po snang bar 'gyur te/ lta ba rgya chen po dang smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po
166a1(phal chen): dang | sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig
166a2(phal chen): mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag
166a3(phal chen): khrig brgya stong phrag mang po snang bar 'gyur ro/ /des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong nas/ bsam pa rgya chen pos rim gro
166a4(phal chen): byed do/ /bkur sti byed do/ /bsti stang byed do/ /mchod par byed do/ /na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad dag kyang 'bul zhing /
166a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang yongs su 'bul lo/ /dge 'dun gyi tshogs rnams la yang yang dag par mchod pa byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bla
166a6(phal chen): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la bsnyen bkur byed cing / de dag las rje sa dang / rim gros nan tan du
166a7(phal chen): chos bstan pa nyan cing len to/ /'dzin to/ /thos nas kyang ma nor ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / shes rab dang ye shes kyi snang bas rab tu brtson par byed cing nan tan gyis
166b1(phal chen): yongs su 'dzin to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bstan pa yang yang dag par 'dzin to/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi mngon par rtogs pa yongs su dri bas
166b2(phal chen): kyang mi 'phrogs pa yin te/ de sngon pas kyang sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i chos kyi bzod pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ba yin/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa ring du
166b3(phal chen): song ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sngon pas kyang bskal pa du ma dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang /
166b4(phal chen): bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig
166b5(phal chen): stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar shin tu dag cing yongs su byang bar gnas so/ /kye/ rgyal
166b6(phal chen): ba'i sras/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gser gyi sa le spram de nyid rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu spras pa ni sngon pas kyang rgyan gyi rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang /
166b7(phal chen): ches 'od gsal zhing dang bar 'gyur ro/ /kye/ rgyal ba'i sras/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa ring du song ba 'di la gnas pa'i
167a1(phal chen): thabs dang shes rab kyis bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sngon pas kyang ches shin tu byang ba dang / ches 'od gsal zhing dang bar 'gyur ro/ /
167a2(phal chen): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang mi 'phrogs pa yin/ kye/ rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma'i 'od ni skar ma'i tshogs dang / zla ba'i 'od
167a3(phal chen): kyis mi 'phrogs shing 'dzam bu'i gling na rlan gyi bag yod pa thams cad kyang shin tu skam par byed do/ /kye/ rgyal ba'i sras/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa ring du
167a4(phal chen): song ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sngon pas kyang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa yin/ phyin ci log
167a5(phal chen): bzhi dang ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa'i rlan gyi rnam pa thams cad kyang yongs su skem mo/ /de'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu las thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i shas che ba yin te/
167a6(phal chen): lhag ma rnams kyang ci tshul ci nus su mi sgrub pa ma yin no/ /kye/ rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ring du song ba zhes bya
167a7(phal chen): ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa mdor bstan pa'o/ /de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phal cher lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur du 'gyur te/
167b1(phal chen): sems can rnams la mngon par rtogs pa'i ye shes yang dag par bstan pa la mkhas shing mthu med pa ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su dri bas
167b2(phal chen): mi zad pa yin/ sems can skyon med par shin tu bslab par bya ba la'ang mkhas pa yin te/ sbyin pa'am/ ngag snyan pa'am/ don bsgrub pa'am/ don mthun pas dge ba'i
167b3(phal chen): rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang rung ste/ de thams cad ji ltar na sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur/ gtso bor 'gyur/ thu bor 'gyur/ phul du 'gyur/ dam par 'gyur/ bla na
167b4(phal chen): med par 'gyur/ 'dren par 'gyur/ yongs su 'dren par 'gyur ba nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rten pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam ste/ sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang / chos
167b5(phal chen): yid la bya ba dang / dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la
167b6(phal chen): bya ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang / stobs yid la bya ba dang / mi 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba dang / rnam pa'i
167b7(phal chen): mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin te/ de 'dod na skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu ting nge 'dzin bye ba
168a1(phal chen): khrag khrig brgya stong rab tu thob cing de dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mthong ba dang / de dag gi byin
168a2(phal chen): gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snang bar bya ba dang / sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su smin par
168a3(phal chen): bya ba dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du gnas par bya ba dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la rab tu 'jug pa dang /
168a4(phal chen): chos kyi sgo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rnam par 'byed pa dang / lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su bstan pa dang / lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor
168a5(phal chen): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam pa de lta bu rtsom mo/ /de yan chad byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi mthu can rnams smon
168a6(phal chen): lam gyi khyad par gyis rnam par 'phrul te/ de dag gi lus sam/ 'od dam/ rdzu 'phrul lam/ mig gam/ spyod yul lam/ dbyangs sam/ spyod pa'am/ rgyan tam/
168a7(phal chen): byin gyi rlabs sam/ mos pa'am/ mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal
168b1(phal chen): pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma'i bar gyis kyang bgrang bar dka'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos sa'i don 'di nyid
168b2(phal chen): yang brtag par bya ba dang / bstan par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /ye shes zab mo don dam tshig gis rjes snyegs shing / /sa drug rtogs pa'i
168b3(phal chen): yid ldan bdag nyid mnyam bzhag pa/ /shes rab thabs gnyis zung du 'brel pa mngon par sgrub/ /mkhas pas sa bdun spyod pa dam pa yongs su gnon/ /stong pa mtshan med mi
168b4(phal chen): smon snying rje byams dang ldan/ /chos nyid mnyam pa'i rjes 'gro sangs rgyas mchod par byed/ /shes pas shes byas bsod nams stobs kyis mi ngoms pas/ /de phyir mkhas
168b5(phal chen): pa bdun pa'i sa phyogs yongs su gnon/ /khams gsum mngon par sgrub byed shin tu dben pa thob/ /nyon mongs stobs rnams zhi zhing 'gro ba zhi la mos/ /mig yor sgyu ma
168b6(phal chen): rmi lam mi gnyis chos spyod kyang / /snying rje las spyod ston pa mkhas pas bdun pa gnon/ /nam mkha'i bsam pas zhing rnams yongs spyod rnam mi rtog /rgyal ba'i mtshan
168b7(phal chen): dang ldan zhing mi g.yo chos dang ldan/ /brjod pa'i dbyangs bral 'gro ba dgar bya don du gnyer/ /skad cig sems kyi rgyal bas kun mkhyen yang dag gzhol/ /chos rnams 'di
169a1(phal chen): dag spyad pas snang ba thob gyur pas/ /'gro ba'i don 'dod sa mchog yongs su mnan ces bya/ /de dag sa 'dir gnas shing mtha' yas sems can spyod/ /
169a2(phal chen): bde gshegs tshad med las mkhyen rnam par spyod pa byed/ /zhing dang bskal pa chos grangs sna tshogs du ma dang / /mos dang bsam pa sems dang spyod pa sna tshogs dang / /
169a3(phal chen): theg pa gsum po bstan pa tshad med yang dag 'jug /bdag gis sems can de dag yongs su smin bya zhes/ /de dag de ltar rnam phye shes rab lam ldan pa/ /spyod lam
169a4(phal chen): bzhi por mngon par brtson zhing thabs dang ldan/ /sems kyi skad cig kun la byang chub yon tan sgrub/ /pha rol phyin pa bcur 'jug yongs su rdzogs par byed/ /sems skyes
169a5(phal chen): 'gro la yongs bsngo de ni sbyin pa'o/ /tshul khrims nyon mongs zhi ba bzod pa mi 'tshig pa/ /brtson 'grus de nas khyad par gong du rtsom pa ste/ /lam las mi sgul de ni legs
169a6(phal chen): ldan bsam gtan no/ /mi skye'i bzod pa rdul med mkhas pa'i shes rab mchog /da dung mngon 'dod bsngo ba de yi smon lam ste/ /mi thub stobs yin shin tu rtogs pa ye shes
169a7(phal chen): so| |de ltar byang chub yon tan thams cad skad cig ldan/ /dang por dmigs pas yon tan yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ /gnyis la dri ma bsal phyir gsum la bgegs
169b1(phal chen): bsal bas/ /bzhi la lam gyis lnga la mnyam pa nyid kyis te/ /mi skye'i snang bas mkhas pa'i drug pa rnam par 'phel/ /bdun pa 'dir phyin yon tan mtha' dag kun rdzogs par/ /
169b2(phal chen): smon lam du ma sna tshogs mngon par sgrub pa byed/ /ci phyir zhe na ye shes spyod pa 'dir grub pa/ /de ni brgyad pa yan chad kun tu rnam dag 'gyur/ /'da' dka' phyin dka' ye shes
169b3(phal chen): mang po'i las kyis 'grub/ /zhing gnyis bar mtshams ji ltar yongs su brgal dka' bzhin/ /bdun la spyod pa rgyal po chags med ji bzhin te/ /lam la gnas pa yin gyi
169b4(phal chen): thams cad brtan ma 'das/ /brgyad pa'i ye shes sa dang gang tshe ldan gyur pa/ /de tshe sems kyi yul 'das ye shes las la gnas/ /tshangs pa 'gro ba lta yang mi yi bdag nyid min//
169b5(phal chen): de bzhin mkhas pa pad mo bzhin du mi chags spyod/ /'di la gnas pa nyon mongs sna tshogs rab tu 'da'/ /de dag nyon mongs spyod med byang ba'ang thob pa min/ /lam la gnas kyang
169b6(phal chen): de 'dra'i nyon mongs spyod med min/ /rgyal ba'i ye shes mngon 'dod de bas zad pa min/ /'jig rten bzo dang las gnas rnam pa sna tshogs dag /mkhas pas gtsug lag rgyus la gnas
169b7(phal chen): te shes byas dang / /bsam gtan mngon shes stobs sgom ldan par gyur pa rnams/ /de bas gsal 'gyur ting 'dzin sna tshogs mngon par sgrub/ /nyan thos rang rgyal spyod las yongs
170a1(phal chen): su 'das pa ste/ /bdun pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod la mkhas pa gnas/ /sngon chad bsam pas yin gyi 'di la ye shes kyis/ /nar son mthu
170a2(phal chen): dang ldan pa'i rgyal po'i bu bzhin no/ /shin tu zab dang ldan pas gong du rtsom byed de/ /'gog pa'i sems dang ldan yang mngon par mi byed do/ /ji ltar rgya mtshor phyin cing
170a3(phal chen): gru chen zhugs gyur pa/ /chu tshul thams cad mngon gyur gru la skyon mi gyur/ /de dag sngon pas thabs dang shes rab mchog dang ldan/ /shes dka' 'gro ba kun tu shes
170a4(phal chen): spyod yon tan mang / /sangs rgyas bye ba mang du bsam pa dag pas mchod/ /gser sbram de nyid rin chen mang pos smras pa bzhin/ /'di la gnas pa'i mkhas pa'i shes rab
170a5(phal chen): mchog gi 'ong / /sred pa'i chu rnams ji ltar nyi bzhin yongs su skem/ /sa mchog 'di la gnas pa dbang sgyur rgyal por 'gyur/ /ye shes dam pa'i 'bras bu ston la mthu yod
170a6(phal chen): mkhas/ /'dod na brtson 'grus dam pa'i stobs dang ldan gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshang bdag /phyogs rnams kun tu shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas mthong /
170a7(phal chen): yan chad smon lam yon tan mchog can tshad kyang med/ /'di ni sa mchog bdun pa ste/ /rang rgyal dbang la spyod pa dang / /'jig rten kun gyis shes par dka'/ /thabs dang
170b1(phal chen): shes rab sbyor ba'o/ /ring du song ba zhes bya ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa'o// //bam po lnga bcu pa/ mkhas pa'i spyod pa de 'dra dam pa thos nas/ /lha yi
170b2(phal chen): tshogs dang lha yi dbang po kun dga'/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'gro phan brtson pa mang po/ /bde bar gshegs dang rgyal sras rnams la mchod byed/ /me tog phreng ba rgyal mtshan
170b3(phal chen): ba dan yid 'ong / /spos dang phye ma rin chen na bza' rgyan pa/ /dbyig gis spras pa'i gdugs rab khrag khrig du ma/ /phreng ba'i sprin gyi dam pa'i char yang mngon 'bebs/ /lha yi
170b4(phal chen): bu mos yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs/ /du ma'i sil snyan gar gyi mchog dang ldan byas/ /bde bar gshegs dang rgyal sras mchod pa'i don du/ /thub pa'i yon tan rmad du byung brjod
170b5(phal chen): byed| |thams cad gzigs pa rkang gnyis khyu mchog gtso bo/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul 'gro la phan phyir ston mdzad/ /dbyangs sprin yid du 'ong ba rab tu 'byung ba'i/ /rnga dang sil snyan
170b6(phal chen): sna tshogs rnams la 'di byung / /skra yi rtse la bde gshegs brgya phrag stong snyed/ /gang+gA khrag khrig bye ba'i rdul bas de mang / /zhing mchog dam pa mnyam pa med pa dag na/ /khyu mchog
170b7(phal chen): rnams ni rdul bral chos rnams ston mdzad/ /spu gcig rtse la 'byams klas dam pa'i zhing mang / /gling bzhi du ma rgya mtsho mtsho chen kun nas/ /khor yug bye ba de bzhin ri rab
171a1(phal chen): thams cad/ /so so'i tshul dang ldan par kun kyang snang gyur/ /skra yi rtse mo de la 'gro rgyud drug po/ /yi dwags byol song mi dang sems dmyal lha
171a2(phal chen): dang | |gnod sbyin srin po klu dang lha min mang po/ /sna tshogs las kyi yul la kun kyang spyod byed/ /rdul bral kun gyi zhing gi spyod yul kun tu/ /'khor lo dam pa'i mchog
171a3(phal chen): kyang de tshe 'khor gyur/ /'gro ba'i 'du shes sems dang de bzhin spyod pa/ /bde gshegs gsung gi dam pa kun kyang bstan byas/ /sems can lus la bde gshegs zhing
171a4(phal chen): mar sna tshogs/ /zhing la sems can rmad snyed lus kyang de bzhin/ /lha dang mi yi lam rgyud de bzhin sna tshogs/ /mkhyen nas bde bar gshegs pa chos rnams kun ston//
171a5(phal chen): shin tu yangs pa'i zhing la 'du shes phrar gyur/ /rdul gyi mtshan ma dag la 'du shes yangs gyur/ /de la sogs pa bde bar gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul/ /'jig rten kun gyis
171a6(phal chen): brjod kyang zad par mi 'gyur/ /che ba nyid dbyangs de skad du/ /snyan pa'i dbyangs su grag gyur nas/ /'khor rnams rab tu dga' zhing zhi/ /gsung ba'i mchog la lta zhing
171a7(phal chen): gnas/ /'khor rnams zhi bar shes gyur nas/ /rnam grol zla bas yang smras pa/ /sa brgyad pa yi rnam pa dang / /de lta 'jug pa bstan par mdzod/ /byang chub sems
171b1(phal chen): dang 'a rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa la rnam par dbye ba shin tu byas pa
171b2(phal chen): thabs dang shes rab kyis lam shin tu sbyangs pa/ tshogs shin tu bsags pa/ smon lam chen po shin tu btab pa'i stobs dang shugs can de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis
171b3(phal chen): byin tu brlabs pa rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang shugs thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba dang
171b4(phal chen): ldan pa/ bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su sbyang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs kyis mngon par 'phags pa/ snying rje dang snying brtse
171b5(phal chen): ba chen pos sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi lam tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba de chos thams cad thog ma nas ma byung
171b6(phal chen): ba nyid la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug go / ma skyes pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa dang / thug pa med pa dang / mi rgyu ba dang / mi ldog
171b7(phal chen): pa dang / dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin dang / thog ma dang / tha ma dang / dbus mnyam pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid kyis rnam par mi rtog pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la'ang
172a1(phal chen): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug ste/ des rnam pa thams cad du sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / 'du shes
172a2(phal chen): dang bral zhing thogs pa med la nam mkha' dang 'dra zhing / nam mkha'i rang bzhin du khong du chud pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ces bya'o/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag
172a3(phal chen): de la de lta bu'i bzod pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba thob ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i gnas zab mo shes par dka'
172a4(phal chen): ba tha mi dad pa mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba/ 'du shes kyi bgegs thams cad las phyir log pa tshad med pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa dben
172a5(phal chen): pa thams cad mngon du gyur pa shin tu thob pa yin/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di lta ste/ dper na/ dge slong rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la dbang thob pa /
172a6(phal chen): mthar gyis 'gog pa'i bar du mnyam par bzhag pa ni rgyu ba dang / sems pa dang / g.yo ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang / 'du shes thams cad dang bral ba yin/ kye| rgyal ba'i
172a7(phal chen): sras dag / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa mi g.yo ba 'di thob ma thag tu ched du bya ba thams cad dang bral te/ lhun gyis grub pa'i chos
172b1(phal chen): nyid thob cing lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi rtsol ba thams cad dang bral te/ shin tu dben pa'i chos nyid la gnas pa yin/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi la la
172b2(phal chen): zhig gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du bdag chu klung chen pos khyer ba snyam byed la/ de de nas ci phyin du 'bad cing rtsol ba chen po rtsom rtsom pa las de 'bad cing rtsol ba chen po de nyid
172b3(phal chen): kyis sad par gyur na/ de sad ma thag tu 'bad cing rtsol ba thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i
172b4(phal chen): chu klung chen po bzhir sems can mang po dod bar shes nas 'bad cing rtsol ba yongs su rtsom mo/ /de brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba 'di thob
172b5(phal chen): ma thag tu ched du bya ba thams cad bral ba yin te/ de'i gnyis po rgyu ba 'am mtshan ma rgyu ba dag kyang thams cad kyi thams cad du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di
172b6(phal chen): lta ste/ dper na/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes shing gnas pa ni/ 'dod pa la spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su mi rgyu ba yin te/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /de bzhin du
172b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa'i yongs su rgyu ba rnams thams cad kyi thams cad du
173a1(phal chen): yongs su mi rgyu ba yin te/ de sangs rgyas la yongs su rgyu ba'am/ byang chub la yongs su rgyu ba'am/ byang chub sems dpa' la yongs su rgyu ba'am/ rang
173a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas la yongs su rgyu ba'am/ nyan thos la yongs su rgyu ba'am/ mya ngan las 'das pa la yongs su rgyu ba'am/ dgra bcom pa la yongs su rgyu ba'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba la
173a3(phal chen): yongs su rgyu ba'am/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba la yongs su rgyu ba'am/ rgyun du zhugs pa la yongs su rgyu ba yang yongs su mi rgyun 'jig rten pa'i yongs su rgyu ba yongs su mi rgyu ba
173a4(phal chen): lta ci smos/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /de ltar mi g.yo ba'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs dang shugs la gnas pa de'i chos kyi sgo'i rgyud de la
173a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad de/ de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ legs so/ /legs so/ /
173a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos rjes su rtogs par bya ba la 'di ni don dam pa'i bzod pa yang yin na/ 'on kyang / rigs kyi bu/ nged kyi stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
173a7(phal chen): phun sum tshogs pa de khyod la med kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos phun sum tshogs pa de dag yongs su btsal ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsoms shig /bzod pa'i sgo 'di nyid kyang ma gtong zhig/
173b1(phal chen): rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ khyod kyis de ltar zhi ba'i rnam par thar pa thob kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo 'di dag zhi ba ma yin/ rab tu zhi ba ma yin te/ nyon mongs pa sna tshogs yongs su rgyu
173b2(phal chen): bar gyur na/ de ltar rnam par rtog pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su mnar ba la soms/ 'di ltar yang / rigs kyi bu khyod kyi sngon gyi smon lam sems can gyi don yongs su
173b3(phal chen): 'grub par bya bar btab pa dang / ye shes kyi sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dran par gyis shig /'di ltar yang / rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
173b4(phal chen): byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid 'di ni de bzhin du 'dug pa ste/ 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams nyi tshe brjod par bya ba ma yin te/ nyan
173b5(phal chen): thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos nyid 'di 'thob bo/ /rigs kyi bu khyod nged kyi lus tshad med pa dang / ye shes tshad med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
173b6(phal chen): tshad med pa dang / ye shes mngon par bsgrubs pa tshad med pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor tshad med pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa tshad med pa la ltos/ khyod kyis
173b7(phal chen): kyang de bzhin tu mngon par bsgrub par bya dgos so/ /'di ltar/ rigs kyi bu/ gang de ltar chos thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa de ni khyod kyi snang ba gcig pur zad de/ rigs kyi
174a1(phal chen): bu| de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos snang ba ni 'di 'dra ste/ yongs su mtha' yas par song la yongs su mtha' yas par bsgrubs pa ste/ de snyed
174a2(phal chen): kyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis kyang bgrang bar dka'/ de dag thob par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrub pa skyed cig /'di ltar yang / rigs kyi bu/ phyogs bcu'i zhing
174a3(phal chen): tshad med pa dang / sems can tshad med pa dang / chos rnam par phye ba tshad med pa la ltos te/ de dag thams cad ma nor bar bgrang bar gyis shig /ces te/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras
174a4(phal chen): d ag| de ltar de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo de dag la sogs pa gang gis byang
174a5(phal chen): chub sems dpa' ye shes rnam par phye ba'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa'i las tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ gzhal du med pa dag nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/ /kye| rgyal
174a6(phal chen): ba'i sras dag / khyed kyis yid ches pa dang / khong du chud par bya na/ gal te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgor gzhug
174a7(phal chen): pa mdzad du zin na/ de nyid de'i mtha' las brgal ba'i mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyis dgos pa'ang rgyun bcad par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar sangs rgyas
174b1(phal chen): b com ldan 'das de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' de la ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i las gang gis skad cig gcig tu mngon par bsgrubs pas kyang thog ma sems bskyed pa
174b2(phal chen): phyin chad sa bdun la zhugs shing rjes su song ba yongs su rtsom pa'i bar snga ma de dag gis brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro / stong gi cha dang / khrag khrig gi cha dang / khrag khrig
174b3(phal chen): brgya'i cha dang / khrag khrig stong gi cha dang / khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang /
174b4(phal chen): dpe dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ bsgrun pa tsam gyi bar du'ang mi chog pa de snyed du tshad med pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa las nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/ /kye| rgyal
174b5(phal chen): ba'i sras dag / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon chad lus gcig gis mngon par bsgrub pas spyod pa mngon par bsgrub par gyur gyi/ 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni
174b6(phal chen): lus rnam par phye ba tshad med pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i mthu yongs su sdud de/ dbyangs mngon par bsgrub pa tshad med pa dang / ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa tshad med
174b7(phal chen): pa dang / skye ba mngon par bsgrub pa tshad med pa dang / zhing yongs su sbyong ba tshad med pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba tshad med pa dang / sangs rgyas mchod cing bsnyen bkur
175a1(phal chen): ba tshad med pa dang / chos kyi tshul khong du chud pa tshad med pa dang / mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i stobs dang shugs tshad med pa dang / 'khor
175a2(phal chen): gyi dkyil 'khor tshad med pa rnam par phye ba dang / tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi mthu mi sgul ba'i
175a3(phal chen): tshul gyis yang dag par sgrub bo/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba'i gru ni rgya mtsho chen por ma phyin gyi bar du ched du bskyod cing 'gro
175a4(phal chen): bar bya ba yin te/ rgya mtsho chen po la zhen ma thag tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis bsu bas ched du bskyod mi dgos pa yin/ des rgya mtsho chen po la nyin gcig gis ci chod pa de ni
175a5(phal chen): sngon du bskyod cing 'gro bas lo brgyar yang de ltar tshad med par phyin par mi nus so/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge pa'i
175a6(phal chen): r tsa ba chen po'i tshogs yang dag par bsags pa theg pa chen po'i grur zhugs pa yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgya mtshor phyin nas yud tsam gcig tu lhun gyis grub pa'i ye
175a7(phal chen): shes kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ji tsam yang dag par gnon pa de ni sngon gyi ched du bya ba'i las kyis bskal pa brgya stong du yang yang dag par non par mi nus so/ /kye|
175b1(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras dag / de la byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes kyis bsgrub pa lhun gyis grub pa la shin tu
175b2(phal chen): zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i blos thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rnam par dpyod cing 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba yang rnam par spyod do/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'jig
175b3(phal chen): pa'ang rnam par spyod do/ /de 'jig rten ji ltar 'byung ba de yang rab tu shes so/ /'jig rten ji ltar 'jig pa de yang rab tu shes so/ /las gang bsags pas 'jig rten 'byung bar
175b4(phal chen): 'gyur ba de yang rab tu shes so/ /las gang bsags pas 'jig rten 'jig par 'gyur ba de yang rab tu shes so/ /dus ji srid kyis 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur ba de yang rab tu shes
175b5(phal chen): so| |dus ji srid kyis 'jig rten 'jig par 'gyur ba de yang rab tu shes so/ /dus ji srid du 'jig rten byung nas gnas pa de yang rab tu shes so/ /dus ji srid du 'jig rten zhig
175b6(phal chen): par gnas pa de yang rab tu shes so/ /de sa'i khams shin tu chung ba yang rab tu shes so/ /sa'i khams shin tu che ba yang rab tu shes so/ /sa'i khams tshad med pa'ang rab tu shes
175b7(phal chen): so| |sa'i khams rnam par phye ba yang rab tu shes so/ /de chu'i khams shin tu chung ba'ang rab tu shes so/ /chu'i khams shin tu che ba'ang rab tu shes so/ /chu'i khams tshad med pa
176a1(phal chen): yang rab tu shes so/ /chu'i khams rnam par phye ba yang rab tu shes so/ /de me'i khams shin tu chung ba'ang rab tu shes so/ /me'i khams
176a2(phal chen): shin tu che ba'ang rab tu shes so/ /me'i khams tshad med pa yang rab tu shes so/ /me'i khams rnam par phye ba yang rab tu shes so/ /de rlung khams shin tu chung ba'ang rab tu
176a3(phal chen): shes so/ /rlung gi khams shin tu che ba'ang rab tu shes so/ /rlung gi khams tshad med pa yang rab tu shes so/ /rlung gi khams rnam par phye ba yang rab tu shes so/ /
176a4(phal chen): de shin tu phra ba'i rdul phra ba nyid kyang rab tu shes so/ /shin tu phra ba'i rdul yangs pa yang rab tu shes so/ /shin tu phra ba'i rdul tshad med pa yang rab tu shes so/ /shin tu
176a5(phal chen): phra ba'i rdul rnam par phye ba yang rab tu shes so/ /'jig rten gyi khams gang na sa'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /chu'i khams kyi rdul
176a6(phal chen): shin tu phra ba ji snyed pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /me'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /rlung gi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed pa
176a7(phal chen): de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /rin po che rnam par phye ba ji snyed pa yod pa dang / rin po che'i rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /sems can gyi lus
176b1(phal chen): la rdul ji snyed yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /zhing gi lhun la rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /de sems can gyi lus che ba dang / lus yangs pa
176b2(phal chen): dang | lus phra ba dang / lus rnam par phye ba'ang rab tu shes so/ /sems can dmyal ba pa'i lus rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed kyis byung ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas pa'i
176b3(phal chen): lus rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed kyis byung ba dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i lus rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed kyis byung ba dang / lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten pa'i lus rdul shin tu phra
176b4(phal chen): ba ji snyed kyis byung ba dang / lha'i 'jig rten pa'i lus rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed kyis byung ba dang / mi'i ris su gtogs pa'i lus rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed kyis byung ba de dag kyang
176b5(phal chen): rab tu shes so/ /de de ltar rdul shin tu phra ba rab tu dbye ba la zhugs pa ni 'dod pa'i khams 'jig pa'ang rab tu shes so/ /gzugs kyi khams 'jig pa yang rab tu shes
176b6(phal chen): so| |gzugs med pa'i khams 'jig pa yang rab tu shes so/ /'dod pa'i khams 'du ba yang rab tu shes so/ /gzugs kyi khams 'du ba yang rab tu shes so/ /gzugs
176b7(phal chen): med pa'i khams 'du ba yang rab tu shes so/ /'dod pa'i khams chung ba yang rab tu shes so/ /'dod pa'i khams che ba'ang rab tu shes so/ /'dod pa'i khams tshad med
177a1(phal chen): pa'ang rab tu shes so/ /'dod pa'i khams rnam par phye ba'ang rab tu shes so/ /gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams chung ba'ang
177a2(phal chen): rab tu shes so/ /che ba'ang rab tu shes so/ /tshad med pa'ang rab tu shes so/ /rnam par phye ba yang rab tu shes so/ /de khams gsum rnam par spyad pa'i ye shes khong
177a3(phal chen): du chud pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba dang ldan la/ sems can gyi lus rab tu dbye ba la mkhas shing zhing gi lhun rnam par dbye ba'i ye shes la mkhas pas skye
177a4(phal chen): ba'i skye mched thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa la blo shin tu gtong ste/ de ni sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can rnams kyi skye ba dang / yongs su
177a5(phal chen): grub pa ci 'dra ba de lta bur rang gi lus byin gyis rlob bo/ /de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par bkang zhing sems can gyi mos pa ji lta ba de bzhin du rang
177a6(phal chen): gi lus mig yor lta bu'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang bas skye bar bya ba'i phyir mngon par sgrub ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis sam/ gsum mam/
177a7(phal chen): bzhi'am/ lnga'am/ bcu'am/ nyi shu'am/ sum cu'am/ bzhi bcu'am/ lnga bcu dag nas brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag rgyas par bkang ste/ sems can
177b1(phal chen): gyi mos pa ji lta ba de bzhin du rang gi lus mig yor lta bu'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang bas skye bar bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrub bo/ /de de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi
177b2(phal chen): zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag tu yang snang bar phyin pa yin/ de sems can rnams kyi
177b3(phal chen): lus rnam par phye ba dang / mos pa dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du zhing de dang de dag dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang de dag tu de lta de ltar rang gi lus ston te/ de dge sbyong gi
177b4(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du dge sbyong gi kha dog dang gzugs ston to/ /bram ze'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du bram ze'i kha dog dang gzugs ston to/ /rgyal rigs kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du
177b5(phal chen): rgyal rigs kyi kha dog dang gzugs ston to/ /rje'u rigs kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du rje'u rigs kyi kha dog dang gzugs ston to/ /khyim bdag gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du khyim bdag gi kha dog
177b6(phal chen): dang gzugs ston to/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du rgyal po chen po bzhi'i kha dog dang gzugs ston to/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du sum cu
177b7(phal chen): rtsa gsum pa'i kha dog dang gzugs ston to/ /de bzhin du mtshe ma'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / dga' ldan gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / 'phrul dga'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang /
178a1(phal chen): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / tshangs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas/ 'og min gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi bar du de lta de lta
178a2(phal chen): bu'i kha dog dang gzugs ston to/ /de nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la nyan thos kyi lus dang kha dog dang gzugs ston to/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi 'dul ba'i sems
178a3(phal chen): can rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyi lus dang kha dog dang gzugs ston to/ /byang chub sems dpas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang kha dog dang /
178a4(phal chen): gzugs ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang kha dog dang sku gzugs ston to/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar sangs
178a5(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing rjod du med pa ji snyed pa de dag gi sems can rnams kyi mos pa rab tu mang ba de dag thams cad du rang gi lus de lta de ltar rnam par phye ba yongs su ston to/ /de lus kyi rnam
178a6(phal chen): par rtog pa dang / 'du shes thams cad dang rnam par bral ba ste/ lus mnyam pa nyid thob pas sems can gyi lus rab tu shes so/ /zhing gi lus dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa'i
178a7(phal chen): lus dang / nyan thos kyi lus dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / ye shes kyi lus dang / chos kyi lus dang /
178b1(phal chen): nam mkha'i lus kyang rab tu shes so/ /des sems can rnams kyi sems dang bsam pa mngon par bsgrub pa yongs su shes pas 'dod na/ sems can gyi lus nam mkha'i lus su byin
178b2(phal chen): gyis rlob bo/ /de bzhin du zhing gi lus dang / las rnam par smin pa'i lus dang / nyan thos kyi lus dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / de bzhin
178b3(phal chen): gshegs pa'i sku dang / ye shes kyi lus dang / chos kyi lus kyang nam mkha'i lus su byin gyis rlob bo/ /des sems can rnams kyi sems dang bsam pa mngon par bsgrub pa yongs su
178b4(phal chen): shes pas sems can gyi lus rang gi lus su byin gyis rlob bo/ /de bzhin du zhing gi lus dang / las rnam par smin pa'i lus dang / nyan thos kyi lus dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus
178b5(phal chen): dang | byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / ye shes kyi lus dang / chos kyi lus dang / nam mkha'i lus kyang rang gi lus su byin gyis rlob bo/ /des sems
178b6(phal chen): can rnams kyi sems dang bsam pa mngon par bsgrub pa yongs su shes pas/ lus gang dang gang lus gang dang gang du 'dod pa de dang de'i lus su lus de dang de dag byin gyis rlob bo/ /de
178b7(phal chen): sems can gyi lus kyi lus rnams kyi las kyi lus kyang rab tu shes so/ /rnam par smin pa'i lus dang / nyon mongs pa'i lus dang / gzugs kyi lus dang / gzugs med pa'i lus
179a1(phal chen): kyang rab tu shes so/ /zhing gi lus rnams kyis chung ba'i rang bzhin yang rab tu shes so/ /che ba dang / tshad med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
179a2(phal chen): rnam par dag pa dang / snrel zhi dang / spyi'u tshugs dang / gzhi mnyam par yang dag par 'jug pa dang / phyogs kyi dra ba rnam par dbye ba yang rab tu shes so/ /las rnam par
179a3(phal chen): smin pa'i lus rnam par phyi ba'i brda yang rab tu shes so/ /de bzhin du nyan thos kyi lus rnam par phye ba'i brda dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus rnam par phye ba'i brda dang / byang chub
179a4(phal chen): sems dpa'i lus rnam par phye ba'i brda yang rab tu shes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams kyi mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i lus kyang rab tu shes so/ /smon lam gyi lus
179a5(phal chen): dang | sprul pa'i lus dang / byin gyi rlabs kyi lus dang / gzugs dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan gyi lus dang / 'od kyi lus dang / yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus dang /
179a6(phal chen): bsod nams kyi lus dang / ye shes kyi lus dang / chos kyi lus kyang rab tu shes so/ /ye shes kyi lus rnams kyi shin tu rnam par dpyad pa nyid kyang rab tu shes so/ /yang dag
179a7(phal chen): pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtags pa yang rab tu shes so/ /'bras bu'i sbyor bas yang dag par bzung ba dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam par phye ba dang / theg
179b1(phal chen): pa gsum rnam par dgod pa dang / thun mong dang / thun mong ma yin pa dang / 'byung ba dang / ma 'byung ba dang / slob pa dang / mi slob pa yang rab tu shes so/ /chos kyi lus rnams kyi mnyam
179b2(phal chen): pa nyid kyang rab tu shes so/ /'khrul pa med pa yang rab tu shes so/ /gnas dang / brda dang / kun rdzob rnam par dgod pa dang / sems can dang sems can ma yin pa'i chos rnam par
179b3(phal chen): dgod pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / 'phags pa'i dge 'dun rnam par dgod pa yang rab tu shes so/ /nam mkha'i lus rnams kyi tshad med pa nyid kyang rab tu shes so/ /thams
179b4(phal chen): cad kyi rjes su song ba dang / lus med pa dang / nor ba med cing / mtha' yas pa dang / gzugs mang po mngon zhing gsal bar byed pa yang rab tu shes so/ /des lus kyi ye shes mngon
179b5(phal chen): par bsgrub pa de lta bu rab tu thob pas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par tshe byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir tshe'i dbang rab tu 'thob bo/ /ting nge 'dzin shin tu rtogs pa'i ye shes
179b6(phal chen): la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir sems kyi dbang rab tu 'thob bo/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyan du mas rab tu brgyan cing shin tu klubs pa'i byin gyi rlabs yang dag par bstan pa'i
179b7(phal chen): phyir yo byad kyi dbang rab tu 'thob bo/ /las kyi rnam par smin pa'i byin gyi rlabs dus bzhin du ma nor bar bstan pa'i phyir las kyi dbang rab tu 'thob bo/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams
180a1(phal chen): cad du skye ba yongs su bstan pa'i phyir skye ba'i dbang rab tu 'thob bo/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / dus gang du ci dga' bar mngon par 'tshang rgya ba
180a2(phal chen): yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir smon lam gyi stobs rab tu 'thob bo/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyis rab tu gang ba yang dge bar bstan pa'i phyir mos pa'i
180a3(phal chen): dbang rab tu 'thob bo/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul ba yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs rab tu 'thob bo/ /de bzhin
180a4(phal chen): gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang / mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir
180a5(phal chen): ye shes kyi dbang rab tu 'thob bo/ /mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos kyi sgo snang ba yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir chos kyi dbang rab tu 'thob bo/ /de byang chub sems dpa'i dbang
180a6(phal chen): bcu po 'di dag thob ma thag nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yin/ tshad med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yin/ yangs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yin/ mi 'phrogs
180a7(phal chen): pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yin/ des de lta bu rjes su song zhing de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba shin tu med pa yang dag par rgyu zhing 'byung ba yin/ ngag gi
180b1(phal chen): las kha na ma tho ba shin tu med pa yang dag par rgyu zhing 'byung ba yin/ yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba shin tu med cing ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ye shes rjes su 'brang ba/ shes rab kyi pha
180b2(phal chen): rol tu phyin pas dbang bsgyur ba/ snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba'i thabs mkhas pas shin tu rnam par phye ba/ smon lam gyis shin tu mngon par bsgrubs pa/ de bzhin gshegs
180b3(phal chen): pa'i byin gyis shin tu brlabs pa/ sems can gyi don bya zhing sbyor ba rgyun ma chad pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par phye ba yang dag par rgyu zhing 'byung ngo / /kye| rgyal ba'i
180b4(phal chen): sras dag / de la mdor bsdu na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang
180b5(phal chen): dag par sdud pa'i phyir yang dag par rgyu zhing 'byung ngo / /de ltar des byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba 'di thob pas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu ba thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir bsam
180b6(phal chen): pa'i stobs shin tu brtan pa yin/ lam dang mi 'bral ba'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu brtan pa yin/ sems can gyi don yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i stobs
180b7(phal chen): shin tu brtan pa yin/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i phyir byams pa chen po'i stobs shin tu brtan pa yin/ nyams pa med pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir gzungs kyi stobs shin
181a1(phal chen): tu brtan pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba'i bye brag la mkhas pa'i phyir spobs pa'i stobs shin tu brtan pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi
181a2(phal chen): khams mtha' yas par spyod pa'i rnam pa la mkhas pas mngon par shes pa'i stobs shin tu brtan pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba thams cad yongs su mi gtong bas smon
181a3(phal chen): lam gyi stobs shin tu brtan pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs shin tu brtan pa yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i
181a4(phal chen): ye shes rnam pa thams cad du mngon du gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs shin tu brtan pa yin te/ de de lta bu'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan pas bya
181a5(phal chen): ba thams cad kyang yang dag par ston la/ bya ba thams cad la kha na ma tho ba'ang med pa yin/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi sa brgyad pa ste/
181a6(phal chen): mi 'phrogs pa'i phyir mi g.yo ba zhes bya'o/ /ye shes mi zlog pa'i phyir mi 'gyur ba zhes bya'o/ /'gro ba thams cad kyis shes par dka' bas na thob par dka' ba'i sa zhes
181a7(phal chen): bya'o| |kha na ma tho ba med pa'i phyir gzhon nu'i sa zhes bya'o/ /bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin dbang bsgyur bas skye ba'i sa zhes bya'o/ /gzod bya ba med pas yongs su rdzogs pa'i sa
181b1(phal chen): zhes bya'o/ /ye shes kyis rnam par dbye ba shin tu byas pas mthar thug pa'i sa zhes bya'o/ /smon lam shin tu mngon par bsgrubs pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan
181b2(phal chen): gyis rnam par mi 'khrugs pas byin gyi rlabs kyis zhes bya'o/ /sngon gyi mtha' mngon par bsgrubs pas lhun gyis grub pa'i sa zhes bya'o/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /de ltar byang chub
181b3(phal chen): sems dpa' de lta bu'i ye shes mngon par bsgrubs pa dang ldan zhing / sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi rjes su song ba/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyis shin tu gsal bar gyur ba/ de bzhin
181b4(phal chen): gshegs pa'i spyod lam dang spyod pa dang tshul gyi rjes su song ba/ sangs rgyas kyi yul la mngon du gyur pa de ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis shin tu brlabs
181b5(phal chen): pa yin/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon pos rab tu bsu ba yin/ lag na rdo rje rtag par rjes su 'brang ba yin/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs yongs su ma btang ba yin /
181b6(phal chen): lus rnam par phye ba tshad med pa mngon par grub pa yin/ lus kyi spyod pa'i stobs thams cad dang ldan pa yin/ mngon par shes pa chen po'i rnam par smin pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin/
181b7(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin mtha' yas pa la dbang bsgyur ba yin/ lung bstan pa tshad med pa yang dag par nod pa yin/ yongs su smin pa'i tshul bzhin du 'gro ba rnams la mngon par 'tshang
182a1(phal chen): rgya ba yongs su ston pa yin te/ de de lta bu'i sa dang ldan zhing theg pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu zhugs pa shin tu rnam par dpyad pa'i ye
182a2(phal chen): shes mngon par shes pa chen po dang ldan pa rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par shes rab snang ba'i 'od zer gtong ba/ chos kyi dbyings chags pa med pa'i lam du zhugs pa/ 'jig rten
182a3(phal chen): gyi khams kyi lam rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa/ yon tan gyi rnam pa thams cad yang dag par ston pa rang gi sems bskyed pa la dbang bsgyur ba/ sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i
182a4(phal chen): mtha' shin tu rtogs pa'i ye shes can/ bdud kyi lam thams cad yongs su bzlog pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang spyod yul gyi rjes su zhugs
182a5(phal chen): p a ni 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas shing mu med pa dag tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa phyir mi ldog pa'i tshul gyis spyod pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de ni byang
182a6(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba thob pa yin zhes bya'o/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni ting nge 'dzin
182a7(phal chen): gyi stobs kyis mngon par bsgrubs pas rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba yin/ sangs rgyas mthong ba mchod cing bsnyen
182b1(phal chen): bkur ba rgya chen po yang yongs su mi gtong ste/ de bskal pa re re dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa re re dag tu yang sangs rgyas du ma dang / sangs rgyas brgya phrag du ma dang /
182b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas stong phrag du ma dang / sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag du ma dang / sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig du ma dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya phrag
182b3(phal chen): du ma dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig stong phrag du ma dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag du ma la rim gro byed do/ /bkur sti byed
182b4(phal chen): do| |bsti stang byed do/ /mchod pa byed do/ /mchod pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i rnam pa thams cad kyang yang dag par 'bul lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la bsnyen bkur byed cing
182b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dbye ba sngon du 'gro ba'i chos snang ba nye bar bsgrub pa yang yang dag par len to/ /de sngon pas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod rab tu thob pas
182b6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba yongs su dris pa shin tu bstan pas mi 'phrogs pa yin/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal
182b7(phal chen): pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal
183a1(phal chen): pa khrag khrig stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar shin tu byang ba dang /
183a2(phal chen): yongs su dag pa dang / shin tu 'od gsal zhing dang bar gnas pa yin/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di lta ste/ dper na/ gser gyi sa le sbram de nyid mgar ba mkhas pa des
183a3(phal chen): yongs su zin par gyur nas/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi bdag po'i mgul lam/ mgo la btags na sems can 'dzam bu'i gling pa thams cad kyi rgyan gyi rnam pa kun gyis mi thub mi
183a4(phal chen): 'phrogs pa yin/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag nyan thos dang /
183a5(phal chen): rang sangs rgyas thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bar gyis kyang mi 'phrogs pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa
183a6(phal chen): 'di dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi sgo shin tu rnam par phye bas sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i mun pa rab tu sel to/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di
183a7(phal chen): lta ste| dper na/ stong la dbang ba'i tshangs pa ni stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byams pas bkang zhing 'od kyis snang bar byed do/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /de bzhin du byang chub
183b1(phal chen): s ems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams snang
183b2(phal chen): bas rgyas par bkang zhing sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba mthar gyis zhi bar byed do/ /lus kyang shin tu tshim par byed do/ /de'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu
183b3(phal chen): las smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i shas che ba yin te/ lhag ma rnams kyang ci tshul ci nus su yang dag par mi sgrub pa ma yin no/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni byang chub
183b4(phal chen): sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa mdor bstan pa'o/ /rgya cher ni bskal pa mu med pas bstan pa'i mthar thug par shes par bya'o//
183b5(phal chen): de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phal cher stong gi bdag po tshangs pa chen por 'gyur te/ gzhan zil gyis gnon cing / gzhan gyis zil gyis mi non pa dang / don
183b6(phal chen): mthong zhing dbang thob par 'gyur te/ sems can rnams la nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa la mkhas shing mthu yod pa
183b7(phal chen): yin| 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba yongs su dris pas mi 'phrogs pa yin/ de sbyin pa'am/ ngag snyan pa'am/ don bsgrub pa'am/ don mthun pas dge ba'i rtsa ba
184a1(phal chen): gang ci rtsom yang rung ste/ de thams cad ji ltar na sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur/ gtso bor 'gyur/ thu bor 'gyur/ phul du
184a2(phal chen): 'gyur/ dam par 'gyur/ bla na med par 'gyur/ 'dren par 'gyur/ yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rten pa'i bar du 'gyur
184a3(phal chen): snyam ste/ sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang / chos yid la bya ba dang / dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
184a4(phal chen): pa yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la bya ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang / stobs yid la bya ba dang / mi 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang / sangs
184a5(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin te/ de
184a6(phal chen): 'dod na skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu ting nge 'dzin stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob cing / de dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
184a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mthong ba dang / de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong
184b1(phal chen): gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed skyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong
184b2(phal chen): gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed snang bar bya ba dang / sems can stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su smin par bya ba dang / bskal
184b3(phal chen): pa stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du gnas par bya ba dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra
184b4(phal chen): ba snyed la rab tu 'jug pa dang / chos kyi sgo stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam par 'byed pa dang / lus stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra
184b5(phal chen): ba snyed yongs su bstan pa dang / lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i phyir brtson/
184b6(phal chen): 'grus kyi rnam pa de lta bu rtsom mo/ /de yan chad byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi mthu can rnams smon lam gyi khyad par gyis rnam par 'phrul te/ de dag gi lus sam/ 'od dam/ rdzu
184b7(phal chen): 'phrul lam/ mig gam/ spyod yul lam/ dbyangs sam/ spyod pa'am/ rgyan tam/ byin gyi rlabs sam/ mos pa'am/ mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang /
185a1(phal chen): bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma'i bar gyis kyang bgrang bar dka'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
185a2(phal chen): rdo rje'i snying pos sa'i don 'di nyid yang brtag par bya ba dang / bstan par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /de dag sa bdun shes rab thabs kyis lam sbyangs
185a3(phal chen): shing | / shin tu tshogs bsags smon lam chen po rab btab pa/ /mi yi dam pas byin brlabs dge ba'i rtsa ldan zhing / /ye shes mngon 'dod mkhas pa brgyad pa yongs su gnon/ /
185a4(phal chen): bsod nams ye shes nyer bsags snying rje byams ldan zhing / /tshad med sems kyi rjes srong mkhas dang 'dra ba'i blo/ /drang srong chen po chos thos rtogs pa'i stobs ldan pa/ /mi
185a5(phal chen): skye ba yi bzod pa phra zhing zhi ba rab tu 'thob/ /snga nas ma skyes mi skye mtshan nyid med pa dang / /ma byung 'jig pa med cing rgyu ba med pa dang / /dngos po skye 'jig med pa'i de nyid rtog
185a6(phal chen): med pa/ /yid dang sems kyi rgyu ba med cing nam mkha' 'dra/ /de dag 'di 'dra'i bzod ldan spros pa med gyur pa'i/ /mkhas pa zab spyod zhi ba'i gnas rab thob pa yin/ /dgra bcom
185a7(phal chen): rang rgyal 'gro ba kun gyi shes par dka'/ /mtshan ma sna tshogs 'dzin pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsal/ /de ltar gnas pa'i yid dang sems dang rtog pa med/ /dge slong 'gog
185b1(phal chen): dang ldan ltar rnam par mi rtog thob/ /rmi lam chus khyer gnyid sad bzhin du rtsol dang bral/ /tshangs pa'i gnas kyi 'dod pa ji bzhin gnyis kyang med/ /sngon gyi byin gyis bde
185b2(phal chen): gshegs yang dag bskul ba mdzad/ /'di ni bde gshegs dbang bskur bzod pa dam pa ste/ /nged kyi ye shes stobs yangs sangs rgyas chos kyi rnams/ /de dag khyod la med kyi
185b3(phal chen): de la brtson 'grus rtsom/ /ci phan khyad kyi nyon mongs 'bar ba kun zhi yang / /'jig rten nyon mongs mes tshig de dag mi lta'am/ /sems can phan phyir spyad pa'i sngon gyi smon
185b4(phal chen): lam soms/ /'gro ba mthar rgyur ye shes don zhugs shes par gyis/ /chos nyid de bzhin nyid 'di mi rtog rtag tu 'dug /sa 'di rgyal ba nyan thos rang rgyal kun gyi ste/ /'dis
185b5(phal chen): ni 'jig rten dag tu stobs bcu mi brjod do/ /gzhan du ye shes yangs pa dus gsum tshad kyis brjod/ /de ltar de la mtshungs med lha dang mis mchod pa/ /ye shes sgo mo rnam
185b6(phal chen): mang nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad/ /rgyal ba'i chos sgrub pha rol mtha' yas gzhug mdzad pa/ /de la sngon gyi byang chub spyod pas char mi 'gro/ /khyu mchog de dag ye shes sa mchog 'di thob
185b7(phal chen): nas| |phyogs rnams kun tu skad cig gcig gis rgyas 'gengs pa/ /ye shes zhugs dang ldan zhing mngon shes mchog thob pas/ /rgya mtsho cher phyin gru chen rlung gis bkur ba
186a1(phal chen): bzhin/ /ched du bskyod sems bral zhing ye shes las la gnas/ /zhing rnams 'byung zhing gnas pa rnam par dpyod pa byed/ /khams rnams
186a2(phal chen): bzhi po kha dog tha dad yangs pa dang / /phra zhing che dang rnam par phye la yang dag 'jug /stong gsum shin tu rdul phra kun la 'jug byed de/ khams bzhi 'gro ba'i lus rnams
186a3(phal chen): rnam par phye ba dang / /rgyud drug rin chen rnam par phye ba'i rdul phran rnams/ /rnam par phye zhing ye shes yul gyis ma lus 'brang / /ye shes rnam bsgoms yid ldan lus rnams
186a4(phal chen): thams cad du/ /'gro ba'i don phyir rang gi lus rnams gzud par byed/ /stong gsum thams cad sna tshogs gzugs kyis khyab byas shing / /'jig rten mtha' yas dag tu sna tshogs
186a5(phal chen): lus kyang ston/ /bar snang mkha' la nyi zla rlung gi rgyu 'gro yang / /so so'i dkyil 'khor gzugs brnyan chu dkyil rab tu snang / /de bzhin mi g.yo'i chos la ye shes dam pas
186a6(phal chen): rgyu| |bsam dag 'gro ba rnams la mkhas pa'i gzugs brnyan snang / /'gro ba'i bsam pa bzhin du lus kyi rnam phye ba/ /mi dang lha yi 'khor rnams kun tu ston par byed/ /nyan thos
186a7(phal chen): rang rgyal bde gshegs sras kyi lus rnams dang / /bde bar gshegs sku yan lag brgyad pa rab tu ston/ /sems can zhing dang de bzhin las kyi rnam smin lus/ /'phags lus
186b1(phal chen): sna tshogs de bzhin chos dang ye shes lus/ /nam mkha'i lus dang mnyam pa nyid du khyu mchog ldan/ /rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs 'gro ba tshim par bya phyir ston/ /dbang bcu dri ma med
186b2(phal chen): pa'i ye shes dpyod pa thob/ /ye shes spyod dang las rnams snying rje mthun pa'ang thob/ /las rnams ji snyed rgyal ba'i chos rnams yongs su bsgrub/ /sdom pa gsum la gnas shing mi
186b3(phal chen): g.yo ri rab bzhin/ /rgyal sras rnams kyi stobs bcu bskyod par mi nus pa/ /de dag kun nas bdud rnams kun gyi yong mi zlog /sangs rgyas byin brlabs brgya byin tshangs pas phyag kyang bya/ /
186b4(phal chen): lag na rdo rje'i dpung rnams rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang / /sa phyogs 'di la gnas pa'i yon tan mtha' yas te/ /de dag bskal pa khrag khrig stong gis zad mi nus/ /de dag sangs rgyas
186b5(phal chen): bye ba bsnyen bkur yang byed pas/ /rgyal po'i mgo la 'dug pa'i rgyan bzhin shin tu gsal/ /sa phyogs 'di gnas byang chub sems dpa' shes ldan pa/ /stong gi bdag po tshangs
186b6(phal chen): chen yon tan mang por 'gyur/ /theg pa gsum ston yongs su mi 'khrugs mi 'phrogs te/ /'od bzang byams pa'i bsam pas 'gro ba'i nyon mongs sel/ /skad cig gcig tu stong phrag
186b7(phal chen): bcu yi zhing rnams kyi/ /rdul khams ji snyed de snyed ting 'dzin ldan pa thob/ /phyogs bcu'i sems can gtso bo de snyed mang po mthong / /yan chad smon lam mchog gi rgyan can
187a1(phal chen): gcig min no/ /'di ni mdor bsdus rgyal sras kyi/ /sa brgyad shin tu bstan pa ste/ /rgya chen bskal pa bye bar yang / /thams cad mthar phyin mi
187a2(phal chen): nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa ste/ mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'o// //bam po lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa/ sa yi dam pa 'di bshad tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs
187a3(phal chen): pa'i byin rlabs kyis/ /tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /bye ba'i zhing rnams g.yos par 'gyur/ /thams cad gzigs pa'i sku las kyang / /'od zer yid du 'ong ba bkye/ /des
187a4(phal chen): ni zhing rnams snang bar byas/ /sems can rnams kyang bde bar gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' stong snyed kyang / /bar snang gnas la 'khod gyur te/ /lha rdzas lhag pa'i mchod
187a5(phal chen): pa yis/ /gsung ba'i mchog la mchod pa byed/ /lha yi rgyal po dbang phyug dang / /dbang sgyur rnams kyang dga' bar gyur/ /mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /yon tan rgya mtsho
187a6(phal chen): mchod pa byed/ /de nas lha yi bu mo stong / /dga' zhing dbang po bder gyur pas/ /sbyar legs snyan pa'i glu yi dbyangs/ /ston pa mchod pa'i don du len/ /rol mo'i sgra dbyangs de
187a7(phal chen): dag las/ /drang srong chen po'i byin rlabs kyis/ /'di 'dra'i sgra dbyangs stong snyed du/ /snyan pa'i dbyangs su grags par gyur/ /zhi dul rab zhi dri ma thams cad med gyur cing / /sa yi
187b1(phal chen): mchog dang ldan pas spyod pa legs spyod pa/ /phyogs bcur 'gro la phan par spyod pa'i khyu mchog rnams/ /mkha' dbyings 'dra ba'i yid kyis rgyal ba'i spyod pa ston/ /mi yi gnas dang
187b2(phal chen): lha yi gnas dang klu gnas su/ /phyogs bcur bsod nams stobs kyis rgyan rnams mang po byung / /de las yang du rgyal sras ye shes la mos pa/ /rgyal ba'i yon tan bsngags pa
187b3(phal chen): rgya chen rab tu ston/ /zhing gcig ma g.yos rdul med zhing rnams thams cad du/ /'gro la phan byed zla ba lta bu'i 'od ldan pa/ /thams cad dbyangs su 'du shes sems zhi yid rab
187b4(phal chen): kyis| |so so skad bzhin sgra skad brgya yang rnam par brjod/ /sems can gang rnams blo zhan sems yid dmar gyur pa/ /de la mkhas pa khyu mchog nyan thos spyod pa ston/ /sems
187b5(phal chen): can gang rnams sems rno rang rgyal theg brtson pa/ /de la rdul med rang rgyal theg pa'i ye shes sten/ /sems can gang rnams phan sems snying rje brtse yid can/ /de la de dag
187b6(phal chen): rgyal sras spyod pa'i mchog kyang ston/ /sems can gang rnams blo mchog dam pa'i yid mos pa/ /de la mkhas pa tshad med sangs rgyas sku ston to/ /ji ltar sgyu mkhan 'gro ba rnams
187b7(phal chen): la sgyu ston pa/ /lus mang bye ba sna tshogs de dag dngos po med/ /de bzhin rgyal sras mkhas pa ye shes sgyu mkhas pa/ /spyod pa thams cad ston kyang de dag dngos po med/ /'di 'dra'i
188a1(phal chen): sgra skad brgya stong du/ /snyan pa'i dbyangs su brjod byas nas/ /lha yi bu mo mi smra bar/ /zhi la mos pas rgyal ba lta/ /'khor rnams rnam par dang bas na/
188a2(phal chen): bde gshegs sras la yang smras pa/ /dam chos spyod pa'i spyod pa rnams/ /brgyad pa'i gong du yang gsungs shig /byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras
188a3(phal chen): d ag| de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa la gnas pa ni de lta bu'i blo tshad med pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par dpyad pas de nas gong du rnam par thar pa zhi ba
188a4(phal chen): la mos par zhe non cing / de nas gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes shin tu rdzogs pa rnam par dpyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i rjes su 'jug par bya ba la
188a5(phal chen): 'jug pa dang / ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i che ba nyid rnam par dbye ba dang / gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin rab tu dbye ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / mngon par shes pa rgya chen po mngon
188a6(phal chen): par bsgrub pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dbye ba khong du chud par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
188a7(phal chen): pa yongs su mi 'phrogs pa sbyang bar bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / snying rje chen
188b1(phal chen): po'i mthu phyung ba yongs su mi gtong bar byed pas byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa yongs su gnon te/ de byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'di la gnas pa'i tshe/ dge ba dang / mi dge ba
188b2(phal chen): dang | lung du ma bstan pa'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang /
188b3(phal chen): 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang / bsam pa dang / bsam du med pa'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang / nges pa dang / ma nges pa'i chos
188b4(phal chen): mngon par 'du bya ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
188b5(phal chen): sa'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang / 'dus byas kyi chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos mngon par 'du bya ba yang yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /
188b6(phal chen): de de lta bu'i shes par bya ba khong du chud pa'i blos sems can thams cad kyi sems thibs po rab tu rgyu ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ nyon mongs pa thibs po rab tu
188b7(phal chen): rgyu ba dang / las thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang / dbang po thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang / mos pa thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang / khams thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang / bsam pa dang bag la
189a1(phal chen): nyal ba'i thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang / skye ba thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang / phung po gsum du rnam
189a2(phal chen): par gnas pa thibs po rab tu rgyu ba yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /de ni sems can rnams kyi sems rnam pa tha dad pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/
189a3(phal chen): sems rnam pa sna tshogs dang / sems skad cig tu myur du 'gyur zhing 'jig pa dang / mi 'jig pa dang / sems lus med pa dang / sems mtha' yas shing thams cad du dbang
189a4(phal chen): byed pa dang / sems 'od gsal zhing dang ba dang / sems nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang / sems nyon mongs pa med pa dang / sems bcings pa dang / rnam par grol ba
189a5(phal chen): dang | sems sgyu ma lta bur rnam par bsgrub pa dang / sems 'gro ba'i rgyud ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar gnas pa nas/ sems rnam pa sna tshogs stong phrag du ma'i bar du yang dag
