219a1(phal chen): chos kyi sprin 'di ni mdor bsdus te bstan na yang de ltar tshad med pa ste/ rgya cher ni bskal pa brgya stong grangs med pas kyang bstan pa'i mthar thug par
219a2(phal chen): mi 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas smras pa/ kye/ rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa'i yul dang / byin
219a3(phal chen): gyi rlabs kyang de ltar tshad med na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyod yul dang / yul gyi rgyud ci 'dra ba zhig yod/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/ kye/
219a4(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi la la zhig gis gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas rde'u rgya shug gi tshig gu tsam gnyis sam/ gsum zhig blangs te/
219a5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa dag na/ sa'i khams ji snyed yod pa rdo ba 'di las ji tsam zhig gis lhag par 'phags shing lhag par tshad med ces zer ba zhig
219a6(phal chen): yod na/ kye/ rgyal ba'i sras/ de ltar khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes tshad med pa mnga' ba rnams kyi chos
219a7(phal chen): nyid byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid kyis 'jal ba ni/ khyod kyi tshig 'di de dang 'dra bar bdag gis dpags so/ /kye/ rgyal ba'i sras/ ji ltar gling bzhi pa'i 'jig
219b1(phal chen): rten gyi khams nas gang blangs pa'i sa'i khams cung zad la lhag ma las tshad med pa de bzhin du/ kye/ rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin 'di kho na yang
219b2(phal chen): bskal pa grangs med par shin tu bstan kyang phyogs tsam zhig bstan du zad na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa lta smos su 'ang ga la yod/ kye/ rgyal ba'i sras/ khyod kyis
219b3(phal chen): khong du chud pa dang / yid ches par bya na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di bdag gi mdun na dbang du bzhugs te/ kye/ rgyal ba'i sras/ gal te phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i
219b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed cig sa 'di lta bu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ smig
219b5(phal chen): ma'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ til gyi zhing thibs po bzhin du/ yongs su gang bar gyur kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrub pa/ bskal pa mu
219b6(phal chen): m ed par mngon par bsgrubs pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyi brgya'i char
219b7(phal chen): yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya
220a1(phal chen): stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyu dang / bsgrun pa tsam du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /kye| rgyal
220a2(phal chen): ba'i sras/ de ltar ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs dang gnyis su med pa ni/ byang chub sems
220a3(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyang yongs su mi gtong la/ sangs rgyas blta ba dang / mchod pa dang / rim gro yang rab tu byed de/ bskal pa re re la yang de bzhin gshegs
220a4(phal chen): pa mtha' yas pa la mchod pa rnam pa thams cad du mngon par bsgrub pa'i mchod pa rgya chen po'i rjes su song bas mchod pa byed do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
220a5(phal chen): dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyi snang ba yang yang dag par 'dzin to/ /de ni sngon pas kyang bskal pa du ma dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang /
220a6(phal chen): bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag
220a7(phal chen): khrig stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar chos kyi dbyings yongs su dris pa shin tu bstan
220b1(phal chen): pas mi 'phrogs par gnas so/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ lha rdzas kyi rgyan gyi rnam pa mgar bas ma brdungs pa rin po che'i dam pas spras pa/ lha'i rgyal
220b2(phal chen): po dbang sgyur gyi yan lag gi dam pa mgo'am/ mgul du btags na/ de ma yin pa'i lha dang / mi'i rgyan gyi rnam pa gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs shing mi thub pa yin/ kye| rgyal
220b3(phal chen): ba'i sras/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa chos kyi sprin 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rgyud de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang / nyan
220b4(phal chen): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po nye bar bzung ba yan chad byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa thob pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems
220b5(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyis kyang mi 'phrogs pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'di la gnas pa'i ye shes snang ba ni sems can rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la gzud
220b6(phal chen): pa'i rgyu yin te/ de ma yin pa'i ye shes snang ba gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs so/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ lha'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po'i 'od kyis ni
220b7(phal chen): skye ba'i skye mched thams cad du'ang khyab la/ sems can rnams kyi lus kyang sim par byed do/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa 'di
221a1(phal chen): la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po nye bar bzung
221a2(phal chen): ba yan chad byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa la gnas pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang mi 'phrogs pa yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar gyi
221a3(phal chen): chos nyid la yang sems can rnams rab tu gzhog go/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa la ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
221a4(phal chen): rnams kyis dus gsum gyi ye shes yang dag par bstan to/ /chos kyi dbyings rab tu phye ba'i ye shes dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang /
221a5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sems can thams cad dang / zhing gi chos yongs su shes par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad
221a6(phal chen): kyi sems dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes nas/ mdor bsdu na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i bar du yang dag par bstan to/ /de'i pha rol tu phyin
221a7(phal chen): pa bcu las ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i shas che ba yin te/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi sprin ces bya ba/ byang chub sems
221b1(phal chen): dpa'i sa bcu pa mdor bstan pa'o/ /rgya cher ni bskal ba grangs med pa mu med pas bstan pa'i mthar thug par shes par bya'o/ /de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni
221b2(phal chen): phal cher lha'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen por 'gyur te/ sems can rnams la nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa la mkhas shing
221b3(phal chen): mthu yod pa yin/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par phye ba yongs su dris pa bstan pas mi 'phrogs pa yin/ sbyin pa'am/ ngag snyan pa'am/ don bsgrub pa'am/ don mthun pas dge
221b4(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba gang ji rtsom yang rung ste/ de thams cad ji ltar na sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur/ gtso bor 'gyur/ thu bor 'gyur/ phul du 'gyur/ dam par 'gyur/
221b5(phal chen): bla na med par 'gyur/ 'dren par 'gyur/ yongs su 'dren par 'gyur ba nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la brten pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam te/ sangs rgyas yid la bya
221b6(phal chen): ba dang / chos yid la bya ba dang / dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang / byang chub
221b7(phal chen): sems dpa'i sa yid la bya ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang / stobs yid la bya ba dang / mi 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la
222a1(phal chen): bya ba nas/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin te/ de 'dod na
222a2(phal chen): skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob cing / de dag la
222a3(phal chen): snyoms par 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mthong ba dang / de dag gi byin gyi
222a4(phal chen): rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed skyod pa
222a5(phal chen): dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
222a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa byed pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed snang bar bya ba dang / sems can sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa
222a7(phal chen): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su smin par bya ba dang / bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
222b1(phal chen): phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du gnas par bya ba dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
222b2(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba la rab tu 'jug pa dang / chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa byed pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam par dbye
222b3(phal chen): bar bya ba dang / lus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su bstan pa dang / lus re re la yang byang chub
222b4(phal chen): s ems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yang dag par bstan pa'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam pa de lta
222b5(phal chen): bu rtsom mo/ /de yang chad byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi mthu can rnams smon lam gyi khyad par gyis rnam par 'phrul te/ de dag gi lus sam/ 'od dam/ rdzu
222b6(phal chen): 'phrul lam/ mig gam/ spyod yul lam/ dbyangs sam/ spyod pa'am/ rgyan tam/ byin gyi rlabs sam/ mos pa'am/ mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa
222b7(phal chen): du ma dang / bskal ba brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal ba stong phrag du ma dang / bskal ba brgya stong phrag du ma'i bar gyis kyang bgrang bar dka'o/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ bya
223a1(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa de dag ni/ rim gyis mngon du gzhol bas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rnam pa thams cad rjes su song bar
223a2(phal chen): blta'o/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mtsho chen po ma dros pa las byung ba'i 'bab chu ni chu klung chen po'i rgyud kyi sgo bzhis 'dzam bu'i gling yongs su
223a3(phal chen): ngoms par byas nas mi zad par byas te/ gong du rnam par 'phel ba dang / rgya mtsho chen po'i bar du zhen par 'gyur te/ chu de ni thog ma nas kyang rgya mtsho chen po la
223a4(phal chen): mngon par gzhol ba yin te/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chu 'bab pa yang smon lam chen po'i chu klung gi
223a5(phal chen): rgyun gyi sgo nas bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can gyi khams ngoms par byas te/ mi zad par byas nas gong du rnam par 'phel ba dang / rnam pa thams cad du thams
223a6(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar gyi rgya mtsho chen po la zhen par 'gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chu de ni thog ma nas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho chen po la mngon
223a7(phal chen): par gzhol ba yin/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi gzhi las yod par 'gyur te/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras/
223b1(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa chen po'i gzhi las ri'i rgyal po chen po bcu yod par gyur pa 'di lta ste/ ri'i rgyal po chen po kha ba can dang / ri'i rgyal po chen po spos kyi ngad can dang
223b2(phal chen): ri'i rgyal po chen po rnam par 'dal ba dang / ri'i rgyal po chen po drang srong ri dang / ri'i rgyal po chen po gnya' shing 'dzin dang / ri'i rgyal po chen po rta rna ri dang / ri'i rgyal
223b3(phal chen): po chen po sa 'dzin dang / ri'i rgyal po chen po khor yug dang / ri'i rgyal po chen po dpal can dang / ri'i rgyal po chen po ri rab bo/ /kye/ rgyal ba'i sras/ de la 'di lta ste/
223b4(phal chen): dper na/ ri'i rgyal po chen po kha ba can ni/ sman gyi rnam pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas te/ sman sna tshogs thams cad blang bas mthar thug pa med do/ /kye| rgyal ba'i
223b5(phal chen): sras| de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig rten pa'i gtsug lag dang / tshig dang / sngags dang / rig
223b6(phal chen): pa'i gnas kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ 'jig rten pa'i gtsug lag dang / tshig dang / sngags dang / rig pa'i gnas bstan pas mthar thug pa med do/ /kye| rgyal ba'i
223b7(phal chen): sras/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ri'i rgyal po chen po spos kyi ngad can ni/ spos kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ spos kyi rnam pa sna tshogs blang pas mthar thug
224a1(phal chen): pa med do/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa dri ma dang bral ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems
224a2(phal chen): dpa'i tshul khrims dang / sdom pa dang / tshul thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang / sdom pa dang / tshul rnam pa sna tshogs kyi
224a3(phal chen): spos kyi mthar thug pa med do/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ri'i rgyal po rnam par 'dal ba ni/ rin po che'i rang bzhin shin tu dag pa/ rin po che'i
224a4(phal chen): rnam pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te| rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad blang bas zad pa med do/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i
224a5(phal chen): sa 'od byed pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig rten ba'i bsam gtan dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms
224a6(phal chen): par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par
224a7(phal chen): 'jug pa yongs su dris pa bstan pas zad pa med do/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ri'i rgyal po chen po drang srong ri ni/ rin po che'i rang bzhin rnam par
224b1(phal chen): dag pa/ drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i 'byung gnas yin te/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i drang srong bgrang bas zad pa med do/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras/
224b2(phal chen): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od 'phro ba can gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang lam dang lam ma yin pa'i khyad dang / bye brag shes pa thams cad kyi 'byung
224b3(phal chen): gnas yin te/ lam dang lam ma yin pa'i khyad dang / bye brag gi rgyud yongs su dris pa yongs su bstan pas zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di lta ste/
224b4(phal chen): dper na/ ri'i rgyal po chen po gnya' shing 'dzin ni/ rin po che'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa/ gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin te/
224b5(phal chen): gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen po can bgrang bas zad pa med do/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa shin tu rgyal bar dka' ba la gnas pa'i byang
224b6(phal chen): chub sems dpa' yang mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu
224b7(phal chen): 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul ba dang / cho 'phrul yongs su dris pa bstan pa zad pa med do/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ri'i rgyal po chen po rta rna ri ni/
225a1(phal chen): rin po che'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa/ shing tog gi rnam pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ shing tog rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad blang
225a2(phal chen): bas zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang rten cing 'brel bar
225a3(phal chen): 'byung ba la 'jug pa shin tu bstan pa'i 'byung gnas yin te/ nyan thos kyi 'bras bu mngon par khong du chud par bya ba yongs su dris pa bstan pas zad pa med do/ /
225a4(phal chen): kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ri'i rgyal po chen po sa 'dzin ni/ rin po che'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa/ klu rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'byung
225a5(phal chen): gnas yin te/ klu rdzu 'phrul chen po can bgrang bas zad pa med do/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa ring du song ba las gnas pa'i byang chub
225a6(phal chen): sems dpa' yang thabs dang shes rab shin tu bstan pa'i 'byung gnas yin te/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu mngon par khong du chud par bya ba yongs su dris pa bstan
225a7(phal chen): pas zad pa med do/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ri'i rgyal po chen po khor yug ni/ rin po che chen po'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa/ dbang du gyur
225b1(phal chen): pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ dbang du gyur pa bgrang bas zad pa med do/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems
225b2(phal chen): dpa' yang byang chub sems dpa'i dbang mngon par sgrub pa yongs su dris pa shin tu bstan pa'i 'byung gnas yin te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba yongs su dris
225b3(phal chen): pa bstan pas zad pa med do/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ri'i rgyal po dpal dang ldan pa ni/ rin po che'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa/ lha ma yin rdzu
225b4(phal chen): 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ lha ma yin rdzu 'phrul chen po can bgrang bas zad pa med do/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ de bzhin du byang chub sems
225b5(phal chen): dpa' sa legs pa'i blo gros la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa'i rgyud thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ 'gro
225b6(phal chen): ba thams cad 'byung ba yongs su dris pa bstan pas zad pa med do/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ri'i rgyal po chen po ri rab ni/ rin po che'i rang bzhin
225b7(phal chen): rnam par dag pa/ lha rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ lha rdzu 'phrul chen po can bgrang bas zad pa med do/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ de bzhin
226a1(phal chen): du| byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa
226a2(phal chen): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las yang dag par bstan pa yongs su dris pa bstan pas zad pa med do/ /
226a3(phal chen): kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ ji ltar rin po che'i ri chen po de dag rgya mtsho chen po las byung zhing / rgya mtsho chen po las smos pa de bzhin du/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub
226a4(phal chen): sems dpa'i sa bcu po 'di dag kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las byung ba'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las smos pa'o/ /kye| rgyal pa'i sras/ 'di lta ste/ dper
226a5(phal chen): na| rgya mtsho chen po ni rnam pa bcus mi 'phrogs pa'i phyir rgya mtsho'i grangs su 'gro ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rim gyis gzhol ba dang / shi ba'i ro dang
226a6(phal chen): mi 'grogs pa dang / chu gzhan gyi grangs yongs su spangs pa dang / ro gcig pa dang / rin po che mang ba dang / zab cing gting ring ba dang / yangs shing tshad med
226a7(phal chen): pa dang / 'byung po mang po'i gnas su gyur pa dang / dbres kyi tshul las mi 'da' ba dang / sprin chen po'i char thams cad yongs su 'dzin pas mi ngoms pa'o//
226b1(phal chen): kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang spyod pa'i rnam pa bcus mi 'phrogs pa'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i
226b2(phal chen): sa rab tu dga' ba la smon lam chen po rim gyis mngon par bsgrub pas gzhol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dri ma dang bral ba la tshul khrims ngan pa'i ro dang mi
226b3(phal chen): 'grogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od byed pa la 'jig rten pa rnam par gdags pa'i grangs yongs su spangs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od
226b4(phal chen): 'phro ba can la sangs rgyas la mos pa mi phyed pa'i ro gcig pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa shin tu rgyal bar dka' ba la thabs dang / mngon par shes pa tshad
226b5(phal chen): med pas 'jig rten gyi bya ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i rin po che mang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rab tu brtag pas
226b6(phal chen): shin tu zab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa ring du song ba la blo dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / mkhas pa yangs shing tshad med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
226b7(phal chen): sa mi g.yo ba la rgyan chen po mngon par bsgrub pa yang dag par bstan pa'i 'byung po mang po gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros la rnam
227a1(phal chen): par thar pa zab mo dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud pa'i tshul gyis dbres las mi 'da' ba dang / byang chub sems
227a2(phal chen): dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos snang ba'i sprin chen po'i char yang dag par bzung bas mi ngoms pa'o/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras /
227a3(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che ni/ rin po che'i mkhan po mkhas pas shin tu bsregs/ shin tu bsgrubs/ shin tu sbyangs/ shin tu dag par byas/ /legs par
227a4(phal chen): phug / rin po che'i srad bus legs par btags/ rin po che bai DUR+Ya'i rtsa ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la bzhag ste/ 'od thams cad 'byung bar gyur la rgyal pos bsngags
227a5(phal chen): par gyur te/ rin po che'i rigs bcu las 'das shing shin tu 'phags par gyur pa de'i tshe/ sems can thams cad la rin po ches phan gdags pa'i don du nye
227a6(phal chen): bar gnas pa yin/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems rin po che bskyed pa yang sbyangs pa'i yon tan
227a7(phal chen): gyi sdom pa dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub kyis shin tu bsregs/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
227b1(phal chen): snyoms par 'jug pas shin tu bsgrubs/ lam gyi yan lag gi rnam pas shin tu sbyangs/ thabs dang mngon par shes pas shin tu dag par byas/ rten cing 'brel bar
227b2(phal chen): 'byung bas shin tu phug/ thabs dang shes rab rin po che sna tshogs kyi srad bus shin tu btags/ dbang gi rin po che bai DUR+Ya'i yu ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la bzhag /
227b3(phal chen): sems can gyi spyod pa rab tu brtags pa dang / thos pa'i ye shes kyi 'od rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ chos kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
227b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mngon par dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rin po che chen po thams
227b5(phal chen): cad kyis yang dag par phan gdags pa'i don du nye bar gnas pa yin te/ de'i tshe thams cad mkhyen pa zhes kyang bya'o/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa'i
227b6(phal chen): spyod pa yang dag par bsgrub cing / rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / yon tan yang dag par bsags pa'i chos kyi sgo'i rgyud 'di ni/ sems
227b7(phal chen): can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyi rna lam du grag par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas smras pa/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ 'o na rnam pa thams
228a1(phal chen): cad du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / yon tan yang dag par bsags pa'i chos kyi sgo'i rgyud 'di gang gi rna lam du grag par gyur pa de
228a2(phal chen): dag bsod nams kyi tshogs ci tsam zhig dang ldan par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
228a3(phal chen): shes kyi mthu ji tsam pa de snyed kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed cing bsgrub par dmigs pa la yod de/ chos kyi sgo'i rgyud
228a4(phal chen): 'di grag cing mngon par gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs kyang de tsam du shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ rnam pa thams cad du thams cad
228a5(phal chen): mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / yon tan yang dag par bsags pa'i chos kyi rgyud 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pas mnyan pa'am/ mos par bya ba'am/
228a6(phal chen): gzung bar yang mi nus na bsgom pa'i rnam par sbyor bas brtson par mi nus pa lta ci smos/ de bas na/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ gang gis chos kyi sgo'i rgyud 'di thos te/
228a7(phal chen): thos nas mos par byed pa dang / mos par byas shing 'dzin pa dang / bsgom pa'i rnam pas brtson par byed na/ sems can de dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
228b1(phal chen): kyi sgo dang ldan par shes par bya'o/ /de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / chos nyid thob pas phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig phrag bcu'i
228b2(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam pa drug dang / ltas chen po bco brgyad du g.yos so/ /rab tu g.yos so/ /kun tu g.yos so/ /'gul to/ /rab tu 'gul to/ /kun tu 'gul to//
228b3(phal chen): ldag go/ rab tu ldeg go /kun tu ldeg go/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu chem chem mo/ /'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu 'ur 'ur ro/ /shig shig/ rab tu shig
228b4(phal chen): shig/ kun tu shig shig go/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang chos nyid rab tu thob pas lha rdzas kyi phreng ba'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /lha rdzas kyi gos kyi sprin gyi char
228b5(phal chen): mngon par bab bo/ /lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /lha rdzas kyi gdugs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan gyi sprin gyi
228b6(phal chen): char mngon par bab bo/ /lha rdzas kyi ba dan gyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol ba dang / glu'i dbyangs kyi sprin gyi sgra mngon par
228b7(phal chen): sgrog go/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa la mngon par bstod pa'i glu'i dbyangs kyi sprin gyi sgra mngon par sgrog go/ ji ltar gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten
229a1(phal chen): g yi khams 'di'i gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas su lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi gzhal med khang nor bu rin po che'i snying por ji lta ba de bzhin
229a2(phal chen): du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang phyogs bcu rgyas par gang zhing / chos bstan pa 'di yang thams cad du byung bar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu
229a3(phal chen): nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed phyogs bcu rgyas par byed cing lhags te/ de dag phyin nas kyang 'di skad
229a4(phal chen): ces zer ro/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ de ltar khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid 'di brjod pa legs so/ /legs so/ /kye/ rgyal ba'i sras/ bdag cag kyang
229a5(phal chen): rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba ming mthun pa sha stag ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i dpal zhes bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya
229a6(phal chen): ba dag gi drung nas 'dir lhags te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad na yang chos bstan pa 'di nyid sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi rnam pa 'di 'dra ba
229a7(phal chen): dag la tshig 'di dag nyid dang / yi ge 'di dag nyid dang / khong du chud par bya ba 'di dag nyid dang / don 'di nyid lhag chad med par mngon par brjod de 'byung
229b1(phal chen): bar gyur to/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ bdag cag kyang dbang du gyur pa sha stag /sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor 'dir phyin to/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir
229b2(phal chen): b dag cag ji ltar phyin pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas kyi
229b3(phal chen): l ha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi gzhal med khang nor bu rin po che'i snying por yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa'
229b4(phal chen): rnams phyin par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos phyogs bcur bltas te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la bltas nas chos kyi dbyings la rnam
229b5(phal chen): par lta ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sems bskyed pa yang dag par brjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yul yang dag par bstan pa dang / spyod pa'i
229b6(phal chen): stobs yongs su sbyangs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yang dag par bsgrub pa brjod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dri ma sel ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
229b7(phal chen): shes nye bar bsgrub pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyi rgyan yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon tan rab tu rjod pa byed
230a1(phal chen): cing | sa'i don 'di yang brtag par bya ba dang / bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /zhi dang dul
230a2(phal chen): dga' zhi zhing dul ba'i yid ldan la/ /nam mkha'i dbyings 'dra bar snang mkha' dang mtshungs 'dra zhing / /tha ba'i dri ma rnam sbyangs lam rnams shes gnas pa'i/ /byang
230a3(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i khyad par rab la nyon/ /bskal pa bye bar dge ba brgya stong rab bsags shing / /sangs rgyas brgya stong drang srong chen po mchod byas te/ /dbang
230a4(phal chen): sgyur rnams dang rang rgyal mtha' yas mchod byas nas/ /'gro ba kun la phan phyir byang chub sems skye'o/ /brtul zhugs dka' thub dka' spyad dul bzod ldan gyur
230a5(phal chen): la| |khrel yod dpal gyi spyod ldan ye shes dge 'phags shing / /blo gros rig yangs sangs rgyas ye shes sems ldan gyi/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i
230a6(phal chen): stobs dang mnyam 'dra skye/ /dus gsum rgyal ba ji snyed mchod rab mchod pa'i phyir/ /nam mkha'i dbyings tshad zhing rnams thams cad yongs su sbyong / /chos rnams
230a7(phal chen): thams cad ji snyed de dag mnyam rtogs pas/ /'gro ba dgrol ba'i don du byang chub sems skye'o/ /gzhal yas sems skyes sa mchog rab tu thob gyur nas/ /sdig
230b1(phal chen): pa thams cad bsal phyir rdul med rab tu dga'/ /smon lam stobs dpyad dkar chos yang dag bsags byas nas/ /snying rje brtse ldan sa yi gong ma yongs su gnon/ /'gro phyir
230b2(phal chen): byams sems tshul khrims thos dang yon tan ldan/ /dri med dri bral rang bzhin yongs dag bsam pa yis/ /'jig rten thams cad me gsum 'bar bar mthong gyur nas/ /gsum
230b3(phal chen): pa rnams yangs blo yis 'gro ba'i don du gnon/ /sdug bsngal mi rtag nad pa zug rngus mi bde ba'i/ /khams gsum rtag tu sdug bsngal brgya yi me 'bar bas/ /'dus
230b4(phal chen): byas nyes mthong rgyal ba'i legs pa mngon mos shing / /ye shes 'od 'phro yangs ldan 'od 'phro yod pa gnon/ /dran dang blo ldan lam gyi ye shes thob gyur cing / /sa
230b5(phal chen): mchog de la sangs rgyas brgya stong bsnyen bkur nas/ /mi yi gtso bo'i yon tan rtag tu dran byed cing / /'gro ba kun gyis thub dka' rgyal bar dka' ba gnon/ /ye shes blo
230b6(phal chen): gros thabs dang shes rab blo dpyod pas/ /'gro don mtha' yas sna tshogs bya ba bstan byas shing / /stobs bcu'i mchod pa sems can don rnams bsgrub byas te/ /mi
230b7(phal chen): skye mngon sum mtha' yas sa drug yongs su gnon/ /'jig rten kun tu 'gro bas shes dka' spyod byed cing / /bdag bral byed med yod dang med pa rnam bsal ba'i/ /
231a1(phal chen): rang bzhin stong chos yan lag bcu gnyis rab 'byung zhes/ /phra zhing rno ba'i sems ldan bdun pa yongs su gnon/ /thabs dang shes rab sems
231a2(phal chen): yangs rab tu thob gyur cing / /ring du song ba gdul dka' ring du song ba gnon/ /rang bzhin dul zhing zhi phyir du ma'i sems spangs te/ /de nas nam mkha' 'dra ba'i
231a3(phal chen): mi g.yo yongs su gnon/ /de la mkhas pa'i ye shes las rnams sna tshogs phyir/ /zhi ba de las bslang zhing mi yi mchog tu bsnams/ /dbang bcu ldan zhing 'jig
231a4(phal chen): rten yang dag nyid dpyod pa'i/ /rang bzhin chen po 'gro phyir legs pa'i blo gros gnon/ /'di la shin tu phra bar 'jig rten kun dpyad cing / /sems can thibs
231a5(phal chen): po'i spyod ldan nyon mongs las dpyad de/ /de dag gdul ba'i spyod pas yon tan mang po gnon/ /bde gshegs mdzod thob don gyi dam pa rab tu ston/ /dkar
231a6(phal chen): chos rim gyis de 'dra'i spyod pa ldan gyur pas/ /sa dgu'i bar du bsod nams ye shes tshogs thob cing / /rgyal ba rnams kyi stobs mchog don dam mngon 'dod
231a7(phal chen): pa| |ye shes yon tan dbang bskur sangs rgyas kun las 'thob/ /brgya stong phrag bcu'i ting 'dzin grangs med gang yod pa/ /spyod yul shes pas chos nyid shes
231b1(phal chen): yangs thob gyur nas/ /de yi rjes la thams cad mkhyen par dbang bskur 'thob/ /yul yangs ting 'dzin de dag thob pas de mi sgul/ /gang tshe de yis kun mkhyen dbang bskur
231b2(phal chen): thob pa'i tshe/ /pad+mo rgya chen rin chen kun gyis brgyan pa 'byung / /de yi tshul mthun lus kyi dbus su gnas par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis yongs bskor de la lta zhing gnas/ /
231b3(phal chen): de yi 'od zer khrag khrig mtha' yas stong phrag mang / /phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal kun kyang zhi bar byed/ /mgo yi gtsug nas 'od zer bye ba stong byung zhing / /phyogs
231b4(phal chen): rnams kun gyi mi yi gtso bo'i 'khor du rgyu/ /steng gi nam mkha'i dbyings la 'od zer dra bar gnas/ /sangs rgyas mchod phyir brtson par rgyal ba'i zhabs su 'dong / /de tshe rgyal
231b5(phal chen): ba rnams dang rgyal sras rnams kyis kyang / /chos rab don du rgyal sras dbang bskur thob par mkhyen/ /mchod pa'i don du rgyal sras mtha' yas kun kyang 'ong / /de'i tshe
231b6(phal chen): kun mkhyen dbang bskur mi mchog mdzod spu nas/ /dbang bskur 'od zer dam pa mang po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /'od zer mchog gis bskor cing spyi bo'i gtsug tu nub/ /
231b7(phal chen): gang tshe rgyal mchog bu yi thu bo srid mchog la/ /dbang bskur zhing du sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur tshe/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad kun nas g.yo bar
232a1(phal chen): 'gyur/ /mnar med bar gyi sdug bsngal de tshe zhi zhing 'dug /gang tshe kun mkhyen dbang gis mngon par dbang bskur ba/ /de phyir mkhas
232a2(phal chen): pas chos sprin sa mchog thob ces bya/ /mkhas pa 'di la gnas pa'i shes rgyud tshad med de/ /sa rab 'di la gnas pa 'gro kun gtso yin no/ /gzugs dang
232a3(phal chen): gzugs med de bzhin 'dod pa'i khams yangs dang / /sems can khams dang zhing dang chos khams yangs pa dang / /grangs dang grangs med nam mkha'i khams
232a4(phal chen): kyi bar du ste/ /chos dbyings yangs pa thams cad ma nor khong du chud/ /'di la gnas pa mthu chen sprul pa'i las kun dang / /de bzhin byin rlabs rgyal ba'i ye
232a5(phal chen): shes phra ba dang / /mi mchog gsang ba bskal pa'i grangs rnams shes bya dang / /skra rtse gcig tu 'jig rten khams rnams gzung ba dang / /mi yi gtso bo 'byung
232a6(phal chen): dang sku tshe 'tshang rgya dang / /'khor lo dam pa bskor dang mya ngan 'da' ba'i rnams/ /thams cad rab shes gong du rnam thar zhi ba dag /sngan chad ma thob kun kyang
232a7(phal chen): de tshe rab tu 'thob/ /'di la gnas pa'i mthu che rgyal ba'i chos kyi sprin/ /thams cad khong du chud byed dran pas kun kyang 'dzin/ /klu rnams kun gyi sprin char rgya
232b1(phal chen): mtsho 'dzin pa ltar/ /de bzhin rgyal ba'i chos sprin char chen kun kyang 'dzin/ /rgyal ba gcig las chos gang mthu chen nges thob pa/ /de la phyogs bcu mtha' yas zhing gi
232b2(phal chen): sems can rnams/ /thams cad bde gshegs nyan thos thos pa 'dzin gyur kyang / /byang chub sems dpa' thos pa'i grangs char nyer mi 'gro /ye shes spyod pa'i stobs
232b3(phal chen): kyis sngan chad spyad pa'i mthus/ /skad cig yud tsam gcig tu khrag khrig zhing bkang zhing / /bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs nyon mongs kun kyang zhi bar byed/ /de phyir rgyal bas
232b4(phal chen): 'di ming chos kyi sprin ces gsungs/ /'di gnas mthu chen lha yi 'jig rten gtsor gyur pa'i/ /phyogs rnams kun tu mi yi gtso bo'i yul yang ston/ /rnam 'phrul
232b5(phal chen): khrag khrig stong phrag du ma yang ston te/ /byang chub spyod pa de sems 'gro ba myos par 'gyur/ /mkhas pa legs ldan 'di gnas gom pa bor ba tsam/ /sa dgu'i bar
232b6(phal chen): du gnas pas shes par mi nus na/ /sems can gzhan gyis shes par mi 'gyur smos ci dgos/ /dus gsum nyan thos rang rgyal kun gyis de bzhin no/ /'di gnas
232b7(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen par 'gro ba kun la ston/ /shes pa dus gsum kun tu thogs med zhi chos can/ /zhing rnams kun tu rgyas bkang chos rnams kun gyi bar/ /rgyal
233a1(phal chen): ba kun gyi yon tan brjod cing ston par byed/ /mkhas pa 'di la gnas pa sangs rgyas mchod byed cing / /phyogs rnams kun tu zhing dang chos kyi
233a2(phal chen): dbyings bkang ste/ /rgyal ba mngon du mchod pas mchod byed 'phrogs pa med/ /yon tan kun ldan sa yi lha yi lha zhes bya/ /mkhas pa 'di gnas shes rab snang bas
233a3(phal chen): 'gro kun gyi/ /mun pa kun bsal chos kyi tshul yang rab tu ston/ /dbang phyug dam pa'i mthu yis 'gro ba'i 'dod chags sel/ /de bas rgyal sras nyon mongs sel
233a4(phal chen): la mkhas zhes bya/ /'di la gnas pa de dag khams gsum dbang phyug 'gyur/ /ye shes tshul shes theg pa gsum po ston la mkhas/ /skad cig yud tsam gcig
233a5(phal chen): gis ting 'dzin gcig min 'thob/ /phyogs bcu kun tu rgyal ba'i dam pa gcig min ston/ /'di ni bdag gis rgyal sras sa rnams mdor bstan gyi/ /rgya cher
233a6(phal chen): bskal pa brgya phrag stong gis bstan mi nus/ /yon tan 'di 'dra'i sangs rgyas ye shes sa 'di la/ /gnas pa rtag tu ri yi rgyal po bzhin mi g.yo/ /rgyal sras thog
233a7(phal chen): ma gtsug lag kun gyis mi g.yo ste/ /sman gyi rnam pa kun gnas ri rgyal gangs bzhin no/ /tshul khrims thos pas gnyis pa spos ngad spos dang 'dra/ /rnam 'dal
233b1(phal chen): me tog ji bzhin gsum pa shes par bya/ /lam la mos bzhin mi 'khrugs 'od 'phro thob pa ste/ /drang srong gnas bzhin mkhas pa rnams kyi rten gyur pa'o/ /gnod sbyin gnya'
233b2(phal chen): shing 'dzin bzhin bsam yas lnga pa thob/ /rta rna'i shing tog 'dra bar drug pa'i 'bras bu ste/ /bdun pas 'dzin klu bzhin shes rab chen pos thob/ khor yug dbang ldan
233b3(phal chen): bzhin du brgyad pa dbang can 'thob/ /dgu pa dri ma sel ba dpal can lha min bzhin/ /bcu pa rgyal ba'i legs ldan ri rab lha gnas 'dra/ /dang po smon lam sngon 'gro
233b4(phal chen): gong ma tshul khrims tshogs/ /gsum pa spyod pa'i yon tan bzhi pa gcig gi dngos/ /lnga pa dge mang drug pa shin tu zab pa'i dngos/ /brgyad pa blo gros yangs pa kun tu
233b5(phal chen): gcig min rgyan/ /dgu pa mkhas pa ye shes phra zhing zab dang ldan/ /'gro rgyud thams cad ye shes ldan pas rab tu gnon/ /bcu pa rgyal ba rnams las yang dag chos
233b6(phal chen): 'dzin te/ /rgyal sras spyod pa mi sgul rgya mtsho de 'dra'o/ /spyod pa bcu 'das thog ma'i sems rab skye bar 'gyur/ /dka' thub brtul bas gnyis pa gsum pa bsam gtan
233b7(phal chen): gyis/ /dag pas bzhi pa shin tu byang bas lnga pa'o/ /drug pa rnon pos rtogs pa bdun pa mi phyed sa/ /brgyad pa mthu chen rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan ldan pa yin/ /dgu la ye shes
234a1(phal chen): ldan pas thibs po'i spyod pa shes/ /bcu la rgyal bas dbang bskur rgyal po dbang thob bzhin/ /yon tan rin chen dag pas de bzhin rim du 'phar//
234a2(phal chen): phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing rnams bshig ste bgrang bar nus/ /rnam shes gcig gis 'gro ba kun sems shes par rung / /nam mkha'i dbyings kun skra yis gzhal
234a3(phal chen): bar nus srid kyi/ /rgyal ba'i yon tan bskal pa khrag khrig bshad mi nus/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mngon
234a4(phal chen): par gnang ste/ yid dga' bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos de skad ces smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gzhan 'phrul dbang
234a5(phal chen): byed kyi lha'i nang na bzhugs shing mngon par sangs rgyas nas ring por ma lon te/ zhag bdun pa gnyis la bab pa'i tshe/ lha'i rgyal po dbang byed kyi gzhal med
234a6(phal chen): khang nor bu rin po che'i snying po can na bzhugs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos bshad pa la mngon par dgyes pa mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i
234a7(phal chen): 'khor de dag thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po dang /
234b1(phal chen): dbang phyug chen po dang / gtsang ma'i ris su gtogs pa'i 'khor thams cad kyang mngon par dga'o/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/
234b2(phal chen): sa bcu'i le'u ste/ sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// //bam po lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs la/ byang chub
234b3(phal chen): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la sogs pa thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
234b4(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid du phyogs bcu nas byang
234b5(phal chen): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyi snying po can la 'khod pa bcu 'thon par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re zhing
234b6(phal chen): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyi snying po can la 'khod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang
234b7(phal chen): brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas pa sha stag go / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
235a1(phal chen): dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu snang ba mdzod kyi snying pos byung
235a2(phal chen): ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zab mo'i mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
235a3(phal chen): dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin sgra zab mo rnam pa tha dad pa'i mdzod kyi snying
235a4(phal chen): pos byung ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje mi phyed pa'i gtsug gi mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems
235a5(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngag gi lam mi g.yo bar kun tu 'gro ba'i 'od zer snang ba'i gzi brjid kyi mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
235a6(phal chen): sems dpa' chen po grags pa snyan par kun tu rnam par grags pa'i 'od kyi gzi brjid kyi mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
235a7(phal chen): sems dpa' chen po ri'i rgyal po mi g.yo ba'i 'od zer snang ba'i gzi brjid kyi mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
235b1(phal chen): dpa' chen po kun nas blta ba'i gzugs rnam par dmigs pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyal po snang ba'i gzi brjid kyi mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
235b2(phal chen): dpa' chen po stobs bcu rnam par dag pa thub pa med pa'i 'od zer snang ba'i gzi brjid kyi mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba dag ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
235b3(phal chen): chen po de dag de ltar 'thon ma thag tu de'i mod la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag
235b4(phal chen): thams cad kyang langs par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i 'od ma gtogs par 'od thams cad kyang mi snang bar gyur te/ thams
235b5(phal chen): cad kyang zil gyis non par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa mang po'ang mngon par byung bar gyur te/
235b6(phal chen): 'di ltar spos kyi sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab par byed pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to/ /me tog gi sprin chos kyi dbyings thams
235b7(phal chen): cad rgyas par khyab pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i char mngon par bab par gyur to/ /byug pa'i sprin chos kyi dbyings thams
236a1(phal chen): cad rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to/ /gdugs kyi sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab
236a2(phal chen): pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to/ /gos kyi sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par
236a3(phal chen): bab par gyur to/ /rin po che'i sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to/ /rgyal mtshan gyi sprin
236a4(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to/ /ba dan gyi sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa bye
236a5(phal chen): ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa'i sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab par bye ba khrag
236a6(phal chen): khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrag
236a7(phal chen): khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to/ /'od zer gyi dra ba snang ba chen po'i sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char
236b1(phal chen): mngon par bab par gyur to/ /rin po che sna tshogs kyi gzhal med khang gi sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par bab
236b2(phal chen): par gyur to/ /snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba'i sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to/ /de bzhin
236b3(phal chen): gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan snang ba'i gos kyi sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to/ /byang chub
236b4(phal chen): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi seng ge'i khri mang po de dag las/ byang chub sems dpa' re re'i seng ge'i khri'i rgyan rin po che rnam par dag pa re re dang /
236b5(phal chen): dmigs pa mang po de dag thams cad las dmigs pa re re las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad yongs su snang bar gyur to/ /dmigs pa mang po
236b6(phal chen): de dag thams cad las dmigs pa re re zhing yang sems can gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad yongs su snang bar gyur to/ /dmigs pa mang po de dag thams cad
236b7(phal chen): las dmigs pa re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'byams klas pa thams cad yongs su snang bar gyur to/ /dmigs pa mang po de dag thams cad las dmigs pa
237a1(phal chen): re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' 'byams klas pa thams cad yongs su snang bar gyur to/ /dmigs pa mang po de dag thams cad las dmigs
237a2(phal chen): pa re re zhing yang dus 'byams klas pa thams cad yongs su snang bar gyur te/ /dmigs pa mang po de dag las dmigs pa re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams thams
237a3(phal chen): cad kyi 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang bcas pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang
237a4(phal chen): bcas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa/ sems can 'dul ba
237a5(phal chen): dang bcas pa/ ming gi 'khor lo dang bcas pa mang po yongs su snang bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i dus dag tu
237a6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad par gyur pa de dag kyang yongs su snang bar gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi zhabs
237a7(phal chen): kyi drung na 'khod cing / pha rol tu phyin pa de dag thams cad yongs su sbyong ba yang yongs su snang bar gyur to/ /dmigs pa mang po de dag thams cad las
237b1(phal chen): dmigs pa re re zhing yang phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i dus kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa/ sangs rgyas skye ba dang bcas pa/
237b2(phal chen): chos kyi 'khor lo dang bcas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa/ sems
237b3(phal chen): can 'dul ba dang bcas pa/ ming gi 'khor lo dang bcas pa mang po yongs su snang bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i dus dag
237b4(phal chen): tu 'jig rten gyi khams gang du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad par gyur pa de dag kyang yongs su snang bar gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi zhabs kyi drung
237b5(phal chen): na 'khod cing / pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong ba byed pa dag kyang yongs su snang bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'di snyam du gyur te/ byang chub sems
237b6(phal chen): dpa' 'di dag 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa na gang dang gang nas lhags / de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang dang gang gi zhabs kyi drung nas phyin snyam ste/ byang
237b7(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye| rgyal
238a1(phal chen): ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag lhags na gang nas lhags/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa ni gang shed nas/ de bzhin
238a2(phal chen): gshegs pa ni gang zhig gi zhabs kyi drung nas 'dir phyin/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi
238a3(phal chen): dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye|rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de bas na khyed nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag 'jig rten gyi khams
238a4(phal chen): ni gang nas lhags/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang zhig gi zhabs kyi drung nas phyin pa yongs su brtags pa dang / yongs su dpyad pa gyis shig/ de nas byang chub sems
238a5(phal chen): dpa' chags pa med pa'i mig gis kun tu 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par
238a6(phal chen): phye ba zhes bya ba dang / mngon par shes pa thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dang / dmigs pa thams cad shin tu rnam par phye ba'i snying po zhes bya ba dang / sems
238a7(phal chen): can thams cad kyi lus mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi gzhi rab tu rtogs
238b1(phal chen): pa zhes bya ba dag la mnyam par gzhag go/ de ltar de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu la byang chub
238b2(phal chen): sems dpa' re res kyang mnyam par bzhag ste/ kun gyis byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gzhan dang / gzhan sha stag la snyoms par bzhag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams
238b3(phal chen): 'byams klas pa de dag kyang ma mthong / de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi zhabs kyi drung na byang chub sems dpa' de dag tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa de dag kyang ma mthong nas/
238b4(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin de dag las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye|rgyal ba'i sras/ bdag cag byang chub
238b5(phal chen): s ems dpa' re res kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu la mnyam par bzhag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams
238b6(phal chen): klas pa de dag kyang ma mthong / byang chub sems dpa' de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gi zhabs kyi drung na tshangs par spyod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
238b7(phal chen): kyang ma mthong ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos yang byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag la smras pa/ kye|
239a1(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras dag/ da dung du byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa gang nas lhags pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
239a2(phal chen): pa gang zhig gi zhabs kyi drung nas lhags pa brtags par gyis shig/ dpyad par gyis shig /'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa de dag ni mthong bar dka'o/ /
239a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gi zhabs kyi drung na byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang / de bas
239a4(phal chen): kyang shin tu mthong bar dka'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag las byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi
239a5(phal chen): zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la mnyam par bzhag go/ de ltar mnyam par bzhag kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas
239a6(phal chen): pa de dag kyang ma mthong / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gi zhabs kyi drung na/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i de bzhin gshegs
239a7(phal chen): pa de dag kyang ma mthong ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ting nge 'dzin de dag las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po
239b1(phal chen): la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' re res byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
239b2(phal chen): snyed la mnyam par bzhag kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa de dag kyang ma mthong ngo / /gang gi zhabs kyi drung na byang chub sems dpa' de dag tshangs pa'i spyad
239b3(phal chen): pa spyod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang ma mthong ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po stan de las nam mkha'i dbyings su 'phags
239b4(phal chen): te| bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
239b5(phal chen): kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chags pa mi mnga' ba'i rgyan dang ldan pa dus gsum mtshungs par mnyam pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams
239b6(phal chen): klas pa thams cad kun tu khyab pa chos kyi dbyings kyi khongs su chud pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa 'di la ltos shig dang /
239b7(phal chen): de la 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad kyang gzugs brnyan du gyur par snang ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa 'byams klas pa thams cad kyang gzugs
240a1(phal chen): brnyan du gyur bar snang ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' 'byams klas pa thams cad kyang gzugs brnyan du gyur par snang ngo / /sems can gyi khams
240a2(phal chen): 'byams klas pa thams cad kyang gzugs brnyan du gyur par snang ngo / /lam gyi rgyud 'byams klas pa thams cad kyang gzugs brnyan du gyur bar snang ngo / /kye/ rgyal ba'i
240a3(phal chen): sras dag/ de bas na khyed kyis rang gi lus kun tu lta ba'i mig dang ldan par byin gyis rlobs la/ shes rab kyi mig nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas par byin gyis
240a4(phal chen): rlob ste/ ye shes yangs pa'i mig dmigs pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba khong du chud par gyis la/ phyogs 'byams klas pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs
240a5(phal chen): pa thams cad byin gyis rlobs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thams cad du mi gnas pa 'di la gnas pa thams cad yongs su bsal ba'i lta bas ltos shig
240a6(phal chen): mngon par zhen pa thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa dang / srid pa thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa dang / shin tu phra ba'i tshul gyis stobs bcu'i stobs
240a7(phal chen): yongs su non pa dang / dmigs pa chung ngu la rgya chen por 'jug pa'i lta bas ltos shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'
240b1(phal chen): sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i gdams ngag bzhin du thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas sems shing rtog pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
240b2(phal chen): kyi mthil gnyis kyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong yod pa la 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod pa mthong bar gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na de
240b3(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyan gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /chos ston to/ /de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang
240b4(phal chen): ba mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin
240b5(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te 'ongs nas/ seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyi snying po can la 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs byin pa ri
240b6(phal chen): dwags e na ya'i byin pa lta bu gnyis la 'jig rten gyi khams chags pa med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rgya mtsho chags pa med
240b7(phal chen): cing dri ma med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /chos ston to/ /de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' zab mo'i chos mdzod kyi snying pos
241a1(phal chen): byung ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul
241a2(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te 'ongs nas/ seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyi snying po can la 'dug go/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs
241a3(phal chen): pus mo gnyis kyi lha nga la 'jig rten gyi khams sa la sbram yod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'bar ba dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing
241a4(phal chen): 'tsho skyong ngo / /chos ston to/ /de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi gzi brjid mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i
241a5(phal chen): ' khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i dul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te 'ongs
241a6(phal chen): nas/ seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i snying po can la 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku sta zur gyi dkyil 'khor la 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna tshogs kyi
241a7(phal chen): rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba sna tshogs kyi snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /chos ston to/ /de'i sangs rgyas kyi
241b1(phal chen): z hing nas byang chub sems dpa'i sprin sgra zab mo rnam pa tha dad pa'i mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i
241b2(phal chen): yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te 'ongs nas/ seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyi snying
241b3(phal chen): po can la 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku lte ba'i dkyil 'khor na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
241b4(phal chen): par snang mdzad gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /chos ston to/ /de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje mi phyed pa'i gtsug gi
241b5(phal chen): m dzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra
241b6(phal chen): ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te 'ongs nas/ seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i snying po can la 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka na 'jig rten gyi khams
241b7(phal chen): dpal gyi 'od zer snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi be'u rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /chos ston
242a1(phal chen): t o| |de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' ngag gi lam mi g.yo bar kun tu 'gro ba'i 'od zer snang ba'i gzi brjid kyi mdzod kyi snying
242a2(phal chen): p os byung ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
242a3(phal chen): snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te 'ongs nas/ seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyi snying po can la 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku phrag pa'i lhun gnyis
242a4(phal chen): la 'jig rten gyi khams gsar yod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'bar ba'i snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /chos ston
242a5(phal chen): to| |de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' grags pa snyan par kun tu rnam par grags pa'i 'od kyi gzi brjid mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba / b
242a6(phal chen): yang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor
242a7(phal chen): cing mdun du byas te 'ongs nas/ seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyis snying po can la 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhal gyi gsung
242b1(phal chen): gi dbyangs la 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dpag tu med pa'i gzi brjid kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyal po
242b2(phal chen): zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /chos ston to/ /de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' ri'i rgyal po mi g.yo ba'i 'od zer snang ba'i gzi brjid mdzod kyi
242b3(phal chen): snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra
242b4(phal chen): ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te 'ongs nas/ seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyi snying po can la 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi smin
242b5(phal chen): mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dus gsum du mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba
242b6(phal chen): bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /chos ston to/ /de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' kun nas blta ba'i gzugs rnam par dmigs pa'i 'od zer gyi
242b7(phal chen): rgyal po snang ba'i gzi brjid mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye
243a1(phal chen): ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te 'ongs nas/ seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyi snying po
243a2(phal chen): can la 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbu la 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi spyi'u tshugs kyi lhun yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de
243a3(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog brtsegs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /chos ston to/ /de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' stobs
243a4(phal chen): bcu rnam par dag pa thub pa med pa'i 'od zer snang ba'i gzi brjid mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du
243a5(phal chen): med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te 'ongs nas/ seng ge'i khri chags pa
243a6(phal chen): med pa'i rgyan gyi snying po can la 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag dang / de bzhin gshegs
243a7(phal chen): pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong bar gyur
243b1(phal chen): n as| byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad las byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing
243b2(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thob par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang gzungs chos thams cad kyi sa la sogs pa gzungs sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin
243b3(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed thob par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdul dang bral ba'i snying po la sogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sangs
243b4(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thob par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad las byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang stobs kyi glog la sogs
243b5(phal chen): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi glog sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thob par gyur to/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag/ chos kyi sgo 'di dag ni bsam pa rdo rje dam
243b6(phal chen): pa lta bur byas te yongs su chub par bya'o/ /rim gro chen po dang ldan pa'i bsam pas yongs su bsrung bar bya'o/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag/ chos kyi sgo 'di dag ni /
243b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams ma gtogs par gzhan gyi
244a1(phal chen): rna lam du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems
244a2(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yid dga' ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos smras pa la mngon par dga'o/ /shin tu rgyas
244a3(phal chen): pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ kun tu bzang pos bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //bam
244a4(phal chen): po lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma mngon par sangs rgyas pa pho brang 'od thams cad kyi snying po can na de bzhin du mnyam par bzhag par bcom ldan
244a5(phal chen): 'das bsam gtan khrag khrig brgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / thams cad kyis mi phyed pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas thob pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / de bzhin
244a6(phal chen): gshegs pa'i sku shin tu dag pa dang / gnas med pa la rten pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / mi gnyis pa'i zhi gnas dang yang dag par ldan pa dang / tshad med par khyab
244a7(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid dang / mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan gyi rgyud dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyis rnam par dmigs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lta ba dang /
244b1(phal chen): dus la bab pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / skad cig gcig gis byung ba'i mtshan nyid med pa la spyod pas bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba byang chub sems
244b2(phal chen): dpa'i rnam par dgod pa la rab tu gnas pa/ mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyis byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i
244b3(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin kun tu lta ba rab tu thob pa/ 'gro ba thams cad bde bar byed pa'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa/ bdud kyi dpung thams cad rab tu 'joms pa/ thams cad
244b4(phal chen): mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du rab tu zhi bar gnas pas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa mi gnas pa la gnas pa/ sangs
244b5(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i gtsug dang / gzhal du med pa'i blo gros dang / zhi ba'i blo gros
244b6(phal chen): dang / gtong ba'i blo gros dang / klu'i blo gros dang / thob pa'i blo gros dang / spyin pa'i blo gros dang / stobs kyi blo gros dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i blo gros dang /
244b7(phal chen): chags pa med pa'i blo gros dang / mchog gi blo gros dang / lha'i blo gros dang / mchod sbyin byas pa'i blo gros dang / mthu'i blo gros dang / don gyi blo gros dang / chos
245a1(phal chen): la dbang po'i blo gros dang / chos kyi blo gros dang / zhi ba'i blo gros dang / nam mkha'i blo gros dang / skad cig gcig gi blo gros dang /
245a2(phal chen): legs pa'i blo gros dang / sdom pa'i blo gros dang / nam mkha'i blo gros dang / stobs kyi blo gros dang / glang po'i blo gros dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthu'i blo
245a3(phal chen): gros dang / don rnam par dmigs pa'i blo gros dang / dam pa'i blo gros dang / ye shes snang ba'i blo gros dang / 'phags pa'i blo gros dang / dran pa'i rgyan dang /
245a4(phal chen): dngos po med pa'i mthar phyin pa dang / rang bzhin gyi rgyan dang / yul zab mo dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas pa dang / klu'i 'od dang / snang ba
245a5(phal chen): 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rim gro la brtson pa dang / sems kyi rgyal po dang / spyod pa gcig pa dang / mngon par shes pa ma nyams pa dang / ye shes kyi
245a6(phal chen): tshogs dang / yon tan 'byung gnas dang / chos kyi sgron ma dang / 'gro ba'i bdag po dang / 'gro ba 'dzin pa dang / bde ba byed pa dang / mchog tu gyur pa
245a7(phal chen): dang / bla na med pa dang / mnyam pa med pa dang / 'dra ba med pa dang / 'od thogs pa med pa dang / 'od rab tu snang ba dang / grags pa'i 'od dang / shin tu
245b1(phal chen): rnam par snang ba dang / legs pa brtan pa dang / chos kyi char pa dang / thig le dam pa dang / ye shes kyi mig dang / chos kyi mig dang / shes rab kyi sprin dang / sa'i rgyal po
245b2(phal chen): dang / smon lam khyad par du thogs pa med pas 'gro ba dang / ye shes kyi snying po dang / bsam pa'i rgyal po dang / nang gi blo gros yang dag par grub pa dang / thams cad
245b3(phal chen): mkhyen pa'i spyod yul dang / sa'i stabs kyis rnam par gnon pa dang / sa dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa 'dzin pa dang / zla ba bzang po dang / ri bo chen po'i dpal dang /
245b4(phal chen): rin po che chen po'i dpal dang / bar snang gi rgyud dang / khams chen po'i rgyal po dang / dkyil 'khor mnyam pa khong du chud pa dang / gzi brjid gzhan gyis mi pham pa
245b5(phal chen): dang | klu chen po'i lta ba'i dpal dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang tshul dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo yang dag par 'dzin pa'i dpal
245b6(phal chen): dang | dran pa'i yul nyams pa med pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i blo gros kyis rnam par rtogs pa dang / mtha' dang dbus med pa'i blos rnam par rol pa dang /
245b7(phal chen): mdzod zad mi shes pa dang / ye shes nyi ma'i dpal dang / chos kyi nyi ma dang / ye shes phun sum tshogs pa'i snying po dang / blo dam pa'i char 'bebs pa dang / kun
246a1(phal chen): tu blta ba dang / blta na don yod pa dang / rdo rje'i mngon par shes pa dang / ye shes rdo rje'i blo gros dang / kun tu mig gi dpal dang / sangs rgyas kyi
246a2(phal chen): don gyi nyi ma dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdo rje yang dag par gzung ba'i bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig gi yul kun tu ye shes kyi rgyan dang /
246a3(phal chen): de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang / sngon bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang
246a4(phal chen): mdzad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba la grogs su gyur pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mig de'i tshe/
246a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi mthus stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal
246a6(phal chen): mos btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te bdag gis zhus nas zhus pa'i lung bstan par bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye bar
246a7(phal chen): gnang na/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs gcig cig zhu'o/ /de skad ces gsol ba dang /
246b1(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu mig la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun tu mig khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la ci dang ci 'dod
246b2(phal chen): pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems tshim par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mig gis bcom
246b3(phal chen): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa du dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i sgo
246b4(phal chen): dang / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam du ldan pa rnams ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa la snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang ba lags/ ting nge 'dzin
246b5(phal chen): gyi khyad par gyi gnas 'thob pa lags/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par ldang ba la mkhas pa rgyun
246b6(phal chen): mi 'chad pa 'thob pa lags/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi khyu mchog gi mthu dang rnam par 'phrul pa dang ldan pa lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
246b7(phal chen): kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mig la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun tu mig khyod kyis de ltar 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i byang chub
247a1(phal chen): sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi don du de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'dri bar
247a2(phal chen): bsams pa legs so/ /legs so/ /kun tu mig/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa
247a3(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi mthu bsgrub par dka' ba dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa tshad med pas mngon par byung ba/
247a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa la shin tu bslabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam sgrub par dka' bas rnam par sbyangs pa/ byang chub
247a5(phal chen): sems dpa'i 'byung ba'i phyir mi ldog pa dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul mtha' yas pas rnam par sbyangs pa/ gzungs 'thob par bya ba mu med pa dang ldan pa/ tha dad
247a6(phal chen): pa yang dag par shes pa zad mi shes pas thogs pa med par rnam par dag pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la skyo ba med pa thob pa'i snying rje chen pos phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i
247a7(phal chen): smon lam dang ldan pa 'di 'khor 'dir 'dus te/ 'dug pa yin gyi/ de la dris shig dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'phrul pa ston to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'i
247b1(phal chen): 'khor de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ming thos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa mngon du gyur to/ /chags pa med pa'i
247b2(phal chen): sems rnam par phye bas kyang byin gyis brlabs par gyur to/ /ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab par 'jug par bya ba la'ang rab tu gzhol bar gyur to/ /ye shes mi 'phrogs
247b3(phal chen): pa'i spyod yul yang rab tu byung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med pa mthong zhing rnam par dmigs pa yang mngon du gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs tshad
247b4(phal chen): med pa yang khong du chud par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig pa yang rjes su rtogs par gyur to/ /dus gsum mtha' yas pa la 'jug pa yang
247b5(phal chen): khong du chud par gyur to/ /bsod nams zad mi shes pa'i byin kyang thob par gyur to/ /rnam par 'phrul pa bzang po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'ang khong du chud par gyur nas/
247b6(phal chen): de dag thams cad kyis rim gro dang bcas shing rjes dang bcas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du lta bar gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs
247b7(phal chen): pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i rdzu 'phrul gyi khyu mchog gi mthus byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po yang ma mthong / byang chub
248a1(phal chen): sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lus kyang ma mthong / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po gang na gnas pa'i stan yang ma mthong ngo / /de nas
248a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po da ltar ga la mchis/
248a3(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun tu mig /'khor 'di nyid na nga'i zhabs kyi drung na 'jug go /nga'i zhabs kyi drung na spyod do/ /nga'i zhabs kyi drung nas ma g.yos
248a4(phal chen): so| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mig dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad kyis yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par
248a5(phal chen): bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis kun tu bzang po de ma mthong ngo / /de'i lus kyang ma mthong ngo / /
248a6(phal chen): de'i stan yang ma mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /khyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lus ma mthong zhing /
248a7(phal chen): stan ma mthong ba ni de de bzhin te yus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po de ni brjod du med cing zab pa la gnas pa ste/ 'di
248b1(phal chen): ltar ye shes kyi dbyings mtha' yas par 'jug pa la zhugs pa'o/ /seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul bla na med pa rab tu
248b2(phal chen): thob pa'o/ /chags pa med pa'i mthas rnam par dag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus grub pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings dam pa'i las dang ldan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas
248b3(phal chen): thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs la gnas pa'o/ /'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / ye shes tha mi dad pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa'o/ /'di lta
248b4(phal chen): ste| byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po 'di ni/ sems skad cig gi mtha'i rjes su 'brang ba'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mig gis de bzhin gshegs
248b5(phal chen): pa las kun tu bzang po'i yon tan rnam par dag pa thos ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu la mnyam par bzhag ste/ byang
248b6(phal chen): chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mngon par 'dod cing / mthong bar bya ba dang / gsol ba gdab pa'i bsam pas tshol lo/ /yongs su tshol lo/ /rab tu rtog go/ shin tu
248b7(phal chen): zhib cing brtags par rnam par dpyod do/ /rjes su rtog go /rnam par blta'o/ /'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mig gis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang
249a1(phal chen): po ma mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad kyis kyang mthong par ma gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mig
249a2(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ting nge 'dzin grangs ma mchis pa stong phrag bcu la mnyam par bzhag
249a3(phal chen): ste| rnam par bltas kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ma mthong ngo / /de'i lus kyi las kyang ma mthong ngo / /de'i ngag dang ngag gi las kyang ma thos so/ /de'i yid
249a4(phal chen): dang yid kyi las kyang ma mthong ngo / /de'i stan yang ma mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po de gang na mchis pa dang / spyod pa'i phyogs
249a5(phal chen): de yang ma mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun tu mig /de ni de bzhin te/ khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po de mi mthong ngo / /
249a6(phal chen): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la shin tu bslabs pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'o/ /kun
249a7(phal chen): tu mig / de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs mang po sgyu ma'i sngags kyi yi ge gang la gnas pa dmigs par nus sam/ btsun pa
249b1(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun tu mig/ sgyu ma'i sngags kyi gzugs kyi rnam pa de dag kyang dmigs shing bstan par mi
249b2(phal chen): nus na/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lus kyi spyod yul gsang ba dang / ngag gi spyod yul gsang ba dang / yid kyi spyod yul gsang ba la 'jug par mi nus
249b3(phal chen): pa dang / mthong bar mi nus pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ni zab cing bsam gyis mi khyab par rnam par spyod pa'o/ /
249b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ni tshad med cing tshad las 'das pa ste/ ye shes rdo rje'i blo dang ldan pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa la yang dag
249b5(phal chen): par gnas pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gnas med par spyod cing / sems can thams cad kyi lus dang gzugs kyi rjes su zhugs pa'o/ /blang ba med
249b6(phal chen): pa'i chos kyi tshul dang ldan pa'o/ /mi zad cing tha mi dad pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / khyu mchog gi mthu la lhun gyis grub par gnas pa'i mthar phyin pa'o/ /byang chub sems
249b7(phal chen): dpa' kun tu bzang po ni chos kyi dbyings khong du chud pa dang ldan pa'o/ /de ltar/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ni blta na don yod pa'o/ /mnyan
250a1(phal chen): pa don yod pa'o/ /bsnyen bkur byed pa don yod pa'o/ /bsam pa don yod pa'o/ /rjes su dran pa don yod pa'o/ /de la dad par byas pa don yod
250a2(phal chen): pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po de ni mthong ba don yod pa'o/ /thos pa don yod pa'o/ /bsnyen bkur ba don yod pa'o/ /bsam pa don yod pa'o/ /rjes
250a3(phal chen): su dran par byas pa don yod pa'o/ /de la mos par byas pa don yod pa'o/ /blta ba don yod pa'o/ /brtags pa don yod pa'o/ /btsal ba don yod pa'o/ /byang chub
250a4(phal chen): sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ni rjes su smon lam gdab pa don yod pa'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mig dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag
250a5(phal chen): thams cad/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar 'dod cing thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag
