340b6(phal chen): tu bzang po'i smon lam gyi yongs su rdzogs par bya ba sangs rgyas kyi rigs 'byams klas pa tshad med pa'i don du zhugs pa las phyir ldog pa med do/ /phyogs thams cad kyi sangs
340b7(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud pa dag tu 'gro zhing yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /kye|rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
341a1(phal chen): s ems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dngos po med pa la gnas shing mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i rdzu 'phrul zhes bya ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad
341a2(phal chen): du 'gro ba'i ye shes kyi mngon par shes pa ste drug pa'o/ /kye|rgyal ba'i sras dag /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi khams sangs
341a3(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi skad sna tshogs rab tu shes te/ 'phags pa'i skad shes so/ /
341a4(phal chen): 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skad shes so/ /lha'i skad shes so/ /klu'i skad shes so/ /gnod sbyin gyi skad shes so/ /lha ma yin gyi skad shes so/ /nam mkha' lding gi skad
341a5(phal chen): shes so/ /mi'am ci'i skad shes so/ /lto 'phye chen po'i skad shes so/ /mi'i skad shes so/ /mi ma yin pa'i skad shes pa nas/ sems can gyi ris brjod du med pa'i yang
341a6(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i bar gyi sems can gyi skad rnam pa sna tshogs shes pa dang / sgra dang / tshig dang / brda rnams rab tu shes te / rnam par dgod pa'i mkhas pa thams cad
341a7(phal chen): la rab tu 'jug go / brda la 'jug pa thams cad rab tu shes so/ /spyod pa rnam par dgod pa thams cad rab tu shes so/ /skad rnam par dbye ba thams cad rab tu shes
341b1(phal chen): so| |skad rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho thams cad la rab tu 'jug ste/ de ji lta ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa de lta de ltar sems can gyi khams la 'jug go /ji lta ji
341b2(phal chen): ltar sems can gyi khams la 'jug pa de lta de ltar skad rnam par phye ba thams cad khong du chud par byed de/ de la sems can gzhan gyi skad kyis rmongs par 'gyur ba med do//
341b3(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ lha'i bu nyi ma ni shar ma thag tu gzugs rnam par phye ba'i rgyud thams cad snang bar byed do/ /de nas mig dang ldan pa rnams gzugs de dang de dag mthong
341b4(phal chen): pas mtshan ma yongs su 'dzin to/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang skad kyi sprin rnam par phye ba thams cad la 'jug ste/ skad thams cad mngon par shes pa'i ye
341b5(phal chen): shes kyis skad dang dbyangs kyi tshul mkhas pa la 'jug cing / khong du chud par byed do/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skad
341b6(phal chen): kyi tshul thams cad la mkhas pa zhes bya ba ste/ ye shes kyi mngon par shes pa bdun pa'o/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dang / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
341b7(phal chen): po| chos thams cad kha dog dang bral bar rab tu shes te/ tha mi dad pa'i kha dog dang / rnam pa med pa'i kha dog dang / bye brag med pa'i kha dog dang / rnam par dbye ba med pa'i
342a1(phal chen): kha dog dang / sngon po med pa'i kha dog dang / ser po med pa'i kha dog dang / dkar po med pa'i kha dog dang / nag po med pa'i kha dog dang / dmar
342a2(phal chen): po med pa yang rab tu shes te/ de de bas kyang chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par byed pa'i tshe/ rang gi lus kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan par byin gyis rlob ste/ mtha' yas
342a3(phal chen): pa'i kha dog dang / tshad med pa'i kha dog dang / rnam par dag pa'i kha dog dang / shin tu brgyan pa'i kha dog dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i kha dog dang / dpe med
342a4(phal chen): pa'i kha dog dang / kun tu snang ba'i kha dog dang / yid du 'ong ba'i kha dog dang / mi sdug pa med pa'i kha dog dang / zad mi shes pa'i kha dog dang / shin tu gsal ba'i
342a5(phal chen): kha dog dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa'i kha dog dang / mthu chen po dang ldan pa'i kha dog dang / thub par dka' ba'i kha dog dang / nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i kha dog dang /
342a6(phal chen): shin tu bsgrubs pa'i kha dog dang / shin tu mdzes pa'i kha dog dang / dpag tu med pa'i kha dog dang / shin tu bsrungs pa'i kha dog dang / shin tu bsags pa'i kha
342a7(phal chen): dog dang / yongs su smin par byed pa'i kha dog dang / 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrubs pa'i kha dog dang / thogs pa med pa'i kha dog dang / shin tu dang ba'i kha
342b1(phal chen): dog dang / rnyog pa med pa'i kha dog dang / rab tu gsal ba'i kha dog dang / mdangs dang ldan pa'i kha dog dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul dang ldan pa'i kha dog dang /
342b2(phal chen): zil gyis gnon pa'i kha dog dang / thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i kha dog dang / thams cad zil du brlag pa'i kha dog dang / thams cad zil du rlog par byed pa'i
342b3(phal chen): kha dog dang / rab rib med pa'i kha dog dang / mun pa med pa'i kha dog dang / shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i kha dog dang / sems bde ba'i kha dog dang / mtshan sna tshogs
342b4(phal chen): dang ldan pa'i kha dog dang / dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i kha dog dang / che ba nyid dang ldan pa'i kha dog dang / spyod yul dang ldan pa'i kha dog dang / yang dag
342b5(phal chen): par bsgrubs pa'i kha dog dang / bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i kha dog dang / shin tu sbyangs pa'i kha dog dang / mchog tu byung zhing rgya che ba'i kha dog dang / thub pa med pa'i
342b6(phal chen): kha dog dang / gnas pa med pa'i kha dog dang / kun tu mtha' yas pa'i kha dog dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med par rab tu 'dal ba'i kha dog dang / rnam par
342b7(phal chen): 'phel ba'i kha dog dang / snying po bzung ba'i kha dog dang / yon tan mchog dang ldan pa'i kha dog dang / yid bzhin gyi kha dog dang / mos pa rnam par sbyong ba'i kha dog dang /
343a1(phal chen): tshogs shin tu bsags pa'i kha dog dang / chos bsgribs pa med par shin tu rtogs pa'i kha dog dang / nam mkha' ltar 'od dang ba'i kha dog
343a2(phal chen): dang / rnam par dag pas brgyan pa'i kha dog dang / dri ma med pa'i kha dog dang / rdul dang bral ba'i kha dog dang / rdul med pa'i kha dog dang / dri ma med pa'i kha dog dang / mtshungs
343a3(phal chen): pa med pa'i kha dog dang / blta na bzang ba'i kha dog dang / kun nas blta ba'i kha dog dang / dus bzhin du yang dag par ston pa'i kha dog dang / rab tu zhi ba'i kha dog dang /
343a4(phal chen): 'dod chags dang bral ba'i kha dog dang / 'od shin tu gsal ba'i kha dog dang / bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa'i kha dog dang / bde bar byed pa'i kha dog dang / 'jigs pa
343a5(phal chen): med par byed pa'i kha dog dang / gti mug med par spyod pa'i kha dog dang / ye shes kyis rnam par gnon pa'i kha dog dang / chags pa med pa'i lus kyi kha dog dang / lus kyi
343a6(phal chen): rgyan kun tu mtha' yas pa'i kha dog dang / don yod pa'i kha dog dang / byams pa chen pos yang dag par 'phags pa'i kha dog dang / snying rje chen pos byin gyis
343a7(phal chen): brlabs pa'i kha dog dang / tshul mthun par 'byung ba'i kha dog dang / bsod nams kyi stobs dang ldan pa'i kha dog dang / rjes su dran par bya ba'i kha dog dang / rin
343b1(phal chen): po che na mtha' yas pa'i kha dog dang / rin po che'i dam pa rnam par snang ba'i kha dog dang / 'gro ba thams cad dad par byed pa'i kha dog dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon du
343b2(phal chen): gyur pa'i kha dog dang / bzhin 'dzum pa'i kha dog dang / rin po che'i rgyan gyi dam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i kha dog dang / sems mi gnas pa'i kha dog dang / gnas med
343b3(phal chen): pa'i kha dog dang / byin gyi rlabs kyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i kha dog dang / rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du mas khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'i kha dog dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
343b4(phal chen): su yang dag par byung ba'i kha dog dang / 'dri ba med pa'i kha dog dang / chos kyi dbyings su 'dal ba'i kha dog dang / 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i kha dog dang / rnam pa
343b5(phal chen): sna tshogs kyi kha dog dang / shin tu grub pa'i kha dog dang / shin tu sbyangs pas rab tu byung ba'i kha dog dang / 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du spyod pa lam ston pa'i kha dog dang /
343b6(phal chen): blta na mi ngoms pa'i kha dog dang / rnam pa sna tshogs su 'od gsal ba'i kha dog dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba grangs med pa rab tu 'gyed pa'i kha dog dang / 'od sna tshogs brjod
343b7(phal chen): du med pa'i kha dog dang / dri zhim po dang 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pas khams gsum las yang dag par 'da' ba'i kha dog dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'i 'od zer
344a1(phal chen): gyis tshad med par snang ba'i kha dog dang / 'khor lo dpe med pa'i gzugs byin gyis rlob pa'i kha dog dang / me tog gi sprin yid du 'ong
344a2(phal chen): ba mtha' yas pa rab tu 'thor pa'i kha dog dang / phreng ba'i sprin gyi pad+mo sna tshogs su bsgrubs pas yang dag par brgyan pa'i kha dog dang / 'gro ba thams cad las
344a3(phal chen): shin tu 'das pa'i kha dog dang / spos zhim po thams cad kyi gsung 'byung bas spos 'phro ba 'gyed pa'i kha dog dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzod spu
344a4(phal chen): nas byung ba'i kha dog dang / sgra dbyangs brjod du med pas chos thams cad bstan pa yang dag par ston pa'i kha dog dang / rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i
344a5(phal chen): kun tu bzang po'i kha dog tu bdag gi lus byin gyis rlob ste/ kye | rgyal ba'i sras dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni kha dog med
344a6(phal chen): pa'i chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pas mthong bas 'dul ba dang / rjes su dran pas 'dul ba dang / chos kyi 'khor los 'dul ba dang / dus kyis 'dul ba dang /
344a7(phal chen): skad cig gis 'dul ba dang / bsnyen bkur bas 'dul ba dang / khong du chud par bya bas 'dul ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis 'dul ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa sna
344b1(phal chen): tshogs kyis 'dul ba dang / cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'dul ba rnams la rnam pa de lta bu'i kha dog tu rang gi lus byin gyis rlob bo/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di
344b2(phal chen): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi kha dog grangs med pa'i lus mngon par sgrub pa'i rgyan ces bya ba/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes 'gro ba thams cad
344b3(phal chen): yongs su 'grel ba la brtson pa ste brgyad pa'o/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad bdag med par rab tu shes
344b4(phal chen): so| / chos thams cad rigs med par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad 'ong ba med par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad 'bral ba med par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams
344b5(phal chen): cad bye brag med par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad tha dad pa med par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad gnyis su byar med par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad mi
344b6(phal chen): gnyis pa dang / mi gnyis pa ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad bdag nyid med par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad 'dra ba med par rab tu shes so/ /chos
344b7(phal chen): thams cad 'gro ba med par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad ma skyes par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad ma 'gags par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad 'pho ba med
345a1(phal chen): par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad 'jig pa med par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad bden pa med par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad
345a2(phal chen): rdzun pa med par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pas mtshan nyid gcig par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad yod pa'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /
345a3(phal chen): chos thams cad med pa'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad chos kyang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad chos ma yin pa'ang ma yin par rab tu
345a4(phal chen): shes so/ /chos thams cad spyod pa la gzhol ba'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad spyod pa la mi gzhol ba'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams
345a5(phal chen): cad las kyang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad las ma yin pa'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad rnam par smin pa ma yin par rab tu
345a6(phal chen): shes so/ /chos thams cad rnam par smin pa ma yin pa'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba med par yang rab tu shes so/ /chos thams
345a7(phal chen): cad mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad brda yang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad brda ma yin pa'ang ma yin
345b1(phal chen): par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad don dam pa'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad don dam pa ma yin pa'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams
345b2(phal chen): cad 'byung ba'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad mi 'byung ba'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad 'byin pa'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos
345b3(phal chen): thams cad mi 'byin pa yang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad tshad med par yang rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad tshad med pa ma yin par yang rab tu shes
345b4(phal chen): so/ /chos thams cad 'jig rten pa'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad rgyu las
345b5(phal chen): byung ba'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad rgyu las ma byung ba'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad kha dog nges pa med par yang rab tu shes so/ /
345b6(phal chen): chos thams cad kha dog nges pa med pa'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad kha dog yongs su grub pa yang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad kha dog
345b7(phal chen): yongs su ma grub pa'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad byung ba'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad byung ba ma yin pa'ang ma yin par rab
346a1(phal chen): tu shes so/ /chos thams cad rnam par brtags pa yang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad rnam par ma brtags pa'ang ma yin
346a2(phal chen): par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad tshul yang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad tshul ma yin pa'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /de ni spyod pa la mngon
346a3(phal chen): par chags pa med do/ /don dam pa la gnas pa med do/ /chos la rab tu rtog pa med do/ /yi ge yongs su sgrub pa med do/ /zhi ba'i rjes su shin tu 'brang ngo / /smon lam
346a4(phal chen): yongs su mi gtong ngo / /don gyi tshul la rnam par lta'o/ /chos kyi tshul la rab tu 'jug go /chos kyi sprin kun nas slong ngo / /chos yongs su 'bab pa'i yi ge'i char mngon par
346a5(phal chen): 'bebs so/ /tshul brjod du med pa la 'jug go /tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa zad mi shes pa don gyi tshul rab tu brjod cing / chos kyi tshul mngon par ston pas chos thams
346a6(phal chen): cad kyi nges pa'i tshig la mkhas pa dang / chos thams cad spobs pas thabs mkhas pa'i tshul brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la rab tu 'jug go /byams pa chen po rnam
346a7(phal chen): par dag pa dang ldan zhing / snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa yi ga med pa'i yul dang ldan pa yi ges mngon par bsgrubs pa'i don la brtson zhing / 'gal ba med pa rang bzhin gyis
346b1(phal chen): chos la brtson pa chos thams cad rten cing 'brel par byung par ston pas gos pa med pa/ brjod pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa/ de chos thams cad
346b2(phal chen): zad mi shes pa'i spobs pas ston to/ /brjod do/ /rnam par 'god do/ /yang dag par ston to/ /'grel to/ /rnam par 'byed do/ /'byin to/ /khong du chud par byed do/ /rab
346b3(phal chen): tu ston to/ /rtogs par byed do/ /rab tu sgrub bo/ /rnam par sbyong ngo / /the tshom sel to/ /dogs pa gcod do/ /de kho na ston to/ /rang bzhin brjod do/ /'gro ba la phan 'dogs
346b4(phal chen): so| |chos nyid las mi nyams so/ /mi gnyis pa la 'jug go /chags pa med pa'i sgo ston to/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pas rab tu 'joms
346b5(phal chen): pa'i sgras sgra'i char yang bsam pa ji lta ba'i dus las yol bar mi byed par mngon par 'bebs so/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
346b6(phal chen): chen po rnams kyi chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes kyi mngon par shes pa ste dgu pa'o/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
346b7(phal chen): po sems skad cig re re zhing chos thams cad 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi rgyud mi gcod do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i las
347a1(phal chen): kyang thogs par mi byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa chen po las kyang rnam par mi 'dra'o/ /snying rje chen po las kyang phyir mi ldog go /pha
347a2(phal chen): rol tu phyin pa rnams kyang rgyun mi gcod do/ /zhing thams cad rab tu dbye zhing mkhas par bya bas kyang skyo bar mi byed do/ /'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i smon lam
347a3(phal chen): yang rgyun mi gcod do/ /chos kyi 'khor lo yang thogs par mi byed do/ /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'dul bar bya ba yang ring du mi spong ngo / /sangs rgyas mchod
347a4(phal chen): cing rim gro bya ba'ang rgyun mi gcod do/ /chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i sgo las kyang phyir mi ldog go /sangs rgyas mthong ba'i skal pa med par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /
347a5(phal chen): chos thams cad yongs su dri ba las kyang phyir mi ldog go /mnyam pa nyid dang bstod pa yang rab tu shes so/ /bsgribs pa med pa yang mngon par sgrub bo/ /sangs rgyas
347a6(phal chen): kyi chos thams cad la khyad par gyi smon lam mnyam pa nyid kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /zhing thams cad kyi gzhi dang dbyings tha dad pa'i rjes su'ang rab tu 'jug
347a7(phal chen): ste| sangs rgyas kyi rigs thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang thob pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dang / de dag tu chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur bslab
347b1(phal chen): pa'ang shin tu bslabs pa yin/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med par zhugs pas/ chos thams cad rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin/ chos
347b2(phal chen): thams cad lus med pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi tshul dang / spyod pa'i tshul khong du chud pa dang yang ldan pa yin/ chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang
347b3(phal chen): ba la mi gnas pa yin/ chos kyi tshul thams cad rab tu rtogs shing bsam pa dang / dbang po ji lta ba'ang rab tu rtogs pa yin/ de 'dod na bskal pa dang / bskal
347b4(phal chen): pa gcig dang / bskal pa brgya dang / bskal pa stong dang / bskal pa khrag khrig dang / bskal pa khrag khrig brgya dang / bskal pa khrag khrig stong dang / bskal pa bye ba
347b5(phal chen): khrag khrig brgya dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig stong dang / bskal pa tshad med pa dang / dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / mtshungs
347b6(phal chen): pa med pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / kun tu mtha' yas pa dang / mu med pa dang / sa mtshams med pa dang / bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par chos
347b7(phal chen): thams cad 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin gcig la snyoms par zhugs kyang de'i lus 'jig par mi 'gyur ro/ /nyam chung par mi 'gyur ro/ /skal ba zhan par mi 'gyur
348a1(phal chen): ro| |chud mi za'o/ /rnam par chud mi za'o/ /zhum par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par zhum par mi 'gyur ro/ /zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /dngos po yod pa
348a2(phal chen): dang med par mi 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba'ang yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid kyang brjod do/ /sems can gyi dus kyang yongs su mi
348a3(phal chen): spong ngo / /sems can 'dul ba'i dus la bab pa yang thogs par mi byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid kyang rnam par 'phel bar byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mnyam
348a4(phal chen): pa nyid kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /sems can thams cad kyi don kyang yongs su mi gtong ngo / /sprul pa'i rgyud kyang rgyun mi gcod do/ /mi g.yar lta bu'i chos kyi
348a5(phal chen): tshul las kyang ldog par mi byed do/ /bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sa las kyang mi g.yo'o/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
348a6(phal chen): chen po rnams kyi chos thams cad 'gog pa zhes bya ba ste/ ye shes kyi mngon par shes pa bcu pa'o/ /de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ lha
348a7(phal chen): dang 'jig rten du bcas pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/ 'gro ba thams cad kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/ nyan thos thams cad kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/ rang
348b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/ sa 'og ma la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/ lus kyi las bsam
348b2(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa yin/ ngag gi las bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/ yid kyi las bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/ ye
348b3(phal chen): shes kyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag bstan par mdzad cing bshad pa dang / gnas de dag
348b4(phal chen): dgod par mdzad de khong du chud par mdzad pa dang / mngon par shes pa de lta bu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bstan pa dang / brjod pa dang / bshad pa dang / rab tu bkod pa dang /
348b5(phal chen): bsngags pa dang / brjod pa dang / bstod pa dang / bkral ba dang / rab tu bstan pa dang / yongs su brjod pa ni gtogs so/ /kye| rgyal pa'i sras dag /bcu po de dag ni byang chub
348b6(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyis mngon par shes pa ste/ de dag la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ dus gsum thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mngon
348b7(phal chen): par shes pa bsgribs pa med pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ mngon par shes pa'i le'u ste/ sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //
349a1(phal chen): bam po drug cu rtsa gcig pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos/ yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la smras pa/ kye| rgyal ba'i
349a2(phal chen): sras dag / bcu po 'di rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bzod pa thob pa ste/ bzod pa thob pa de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
349a3(phal chen): ni/ bzod pa thams cad kyis bsgribs pa med pa thob pas sangs rgyas kyi chos zad mi shes pa/ bsgribs pa med pa thams cad thob par 'gyur pa dag go /bcu gang
349a4(phal chen): zhe na| 'di lta ste/ sgra khong du chud pa'i bzod pa dang / mthun pa'i bzod pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i bzod pa dang / smig rgyu lta bu'i
349a5(phal chen): bzod pa dang / rmi lam lta bu'i bzod pa dang / sgra brnyan lta bu'i bzod pa dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu'i bzod pa dang / sprul pa lta bu'i bzod pa dang / nam
349a6(phal chen): mkha' lta bu'i bzod pa'o/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /bcu po de rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa thob pa ste/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar
349a7(phal chen): byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so/ /gsung ngo / /gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la bzod pa dang po sgra khong du chud pa gang zhe na/
349b1(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ chos de dag thos nas mi 'jigs/ mi skrag /skrag par mi 'gyur zhing / dad pa dang / yid ches pa dang / mos pa dang / spro ba dang / 'jug pa dang / rjes su 'brang ba
349b2(phal chen): dang | de'i rang bzhin du gnas shing khong du chud par byed pa ste/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgra khong du chud pa'i bzod
349b3(phal chen): pa thob pa ste dang po'o/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mthun pa'i bzod pa thob pa gnyis pa gang zhe na/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras
349b4(phal chen): dag| 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'di dag ni mthun pa zhes bya bar rtog go / dpyod do/ /mnyam par byed do/ /mi 'gal bar byed do/ /chos de dag
349b5(phal chen): la ji ltar mthun par 'jug par bya ba de ltar rnam par sgom mo/ /bsam pa rnam par dag par byed do/ /mnyam par byed do/ /brtson par byed do/ /rtogs par byed do/ /rab
349b6(phal chen): tu sgrub bo/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mthun pa'i bzod pa thob pa ste gnyis pa'o/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /
349b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob pa gsum pa gang zhe na/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
350a1(phal chen): dpa' chen po rdul tsam gyi chos kyang gang yang skyes par mthong ba med do/ /chos gang yang 'gag par mthong ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang ma
350a2(phal chen): skyes pa de ni ma 'gags pa'o/ /gang ma 'gags pa de ni mi zad pa'o/ /gang mi zad pa de ni rdul med pa'o/ /gang rdul med pa de ni tha mi dad pa'o/ /gang tha mi dad pa de ni gzhi
350a3(phal chen): med pa'o/ /gang gzhi med pa de ni zhi ba'i sa'o/ /gang zhi ba'i sa yin pa de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'o/ /gang 'dod chags dang bral ba de ni mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'o//
350a4(phal chen): gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa de ni smon pa med pa'o/ /gang smon pa med pa de ni gnas pa med cing len pa med pa ste/ kye|rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni byang chub sems
350a5(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob pa ste gsum pa'o/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
350a6(phal chen): sgyu ma lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa bzhi pa gang zhe na/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad rten cing 'brel bar
350a7(phal chen): 'byung ba'i tshul gyi sgyu ma lta bur 'jug ste/ chos kyi rnam pa gcig la rnam pa mang por mos par byed do/ /chos rnam pa mang po la chos kyi rnam pa gcig tu mos par byed do/ /de ni
350b1(phal chen): chos de dag la sgyu ma'i tshul gyis zhing du yang sgom par byed do/ /sems can du'ang khong du chud par byed do/ /chos kyi dbyings su'ang rtogs par byed do/ /'jig rten gyi khams
350b2(phal chen): su'ang mnyam par byed do/ /sangs rgyas skye bar yang mtshungs par byed do/ /'jug tu med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rjes su 'jug go /byin gyi rlabs kyi tshul gyis kyang mngon par
350b3(phal chen): sgrub bo/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma ni glang po'i lus la yang mi gnas so/ /rta'i lus la'ang mi gnas so/ /shing rta'i lus la'ang mi gnas so/ /rkang thang gi lus
350b4(phal chen): la'ang mi gnas so/ /bud med la'ang mi gnas so/ /skyes pa la'ang mi gnas so/ /rogs po la'ang mi gnas so/ /bu mo la'ang mi gnas so/ /shing la'ang mi gnas so/ /lo
350b5(phal chen): ma la'ang mi gnas so/ /me tog la'ang mi gnas so/ /'bras bu la'ang mi gnas so/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung la'ang mi gnas so/ /nyin zhag dang / yud du yan man
350b6(phal chen): dang | zla ba dang / lo la'ang mi gnas so/ /lo brgya la'ang mi gnas so/ /zla ba dang nyi ma la'ang mi gnas so/ /bskal pa la'ang mi gnas so/ /zhi ba dang rab tu zhi ba la'ang
350b7(phal chen): mi gnas so/ /sna tshogs dang rnam pa sna tshogs la'ang mi gnas so/ /gcig pa dang tha dad pa la'ang mi gnas so/ /yangs pa dang dog pa la'ang mi gnas so/ /rgya chen po
351a1(phal chen): dang rgya chung ngu la'ang mi gnas so/ /tshad yod pa dang tshad med pa la'ang mi gnas so/ phra ba dang rigs pa la'ang mi gnas so/ /'khor sna tshogs
351a2(phal chen): la'ang mi gnas so/ /'khor kyang sgyu ma la mi gnas so/ /sgyu ma'ang 'khor la mi gnas te/ sgyu ma kun tu bstan pa dang / sna tshogs kyi sgyu ma rnam pa tha dad pa bstan pa'i grangs
351a3(phal chen): su bgrang ba yang yod do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'jig rten thams cad la sgyu ma lta bur 'jug cing las kyi 'jig rten dang / nyon mongs
351a4(phal chen): pa'i 'jig rten dang / zhing gi 'jig rten dang / chos kyi 'jig rten dang / dus kyi 'jig rten dang / rgyud kyi 'jig rten dang / ldan pa'i 'jig rten dang / mi ldan pa'i 'jig rten
351a5(phal chen): dang | 'jug pa'i 'jig rten dang / mngon par 'du bya ba'i 'jig rten la 'jug pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad la sgyu ma'i rnam
351a6(phal chen): par 'jug pas sems can rnams skye bar mi byed do/ /'jig par mi byed do/ /zhing rnams skye bar mi byed do/ /'jig par mi byed do/ /chos rnams skye bar mi byed do/ /
351a7(phal chen): 'jig par mi byed do/ /'das pa la mi rtog go /'das pa la rnam par mi rtog go /ma 'ongs pa la mngon par 'du mi byed do/ /ma 'ongs pa 'byung bar mi byed do/ /da ltar
351b1(phal chen): byung ba la gnas pa med do/ /da ltar byung ba la chags pa med do/ /byang chub la spyod pa med do/ /byang chub la yongs su rtogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas 'byung bar mi byed do/ /sangs
351b2(phal chen): rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi byed do/ /smon lam la gnas par mi byed do/ /skyon med pa la chags par mi byed do/ /mnyam pa nyid mi len to/ /chags pa med pa mi
351b3(phal chen): 'dor ro/ /zhing la chags pa med do/ /tha dad pa med par yang khong du chud do/ /sems can gyi khams kyang mngon par sgrub ste/ sems can gyi khams tha dad pa'ang rab tu shes so/ /
351b4(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings kyang khong du chud de/ gnas pa'i chos nyid las kyang mi g.yo'o/ /dus mnyam pa nyid la'ang rab tu 'jug ste/ dus la rnam par rtog pas kyang 'gal bar mi byed
351b5(phal chen): do| |phung po dang skye mched rnams kyang mngon par sgrub ste/ gnas yang dag par gzhom pa yang khong du chud par byed do/ /sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par mi byed
351b6(phal chen): de| chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid tha dad pa med par yang rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad brjod du med cing yi ge med par yang rab tu shes te/ tha dad pa yang dag par shes
351b7(phal chen): pas kyang thogs pa med do/ /sems can thams cad dgrol ba'i don du 'dod pa la'ang chags par mi byed do/ /snying rje chen pos kyang 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la chos kyi
352a1(phal chen): 'khor lo bskor ro/ /sems can la lta ba'i phyir snying rje chen po yang byin gyis rlob ste/ snying rje chen po'i phyogs la'ang sems can thams cad
352a2(phal chen): yongs su 'grel to/ /sngon gyi rgyu'ang rab tu brjod do/ /rgyu 'pho ba med pa'ang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni byang chub
352a3(phal chen): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgyu ma lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa ste bzhi pa'o/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
352a4(phal chen): kyi smig rgyu lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa lnga pa gang zhe na/ kye|rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad smig rgyu lta bur
352a5(phal chen): rab tu shes te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ smig rgyu ni yul na'ang mi gnas/ phyogs na'ang mi gnas so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang
352a6(phal chen): yul na yang mi gnas/ phyogs na'ang mi gnas pa'i chos nyid rab tu shes so/ /'jig rten nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas pa dang / yod pa yang
352a7(phal chen): ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin pa dang / rtag pa yang ma yin/ chad pa yang ma yin par rnam par rig par gyur pa rab tu shes so/ /yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
352b1(phal chen): shes so/ /nang zhes bya ba nang na gnas pa ma yin pa dang / nang zhes bya ba phyi rol na gnas pa ma yin pa dang / kha dog gcig pa ma yin pa dang / kha dog tha dad pa ma yin pa
352b2(phal chen): yang rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad kha dog med pa'i sa thob par bya ba yang yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
352b3(phal chen): dpa' chen pa rnams kyi smig rgyu lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa ste lnga pa'o/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmi lam lta bu'i bzod
352b4(phal chen): pa thob pa drug pa gang zhe na/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad rmi lam lta bur rab tu shes te/ 'di
352b5(phal chen): lta ste| dper na/ rmi lam ni 'jig rten las byung ba yang ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa yang ma yin/ rmi lam ni 'dod pa'i khams kyang ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams kyang
352b6(phal chen): ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams kyang ma yin no/ /rmi lam ni shi 'pho ba yang ma yin/ skye ba yang ma yin no/ /rmi lam ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'ang ma yin/ rnam par byang
352b7(phal chen): ba'ang ma yin no/ /rmi lam ni lta ba'ang ma yin/ rnam par dag pa'ang ma yin te/ rmi lam snang ba yang med pa'ang ma yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
353a1(phal chen): po yang 'jig rten thams cad 'khrug pa med pa'i tshul gyis rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid dang / tshul dang / rmi lam la mngon par chags pa dang / rmi lam
353a2(phal chen): rab tu dben pa dang / rmi lam gyi rang bzhin dang / rmi lam gyi byin gyi rlabs dang / rmi lam tha mi dad pa dang / rmi lam gyi 'du shes dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / rmi lam
353a3(phal chen): gyi 'jig rten khong du chud pa lta bur rab tu shes te/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmi lam lta bu'i bzod
353a4(phal chen): pa thob pa ste drug pa'o/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgra brnyan lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa bdun pa gang zhe na /
353a5(phal chen): kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos nyid mngon par bsgrub pa'i bslab pa
353a6(phal chen): la shin tu bslabs pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgra brnyan ni sgra sna tshogs grags par byed kyang 'pho ba med do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
353a7(phal chen): chen po yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung nang na brjod pa yang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung phyi rol na brjod pa yang ma yin par rab tu shes
353b1(phal chen): so| |de ltar shes pa de yang nang nas shes pa'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /phyi rol nas shes pa'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /phyi nang nas shes pa'ang ma yin par rab
353b2(phal chen): tu shes te/ 'on kyang bstan pa mngon par bsgrub pa'ang rab tu shes so/ /byin gyi rlabs la mkhas pas 'jug pa'ang rab tu shes so/ /tshig kyang rab tu shes so/ /sgra brnyan
353b3(phal chen): lta bur rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bas grag par gyur ba'i chos nyid kyang 'khrug par mi byed de/ sgro 'dogs par yang mi byed la/ dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam pa tha dad pa la
353b4(phal chen): 'jug cing bslab pa la'ang shin tu bslabs pa yin/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bud med 'grogs ma'i kha'i dbugs kyis lan gcig bus
353b5(phal chen): pas| kha'i dbugs yan lag stong dang ldan pa 'byung ngo / /kha'i dbugs la rnam par rtog pa med kyang dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam pa stong du sgrog go /de bzhin du byang chub
353b6(phal chen): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang rnam par mi rtog pa dang ldan pa'i dbyings la 'jug pa'i tshe/ dbyangs kyi yan lag mtha' yas pa rnam par bsgom pa la mkhas pas 'jig
353b7(phal chen): rten gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med par 'gro ba thams cad la phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la rab tu 'jug cing 'khor rnams la'ang rgya cher yang dag par ston to/ /
354a1(phal chen): lce shin tu yangs pa yang byin gyis rlob ste/ dbyangs chags pa med pa yang rab tu brjod do/ /zhing thams cad du 'gengs pa'i dbyangs
354a2(phal chen): kyang byin gyis rlob bo/ /sems can rnams kyis mtha' yas par khong du chud par yang byin gyis rlob bo/ /chos rnam par phye ba 'byams klas pa yang rab tu snang bar byed
354a3(phal chen): do| |dbyangs thams cad la 'jug pa med pa yang rab tu shes so/ /sgra rnam par dmigs pa yang rnam par dmigs pa med par rab tu shes so/ /dbyangs sna tshogs kyang
354a4(phal chen): rnam par 'god do/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag gi dkyil 'khor khong du chud pas kyang rab tu spyod de/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
354a5(phal chen): po rnams kyi sgra brnyan lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa ste bdun pa'o/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gzugs brnyan
354a6(phal chen): lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa brgyad pa gang zhe na/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten nas shi 'pho ba med do/ /'jig
354a7(phal chen): rten du skye ba med do/ /'jig rten gyi nang na mi gnas so/ /'jig rten gyi phyi rol na mi gnas so/ /'jig rten du rgyu ba med do/ /'jig rten du rgyun chad pa med do/ /'jig
354b1(phal chen): rten dang 'dres pa med do/ /'jig rten dang tha dad pa med do/ /'jig rten du 'gro ba med de/ /'jig rten las grol bar 'gro ba med do/ /'jig rten du gzhol bar 'gro
354b2(phal chen): ba med do/ /'jig rten las ldog pa med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' de nyid kyang 'jig rten ma yin te/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang ma yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa'
354b3(phal chen): spyad pa spyod pa'ang ma yin te/ smon lam chen po rgyun gcod pa'ang ma yin no/ /mang ba yang ma yin/ nyung ba yang ma yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rdzogs par 'thob par
354b4(phal chen): bya ba la'ang don yod pa spyod do/ /'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ 'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang ba'ang ma yin no/ /chos kyi rgyud thogs
354b5(phal chen): par byed pa'ang ma yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ gzugs brnyan ni nyi ma'am/ zla ba'am/ bud med dam/ skyes pa'am/ shing ngam/ ri'am/ gnas sam/ rtsig pa'am/
354b6(phal chen): sa'am/ chu klung gi rgyud dam/ dngos po sna tshogs mtha' yas pa tshad med pa rnams kyi gzugs gang dang gang yod pa de dag thams cad rnam par dmigs par byed de/ chu'am/
354b7(phal chen): til mar ram/ nor bu'am/ mching bu'am/ me long ngam/ gzhan yang yo byad kha dog dang ba/ mdog gsal ba gang yang rung ste/ de dag shin tu dang ba'i phyir de dag tu
355a1(phal chen): gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs par byed kyang gzugs brnyan ni shin tu dang ba'i dbyings de dang 'dres pa yang med do/ /gzugs brnyan
355a2(phal chen): de de las gud na 'dug pa yang ma yin no/ /gzugs brnyan de de ltar rnam par dmigs pa dang yang 'grogs ba med do/ /dang pa'i dngos po de yang gzugs brnyan gyis dang
355a3(phal chen): 'grogs pa med do/ /gzugs brnyan de chu klung gi rgyun gyis kyang khyer bar mi nus so/ /gzugs brnyan de chu bo'i rgya mtshor 'chi bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ /dang ba sna tshogs de dag
355a4(phal chen): gis kyang gzugs brnyan de la gos par mi 'gyur te/ de dag tu gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa'ang yod cing / de dag gis gzung ba 'dra yang gzugs brnyan gang du dmigs par
355a5(phal chen): gyur pa des de'i tshe gzung ba med do/ /gzugs brnyan de ni ring bar yang snang nye bar yang snang ste/ de ltar ring ba dang nye bar yang med do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems
355a6(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang rang gi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gzhan gyi rgyud kyi yul du snang bar byed kyang / 'di ni gzhan gyi rgyud do/ /'di ni bdag gi ye shes kyi rgyud do/ /'di ni
355a7(phal chen): bdag gi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor to zhes gnyis su mi byed do/ /bdag gi yul dang gzhan gyi yul rnam par dbye ba'ang rab tu shes so/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa bon du gyur pa ni shin tu
355b1(phal chen): 'phel zhing skye ba yin te/ chu ba dang / lo ma dang / sbu gu'i gnas su gyur nas rnam par dbye ba'ang yod do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos nyid mi
355b2(phal chen): gnyis pa la gnyis kyis mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i ye shes la chags pa med pa'i mtha'i tshul gyis rab tu 'jug go / kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
355b3(phal chen): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gzugs brnyan lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa ste brgyad pa'o/ /bzod pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas
355b4(phal chen): kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag tu 'gro ba yang med la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa dag tu'ang snang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams gang nas kyang g.yo ba med cing / 'jig
355b5(phal chen): rten gyi khams gang du'ang 'gro ba med la/ lus kyi dkyil 'khor gzugs brnyan du gyur pa yang kun tu rnam par dmigs par byed de/ rjes su song ba'i lus kyang 'jig rten
355b6(phal chen): thams cad du phyin par byed do/ /lus rnam par phye ba chags pa med pas spyod pa'ang rab tu shes so/ /gang yang 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi mtshan ma dang / 'jig rten dong
355b7(phal chen): skom yod pa de dag 'dres pa'ang ma yin/ tha dad pa yang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su rigs dang ldan par byung ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid
356a1(phal chen): rnam par dag pa yang rab tu 'thob bo/ /kha dog mtha' yas pa'i lus thams cad rnam par dag pa yang rab tu thob bo/ /kye|rgyal ba'i sras
356a2(phal chen): dag| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sprul pa lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa gang zhe na/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
356a3(phal chen): dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad sprul pa lta bur rab tu 'jug ste/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pas sprul pa dang / bsams te sprul pa dang / 'jig rten gyi
356a4(phal chen): khams mngon par 'du byed pas sprul pa dang / rnam par rtog pas sprul pa dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad kyi phyin ci log gis sprul pa dang / sgro btags pas sprul
356a5(phal chen): pa dang / 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad med pas sprul pa dang / tshig gi lam gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sprul pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi yongs su rtog pas sprul
356a6(phal chen): pa dang / 'du shes kyis sprul pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'dul ba rnam par byang bar bya ba dang / rnam par dag par bya ba'i yongs su rtog pas sprul pa dang / 'di lta ste/ dus gsum
356a7(phal chen): du phyir mi ldog pas sprul pa mnyam pa nyid kyis byung ba med pa dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyis sprul pa spyod pas yangs par byas pa dang / 'di lta ste/
356b1(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen pos sprul pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad la bstabs par rnam par bkod pa dang / 'di lta ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo dang / thabs mkhas
356b2(phal chen): pa'i ye shes kyis sprul pa mi 'jig pa dang / tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i ye shes kyis 'jug par rab tu shes te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
356b3(phal chen): po 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sprul pa rab tu shes par byed do/ /khong du chud par byed do/ /rtogs par byed do/ /yangs par byed do/ /mtha' dang
356b4(phal chen): dbus dang / mu med par ji ltar bskyed pa bzhin du thob par byed do/ /grub par byed do/ /dbang du byed do/ /de kho na nyid du shes so/ /yang dag pa nyid las mi g.yo bar
356b5(phal chen): byed do/ /yang dag par lta'o/ /ji ltar spyod pa bzhin du chud mi za bar byed do/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ sprul pa ni sems las mi 'byung ste/ sems kyi chos las ma byung /
356b6(phal chen): las kyis bsgrubs pa ma yin /rnam par smin pa'i rjes su 'brang ba ma yin/ 'jig rten du skyes pa ma yin/ 'jig rten du 'gag pa ma yin/ chos kyi rjes su snyegs pa ma
356b7(phal chen): yin |chos thob par byed pa ma yin/ ring du gnas pa ma yin/ yud tsam du gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig rten na spyod pa ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa ma yin/ phyogs
357a1(phal chen): su 'gro ba ma yin/ phyogs la gzhol ba ma yin/ tshad yod pa ma yin/ tshad med pa ma yin/ skyo ba ma yin/ skyo ba med pa ma yin/ rgyun chad
357a2(phal chen): pa ma yin/ rgyun mi 'chad pa ma yin/ 'phags pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ shi 'phos pa ma yin/ skyes
357a3(phal chen): pa ma yin/ shes pa ma yin/ mi shes pa ma yin/ snang ba ma yin/ 'jig pa ma yin/ 'jig rten la gnas pa ma yin/ chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba ma yin /
357a4(phal chen): mkhas pa ma yin/ shes rab 'chal pa can ma yin/ nye bar len pa ma yin/ nye bar mi len pa ma yin/ 'khor ba ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin/ yod
357a5(phal chen): pa ma yin/ med pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'phrul pa'i byin gyis rlabs la mkhas pas/ 'jig rten na byang chub sems
357a6(phal chen): dpa'i spyad pa spyod de/ 'jig rten gyi chos la lta zhing / bdag mngon par sprul pa byed kyang 'jig rten gyi sprul pa la mngon par chags pa med do/ /bdag gi sprul pa mngon
357a7(phal chen): par chags pa med do/ /bdag dang 'jig rten gyi mngon par sprul pa la yongs su rtog pa med do/ /'jig rten la gnas pa med do/ /'jig rten rgyun gcod pa med do/ /
357b1(phal chen): chos la gnas pa med do/ /chos kyi dbang du 'gro ba ma yin no/ /sems can gyi khams kyang rdul tsam yang 'dul ba med do/ /sems can gyi khams smon lam las yongs
357b2(phal chen): su spong ba med do/ /chos de dag la rtog pa med do/ /rnam par rtog pa med do/ /chos de dag la len pa med do/ /chos de dag la 'dor ba med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos yod pa ma
357b3(phal chen): yin pa de dag kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ chos de dag kyang yod pa'ang ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin no/ /ji ltar sprul pa de yod pa yang ma yin/ med pa ma yin pa de
357b4(phal chen): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sprul pa lta bu'i bzod pa la gnas shing / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /sems
357b5(phal chen): can gyi don kyang rab tu byed do/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sprul pa lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa ste dgu pa'o/ /bzod pa
357b6(phal chen): de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad la mi gnas pa yin te/ ji ltar sprul pa de 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la mi gnas
357b7(phal chen): par spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med par spyod pa dang / ji ltar sprul pa de sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la dub
358a1(phal chen): pa med par spyod pa dang / ji ltar sprul pa de phyin ci log med cing lus su dmigs pa thams cad la lus med par spyod pa dang / ji ltar sprul
358a2(phal chen): pa de byin gyi rlabs kyis gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi gzugs la mi gnas par spyod pa dang / ji ltar sprul pa de rang bzhin snang ba'i tshul du yang dag pa'i mtha'
358a3(phal chen): mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / ji ltar sprul pa de chos thams cad la rnam par grol ba'i chos gnas med par spyod pa dang / ji ltar sprul pa de gnas med
358a4(phal chen): pa'i rang bzhin dang / chos thams cad kyi tshul gyi rnam par byang ba la spyod pa dang / ji ltar sprul pa de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor du/ cho 'phrul gyis nye bar
358a5(phal chen): 'gro zhing 'gro ba med par spyod pa dang / ji ltar sprul pa de khor yug dang / ri rab thams cad la snang ba bzhin no/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa' sems
358a6(phal chen): dpa' chen po rnams kyi nam mkha' lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa bcu gang zhe na/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' ji lta ba de
358a7(phal chen): ltar mtshan nyid med pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad la 'jug go / nam mkha' ji lta ba de ltar zhing thams cad bsgrub pa med pa'i tshul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams
358b1(phal chen): thams cad la 'jug go / nam mkha' ji lta ba de ltar gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad la 'jug go /nam mkha' ji lta ba de ltar 'jug pa med pa'i tshul gyis sems
358b2(phal chen): can thams cad kyi spyod pa la 'jug go / nam mkha' ji lta ba de ltar rnam par dbye ba med pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas thams cad la 'jug go /nam mkha' ji lta ba de ltar tha dad
358b3(phal chen): pa med pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi stobs thams cad la 'jug go / nam mkha' ji lta ba de ltar sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i
358b4(phal chen): tshul gyis bsam gtan thams cad la rab tu 'jug go / nam mkha' ji lta ba de ltar brjod du med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad yang dag par bstan pa la 'jug go /nam
358b5(phal chen): mkha' ji lta ba de ltar chags pa med cing bsgribs pa med pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku la 'jug go / nam mkha' ji lta ba de ltar nam mkha'i dbyings
358b6(phal chen): kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad bsal ba med pa la 'jug go / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' lta bu'i chos thams cad la de lta bu'i bzod pa
358b7(phal chen): las byung ba'i ye shes kyis 'jug pa'i tshe/ lus nam mkha' lta bur rab tu 'thob bo/ /nam mkha' lta bu'i lus kyi las rab tu 'thob bo/ /nam mkha' lta bu'i ngag rab tu
359a1(phal chen): 'thob bo/ /nam mkha' lta bu'i ngag gi las rab tu 'thob bo/ /nam mkha' lta bu'i yid rab tu 'thob bo/ /nam mkha' lta bu'i yid kyi las
359a2(phal chen): rab tu 'thob bo/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni chos thams cad dang ldan te/ 'chi 'pho ba yang med do/ /skye ba yang med do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems
359a3(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos thams cad kyi lus dang ldan te/ 'chi 'pho ba yang med do/ /skye ba yang med do/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni gzhi med
359a4(phal chen): do| |tha dad pa med do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos thams cad shes pas gzhi med do/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs
359a5(phal chen): rnams dang / tha mi dad do/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni 'jig rten thams cad kyi gzhi ste/ rang bzhin med pa dang / yul med pas gzhi'ang ma yin no/ /de bzhin
359a6(phal chen): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos thams cad kyi gzhi yin te/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin med pas gzhi'ang ma yin no/ /'di lta ste /dper
359a7(phal chen): na| nam mkha' ni skye ba med cing / 'gag pa med kyang 'jig rten thams cad kyi skye ba dang / 'gag pa 'dzin to/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
359b1(phal chen): chen po yang 'jug pa yang med/ yongs su rdzogs pa yang med de/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa yang rab tu ston to/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni phyogs
359b2(phal chen): kyang ma yin/ phyogs mtshams kyang ma yin te/ phyogs rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa la'ang yang dag par gzhol lo/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang
359b3(phal chen): las kyang ma yin/ rnam par smin pa yang ma yin te/ las dang rnam par smin pa rgya mtsho yang yongs su ston to/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni ldang ba med cing 'dug pa
359b4(phal chen): med de/ rnam par phye ba mtha' yas pa'ang yongs su ston to/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang / spyod pa yang med/ gnas pa yang med de/ spyod
359b5(phal chen): pa rnam par phye ba yang yongs su ston to/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni kha dog kyang ma yin/ kha dog med pa yang ma yin te/ kha dog gi rnam pa'ang yongs su ston to/ /de
359b6(phal chen): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'jig rten gyi kha dog kyang ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i kha dog kyang ma yin te/ kha dog mtha' yas pa'ang
359b7(phal chen): yongs su ston to/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni ring du gnas pa'ang ma yin/ yud tsam gcig tu gnas pa yang ma yin te/ gnas pa dang yongs su gnas pa'ang
360a1(phal chen): rab tu ston to/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang ring du gnas pa yang ma yin/ yud tsam gcig tu gnas pa yang ma
360a2(phal chen): yin te / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa dang / yongs su gnas pa yang rab tu ston to/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni kun nas nyon mongs pas nyon mongs par
360a3(phal chen): gyur pa'ang med la/ rnam par byang bas rnam par byang bar gyur pa'ang med do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'jig rten la 'jug pas bsgribs
360a4(phal chen): pa yang med/ rnam par dag cing gsal bar gyur pa'ang med do/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum du gyur pa yin te/ 'jig rten
360a5(phal chen): thams cad ni nam mkha'i mngon sum du gyur pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos thams cad la mngon sum du gyur pa ste /
360a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' ni chos thams cad kyi mngon du gyur pa ma yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni gnas thams cad la rab tu gzhol ba yin te/ nam mkha'i
360a7(phal chen): mtha' ni yod pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos kyi gnas thams cad la gnas te/ byang chub kyi sems ni mtha' yod pa ma
360b1(phal chen): yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni bdag nyid nam mkha' dang mnyam par byas te yongs su bsgoms pa dang / rnam par sbyangs pa dang / shin tu bsgrubs pa dang / mnyam
360b2(phal chen): pa nyid du byas pa dang / rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu byas pa dang / ro gcig tu byas pa dang / tshad gcig tu byas pa dang / nam mkha' lta bur dag pa'i kha dog tu byas pa dang / thams
360b3(phal chen): cad du 'gro bar byas pa'i phyir ro/ /chos thams cad la yang dag par sems pa dang / khong du chud par byed pa dang / chos thams cad tha mi dad pa rab tu 'thob par byed pa
360b4(phal chen): dang | zhing thams cad du 'gro bar bsgrub pa dang / lus thams cad la gnas pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / phyogs thams cad la rmongs pa med pa khong du chud
360b5(phal chen): par byed pa dang / stobs thams cad tha mi dad par sgrub pa dang / yon tan thams cad yul mtha' yas par yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / chos thams cad kyi 'byung gnas rab tu
360b6(phal chen): thob par byed pa dang / dpag tu med pa thob par byed pa dang / rdo rje ltar brtan pa la rab tu gzhol ba dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag tshad med pa thams cad mngon par sgrub pa dang / 'jig rten
360b7(phal chen): thams cad du phyin cing chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir ro/ /kye| rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi nam mkha' lta bu'i
361a1(phal chen): bzod pa thob pa ste bcu pa'o/ /bzod pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ 'gro ba med pa'i tshul du 'gro ba med
361a2(phal chen): pa'i lus rab tu 'thob bo/ /'gag pa med pa'i tshul du skye ba med pa'i lus rab tu 'thob bo/ /'jig pa med pa'i tshul du 'pho ba med pa'i lus rab tu 'thob bo/ /ji ltar
361a3(phal chen): mthong ba ma yin pa'i tshul du bden pa med pa'i lus rab tu 'thob bo/ /mtshan nyid med pa'i tshul du mtshan nyid gcig pa'i lus rab tu 'thob bo/ /sangs rgyas kyi stobs
361a4(phal chen): tshad med pa'i tshul du tshad med pa'i lus rab tu 'thob bo/ /de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi tshul du mnyam pa nyid kyi lus rab tu 'thob bo/ /dus gsum mnyam pa nyid khong
361a5(phal chen): du chud cing bzod pa'i tshul du tha mi dad pa'i lus rab tu 'thob bo/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi mig rnam par dag pas bsgribs pa med pa'i tshul du thams cad du 'gro ba'i lus rab
361a6(phal chen): tu 'thob bo/ /chos thams cad ldan pa dang mi ldan pa med pa'i tshul du 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha'i lus rab tu 'thob bo/ /bsod nams zad mi shes pa'i tshul du
361a7(phal chen): nam mkha' ltar mtha' dang mu med pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /chos thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid kyis mtshan nyid gcig pa'i tshul du chos nyid mnyam pa nyid
361b1(phal chen): thob pas zad mi shes shing thogs pa med pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /nam mkha' ltar thogs pa med pa'i tshul du dbyangs mtha' yas shing tshad med pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /nam mkha'
361b2(phal chen): ltar thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i tshul du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la mkhas pa yongs su rdzogs shing rnam par dag pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /nam mkha' ltar rgyun
361b3(phal chen): chad pa med pa'i tshul du sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa tshad med pa thams cad rab tu 'thob bo/ /nam mkha' ltar tshad med cing mthar thug pa med pa'i
361b4(phal chen): tshul du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad tshad med pa'i zhing du byin gyis rlob pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /nam mkha' rgya mtsho'i tshul du chos thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgyun mi 'chad
361b5(phal chen): par yang dag par ston pa yang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha' ltar 'jig rten thams cad 'dzin pa'i tshul du lus thams cad 'jig pa med cing shin tu brten pa
361b6(phal chen): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi gdung ba thams cad kyis nam mkha' 'tshig par mi 'gyur ba'i tshul du rdo rje ltar sra zhing brtan la rno ba'i dbang po yongs su
361b7(phal chen): 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi tshul du 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'dzin pa'i stobs la yang dag par 'byung ngo / /kye| rgyal ba'i
362a1(phal chen): sras dag / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bzod pa thob pa bcu'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
362a2(phal chen): dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos don 'di nyid de bas kyang gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ji ltar skyes bu la
362a3(phal chen): la zhig / rin chen 'byung gnas thos gyur nas/ /nor tshogs chen po bsags don du/ /rab tu dga' ba skye ba yin/ /de bzhin shes rab che ldan pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa'
362a4(phal chen): rgyal sras rnams/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mtshan/ /zab cing zhi ba rab tu nyan/ /zab pa'i chos ni thos gyur cing / /de dag yid ni 'jigs mi 'gyur/ /de dag
362a5(phal chen): sems la sdang ba med/ /skrag pa skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rgya chen dbyangs ni thos gyur nas/ /bzod pa'i dbyangs kyis byang chub tu/ /shes rab chen po yang dag 'jug /de
362a6(phal chen): la the tshom skye ba med/ /bdag ni thams cad mkhyen par bya/ /bdag ni mi yi mgon du bya/ /chos rab shin tu zab pa rnams/ /bdag gis sgra yi sgo nas thos/ /sgra yi rjes
362a7(phal chen): su 'brang bas ni/ /dga' ba'i dam pa mi 'thob ces/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos don du/ /de yi mos pa brtan pa skye/ /bsam pa byang chub sems rab kyis/ /'dus shing
362b1(phal chen): yongs su sgom pa byed/ /chos rnams 'khrug par mi byed de/ /de yi dad pa rnam par 'phel| /des ni sgra rjes 'gro ba yi/ /bzod pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur/ /spyod la shin tu brtson byed
362b2(phal chen): cing | |dbyangs kyi bzod la rab tu gnas/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas yin pas na/ /shin tu brtson pa rab tu tshol/ /brtson 'grus ldog par mi byed de/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub pa
362b3(phal chen): byed| |dbyangs tsam gyis ni gnas byed pas/ /byang chub sems dpa' bag tsha med/ /dbyangs kyis mos pa rab tu 'thob/ /des ni rgyal ba mnyes par byed/ /skyes bu la la bsod nams
362b4(phal chen): rgyas gyur pas/ /gser gyi 'byung gnas chen po rnyed gyur nas/ /brgyan pa'i gnas kyi rgyan du rab sbyangs nas/ /de dag lus dang mthun pa'i rgyan du byed/ /de bzhin mkhas pas chos kyi
362b5(phal chen): phul thos na/ /sems dang blo yangs rgya mtshor bsgyur byas shing / /ji ltar sngon thos chos rnams rtog par byed/ /mi mthun tshul du chos la tshol mi byed/ /de dag rtogs nas shin tu
362b6(phal chen): mthun par spyod/ /rnam par mi sgom chos ni gang yang med/ /de dag chos rnams ji bzhin mthun byed cing / /de bzhin de ni chos rnams khong du chud par byed/ /mkhas pa'i sems ni
362b7(phal chen): rnam dag skyer 'gyur te/ /dga' ba'i sems yid rnam dag gsal ba skye/ /chos kyi yid la bdag nyid che ba brtson/ /rten cing 'brel 'byung chos la rab tu 'jug /chos rnams
363a1(phal chen): mnyam pa nyid la de brtson te/ /dngos po rnam par bsgom la mngon par brtson/ /rgyal ba'i mdzod dang 'gal bar mi byed de/ /chos rnams mi
363a2(phal chen): mnyam med par rab tu shes/ /de ni bsam pa mthar thug rab brtan pas/ /rgyal ba'i byang chub ji bzhin rab tu spyod/ /ri rab bzhin du mi g.yo brtan pa yis/ /de yi bsam pa byang
363a3(phal chen): chub mchog la rten/ /mnyam gzhag sems dang ldan pas de brtson te/ /brtson 'grus ldan pa'i yid kyis rab tu spyod/ /bskal pa stong du spyad pa spyod byed kyang / /de yi brtson
363a4(phal chen): 'grus 'jig par mi 'gyur ro/ /'di dag chos la yang dag de 'jug ste/ /rgyal ba'i rtogs bya'i gting yang rab tu rnyed/ /chos nyid zhi ba rab tu thob gyur pas/ /de la
363a5(phal chen): 'jums pa'i yid byed gang yang med/ /dpe zla med pas ji skad gsungs pa ltar/ /de ni chos rnams mnyam pa nyid du byed/ /mi mnyam tshul du bzod pa mi skyed de/ /ye shes
363a6(phal chen): mnyam nyid yongs su rdzogs par sgrub/ /bde bar gshegs pas mthun par gang gsungs pa/ /de dag bzod pa'i sgo nas rab tu 'grub/ /chos rnams 'jig dang ldan pa ma
363a7(phal chen): yin te/ /chos nyid ji bzhin de 'dra rab tu shes/ /lha gnas 'di lha'i bu rnams 'dir 'dus dang / /sum cu rtsa gsum gnas su lha rnams skyes gyur pa/ /de dag zil
363b1(phal chen): mngar sna tshogs rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan/ /de dag 'khor ba'i snad gcig mngon spyod zad gyur na/ /zil mngar zhim pa de dag 'ongs pa ma yin te/ phyogs bcu kun nas zil mngar stobs
363b2(phal chen): pa med/ /las rnams ji lta ji bzhin lha rnams de ltar za/ /de la skye ba med de bza' ba med pa min/ /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa'i sems rab mngon skyes kyang / /de la rdul cha'i chos kyang
363b3(phal chen): skyes par gyur pa med/ /ma skyes gang yin chos de nam yang 'gag pa med/ /dam pa'i chos kyi rkyen brten mkhas pa rab tu bzhugs/ /ma 'gags gang yin mi zad chos rgyud de dang de/ /chos
363b4(phal chen): nyid 'di yi tshul la rab tu gnas pa yin/ /tha dad med pa'i chos dbyings 'di la rab tu 'jug /'jig rten tha dad med pa'i rgyud kyi tshul yang shes/ /de bzhin nyid mnyam 'jig rten
363b5(phal chen): zhi ba'i gzhir gyur pa/ /gzhi med tha dad med pa'i yang dag mtha' shes te/ smon lam rdo rje'i rang bzhin 'gro la phan phyir 'debs/ /rgyal sras de ni bde gshegs mkhyen la'ang mngon
363b6(phal chen): chags med/ /de ni dben gzhol sangs rgyas chos rnams ston pa byed/ /chos kyi shugs las 'on kyang g.yo bar 'gyur ba med/ /brda dang grangs kyi tshul gyis mngon par 'du byed de/ /
363b7(phal chen): 'jig rten snying brtser smon lam dam pa rab tu 'debs/ /smon lam 'debs la gnas kyang stobs bcu ldan pa ste/ /'gro ba ma lus kun la de ni gnas pa med/ /mkhas pa'i ye shes
364a1(phal chen): yongs su len dang 'dor ba spangs/ /chos dang chos kyi man ngag rnam pa'i tshul la mkhas/ /'di ni bzod pa'i dam pa ma skyes chos can te/ /des
364a2(phal chen): ni chos rnams zad med zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /mi skye'i tshul gyis yongs su gdams bya'i chos kyi dbyings/ /de bzhin nyid las brtan pa rnam par 'gyur ba med/ /rgyal sras
364a3(phal chen): byang chub don du bzod pa 'di gnas pa/ /de la phyogs kun sangs rgyas mtha' yas lung yang ston/ /rgyal sras de la sangs rgyas mkhyen pas dbang bskur mdzad/ /phyogs
364a4(phal chen): bcu kun nas rab tu snang bar mngon du gnas/ /de dag chos kun rab zhi rtag tu zhi ba'i sems/ /mngon par sgrub cing dge ba kun la 'gro ba 'god/ /dus gsum chos rnams
364a5(phal chen): kun gyi mtshan nyid de 'dra bas/ /mtshan rnams yongs su dag byas sems can 'dul ba byed/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i chos rnams nges par sus rtogs pa/ /de dag 'jig rten sna
364a6(phal chen): tshogs du ma rtogs byed cing / /'jig rten sna tshogs sgyu tshul yang dag rtogs byas nas/ /las yangs shin tu bsags pas rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ /sems las las
364a7(phal chen): kyi rnam pa du ma 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de bas 'jig rten sems de sgyu ma lta bur bstan/ /de dag rnam brtags sgyu ma 'dra bas nub par 'gyur/ /srid pa'i lam rgyud ma lus sgyu 'dra
364b1(phal chen): yang dag min/ /ji ltar sgyu ma'i rnam pa byin rlabs byas pa'i gzugs/ /lam gyi bzhi mdor 'jig rten phal gyi nang bstan pa/ /'gro bas mthong na de la kun kyang mos pa skyed/ /
364b2(phal chen): sgyu mas 'jig rten las ni gang yang 'grub mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin 'gro ba ji snyed gang rnams yod pa dag /sgyu ma'i rang bzhin lta bu ma skyes chos nyid de/ /dngos yod dngos med de
364b3(phal chen): bzhin yod dang med pa dang / /skal pa mi mnyam tshul gyis gro rgyud rab tu ston/ /sgyu ma'i tshul rnams shes nas sems can yongs su 'grel/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i yin par sems can khong
364b4(phal chen): du chud/ /sems can sgyu 'dra de bzhin sgyu ma sems can 'dra/ /sems can med cing sgyu ma 'dra bar 'jig rten shes/ /sems can zhing dang chos dang de bzhin dus gsum dang / /'jig
364b5(phal chen): rten thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam par rab tu 'byed/ /sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bur chos rnams rab rtogs pas/ /'jig rten ma lus 'di dag sgyu ma'i rnam par shes/ /skyes pa dag dang de
364b6(phal chen): bzhin bud med rogs pa dang / /bu mo de bzhin rnam par dul ba nye bar rton/ /glang po rta dang ba lang phyugs dang shing rnams dang / /me tog 'bras bu bzang dang ldan pa'i mtsho yang
364b7(phal chen): ston/ /thabs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs mang bar sgyu ma'i sems/ /sna tshogs gnas la'ang sgyu ma yongs su gnas pa med/ /sgyu ma dben la gzhol zhing shin tu zhi ba yang / /'jig
365a1(phal chen): rten rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs mang po ston/ /de bzhin rgyal sras btsun pa rigs dang ldan pa rnams/ /'jig rten sgyu ma sna tshogs ji bzhin ston
365a2(phal chen): par byed/ /sgom dang rnam par sgom pa'i dngos po'i sems kyang med/ /dngos po dngos med sgyu ma ji bzhin rab tu shes/ /zhing dang sems can chos kyi rnam pa mang por
365a3(phal chen): bcas| |las rnams sna tshogs rnam pas yongs su bsags pa la/ /gnas par mi byed mngon par chags pa de bzhin med/ /chags med mtha' yi sgyu ma'i tshul ni
365a4(phal chen): des shes so/ /de ltar rgyal sras mkhas pa rnams/ /rab tu zhi la dga' zhing spros pa med pa ste/ /gnas med sa dang yang dag ldan/ /chos dbyings gnas la de dag rab
365a5(phal chen): tu zhugs/ /de na chos nyid rtogs pa ste/ /brtan pa de dag rgyal ba'i sku skyes sras yin no/ /'du shes rgyu la mkhas pa ste/ /'gro ba thams cad 'du shes 'dra bar shes//
365a6(phal chen): smig rgyu'i 'du shes 'dra ba ste/ /'gro ba thams cad de ltar 'du shes phyin ci log /'du shes rnam phye mkhas pa ste/ /de ni 'gro kun 'du shes spangs pa yin/ /sems
365a7(phal chen): can sna tshogs khong du chud/ /'jig rten kun gyi sna tshogs rnam pa kun dang bral/ /'jig rten 'du shes rab tu shes so/ /'jig rten 'du shes med min 'du shes ldan/ /
365b1(phal chen): phyogs rnams 'du shes 'dra ba ste/ /sems can mtha' yas 'du shes rnam pa sna tshogs yin/ /ma nor mig dang ldan pa rnams/ /'jig rten sna tshogs 'du shes rab tu
365b2(phal chen): mthong | |'jig rten smig rgyu 'dra ba ste/ /'du shes sna tshogs rnam pas 'jig rten rnam par bkod/ /'jig rten 'du shes gnas pa ste/ /de dag phyin ci log gsum rnam
365b3(phal chen): par spangs/ /ji ltar smig rgyu'i tshogs kyi rnams/ /'gro ba rnams la chu yi rnam pa dmigs par snang / /de la chu ni yod min yang / /chu yi 'du shes rnam par rab tu
365b4(phal chen): bslu| |de bzhin 'jig rten thams cad kyang / khams gsum lam rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs mtha' yas te/ /'du shes rnam pa smig rgyu bzhin/ /chags med yid ldan
365b5(phal chen): spyod yul mtha' yas so/ /'du shes thams cad rnam par spangs/ /chags med ye shes ldan zhing spros pa med pa rnams/ /'gro ba 'du shes chags gyur pa/ /'du shes bslus
365b6(phal chen): las brten pa 'grel par byed/ /nga rgyal rlom dang dregs pa spangs/ /'du shes thams cad bsal cing 'jig rten 'dren pa byed/ /mi zad zad pa rtogs pa rnams/ /bden pa
365b7(phal chen): zad mi shes kyi tshul 'di yin/ /'jig rten 'di dag thams cad rmi lam lta bur khong du chud/ /chos rnams thams cad rmi lam ngo bo nyid du rab tu rtogs/ /rmi lam de dag
366a1(phal chen): yul la mi gnas phyogs la'ang mi gnas te/ /rmi lam lta bur 'jig rten rab tu zhi la de dag gzhol/ /rmi lam rang bzhin mkhas shing rnam par rtog
366a2(phal chen): med chos dang ldan/ /rmi lam rtogs pa'i yid ldan sems la 'gyur ba gang yang med/ /'jig rten kun tu rmi lam lta bur shin tu rgyu zhing spyod/ /dus gsum ma lus thams
366a3(phal chen): cad sgyu ma lta bu'i tshul du rtogs/ /rmi lam shi 'phor 'gyur ba med cing skye ba de bzhin med/ /rmi lam phyogs rnams kun na yod pa ma yin med pa min/ /khams gsum rmi
366a4(phal chen): lam lta bu 'di la rnam rtog med byas shing / /rmi lam shin tu rtogs mkhas de dag sems la bcings pa med/ /'gro ba rmi lam rang bzhin 'dra la de dag mi gnas te/ /'jig
366a5(phal chen): rten 'gro ba rnam par dben la de dag brten pa med/ /'jig rten rnam la mi rtog de bzhin rnam pa rtog pa med/ /rmi lam rtogs shing mkhas pa'i bzod pa'i sa ni 'di yin
366a6(phal chen): no| |rmi lam 'gro ba rnams ni rnam pa sna tshogs du ma snang / /tha dad rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan du bye brag rnam pa mang / /de bzhin ye shes zla bas 'gro ba thams cad rnam
366a7(phal chen): par mthong / /rmi lam sgra dang 'dra bar de dag rnam par rtog pa med/ /rmi lam lta bu'i tshul gyis rnam pa brtan pas rab tu rtogs/ /de dag rmi lam mtshan nyid rnam 'das
366b1(phal chen): skal pa mnyam pa min/ /rmi lam de dag gcig pa ma yin nam yang mang pa min/ /rmi lam rnam bkod rnam par 'gro ba thams cad rab tu shes/ /de dag sems can thams
366b2(phal chen): cad rmi lam 'dra ba'i chos can dang / /zhing rnams thams cad rmi 'dra de bzhin chos rnams rmi 'dra kun/ /ji ltar nyon mongs de bzhin rnam par byang ba rab tu shes/ /'jig
366b3(phal chen): rten rmi 'dra de la rnam par rtog pa gang yang med/ /rmi lam lta bu'i spyod pas yang dag grub par gyur pa rnams/ /rmi lam lta bu'i smon lam rnam pas gnas pa med pa dag /
366b4(phal chen): rmi lam lta bu'i chos rnams kun la gnas 'cha' mi byed de/ /'jig rten rmi lam 'dra la khyab par byed pa gang yang med/ /'jig rten 'di dag rmi lam lta bur byung bar
366b5(phal chen): shes shing dag / rmi lam tshul rtogs 'gro ba kun tu mi 'jigs chos dang ldan/ /rmi lam bzhin spyod ldan pas 'jig rten kun tu chud mi za/ /ring thung kun kyang rmi
366b6(phal chen): lam brgyud bzhin de dag rab tu shes/ /'di ni rmi lam lta bu'i yid ldan rnams kyi bzod pa ste/ /rmi lam lta bus 'jig rten sems can rab tu 'dren par byed/ /sems
366b7(phal chen): can rnams kyi bsam pa rtogs byas chags med ye shes can/ /sems la bcings med 'gro ba khrag khrig yongs su 'grel ba byed/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
367a1(phal chen): rgya che mtha' yas pa/ /chos rnams mngon rab bsgrub pa yangs pa khong du chud byed/ /chos kyi chos nyid du ma'i tshul rnams khong du des
367a2(phal chen): chud| |chos tshul rnam pa tha dad kun la chags pa'i sems med/ /'gro kun dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam pa ji snyed yod pa/ /de dag sgra dbyangs sgra snyan bzhin du khong du
367a3(phal chen): des chud/ /sgrar brjod de dag nang na med par rab tu shes te/ /sgra rnams thams cad phyi nang med par rab tu de shes/ /sgra brnyan ji ltar rnam pa sna tshogs sgra tshul grag ste/ /
367a4(phal chen): rnam rtog dbyangs dang 'dra yang rnam rtog med pa'i sgra yin/ /sgra rnams rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad de bzhin rab shes/ /sgra la mngon par chags med de bzhin rlom pa'i
367a5(phal chen): sems med/ /sems can kun gyi gtso bo thams cad de mthong gyur cing / /'jig rten mgon po chos rnams gsung zhing dbyangs sgrog mdzad pas/ /mdo mang brjod du
367a6(phal chen): med pa rab tu gsung zhing ston kyang / /rgyal ba'i gsung dbyangs de la de ni gnas par mi byed/ /sgra brnyan de dag ji ltar sgra yi rnam par grag kyang / /sgra brnyan rnam pa
367a7(phal chen): dag la sgra rnams gang yang yod min/ /de ltar dbyangs kyi bye brag rjes 'brang chos kyi rnam pa/ /chos nyid 'jig med ldan pa rnam phye chos la rab mkhas/ /de dag sgra
367b1(phal chen): dbyangs thams cad rnam par rab tu sgom ste/ sgra rnams rnam par dbye la mkhas pas sgra rnams sel byed/ /'gro ba kun dbyangs dbyangs tshul min par rab tu shes te/ /dbyangs kyi
367b2(phal chen): yan lag dag pa de dag dbyangs kun rab shes/ /chos rnams de dag kun la sgra med sgrar 'jug byed de/ /brjod pa khrag khrig sna tshogs rnams kyi rjes su zhugs shing / /'gro ba thams
367b3(phal chen): cad sgra brnyan bzhin du mngon par ston byed/ /'gro ba ma lus kun gyi sgra yang de bzhin rab shes/ /de dag tshig tshul rjes su 'gro ba'i shes bya rtogs ldan/ /'jig rten 'di dag
367b4(phal chen): thams cad sgra brnyan yan lag 'drar shes/ /dbyangs kyi rang bzhin rnam par dag pas khong du chud de/ /sgra yi mtshan nyid ji bzhin 'jig rten de bzhin shes so/ /ji ltar sgra
367b5(phal chen): rnams chos rnams du ma rnam par ston byed/ /sgra yi rnam rtog sna tshogs dbyangs kyi yan lag kun ldan/ /'jig rten ma lus kun dbyangs mtshan nyid ci 'dra de bzhin/ /
367b6(phal chen): 'gro ba kun gyi mtshan nyid rgyal ba'i sras kyis rab shes/ /bzod pa 'di 'dra'i stobs kyis mkhas gyur dpa' bo de dag/ sgra dbyangs sna tshogs 'jig rten kun tu yongs su sbyong
367b7(phal chen): ste| |dus gsum shes pa'i blo dang ldan pas sgra yi tshul shes/ /'on kyang rnam rtog gnas la de dag gnas mi 'cha'o/ /zhi ba'i yid ldan 'di ltar byang chub brtson/ /
368a1(phal chen): 'jig rten phan pa'i don du byang chub tshol/ /chos nyid rab tu zhi la rtag tu 'jug /brtan pa 'jig rten rnams la rtog mi byed/ /mi sgul
368a2(phal chen): mthu can ye shes stobs ldan pas/ /chos nyid dngos med zhi ba ji bzhin du/ /'jig rten thams cad ma lus de shes te/ /de la gzhol zhing phan par de spyod do//
368a3(phal chen): 'gro ba kun la nam yang mi gnas te/ /'gro ba kun dang 'bral bar byed ma yin/ /'gro ba kun la de ni gnas mi 'cha'/ /de la gnas pa gang yang yod pa min/ /
368a4(phal chen): 'gro ba chos nyid rang bzhin ldan par shes/ /rang bzhin de la'ang gnas par mi byed de/ /'gro ba 'di la'ang de ni rten mi byed/ /'gro ba'i gnas las yongs su
368a5(phal chen): grol ba yin/ /'jig rten gnas pa ji snyed gang yang rung / /de dag rang bzhin tshul rnams kun shes te/ /gnyis med chos kyang brtan pas rab tu shes/ /gnyis
368a6(phal chen): med de la'ang de ni gnas mi 'cha'/ /de ni 'jig rten rnams dang ldan gyur kyang / /'jig rten lam la gnas pa'i sems med de/ /'jig rten phyi rol spyad pa spyod
368a7(phal chen): pa min/ /chos kun ye shes rang bzhin yin par shes/ /chu la gzugs brnyan ji ltar snang ba rnams/ /nang na mi 'dug phyi na mi gnas pa/ /de bzhin brtan pa
368b1(phal chen): byang chub don du spyod/ /'jig rten rnam sgom 'jig rten yod pa min/ /'jig rten skye med grol ba ma yin te/ /'jig rten brjod par mi nus gyur pa min/ /'jig rten phyi
368b2(phal chen): rol rgyu ba'ang ma yin te/ /'gro ba 'di ni gzugs brnyan ji bzhin no/ /de ltar zab pa'i tshul las byung bas na/ /dag cing 'od gsal dri med sems dang ldan/ /ye
368b3(phal chen): shes gzhol bas chos kyi sgron ma ste/ /smon lam kun las yongs kyang ldog pa med/ /de ni 'jig rten gsog par mi byed de/ /ye shes mthar thug mtha' yang mi
368b4(phal chen): dmigs so/ /skye dgu mtha' yas kun la bde byed de/ /'gro ba kun las chags pa rnam par bzlog /dpe med rnams kyi zab pa nyid la ltos/ /'gro ba kun gyi don
368b5(phal chen): du rab tu brtson/ /bzod pa 'di ni ye shes gzhol ba ste/ /de la gnas shing spyad pa de 'dra spyod/ /chos gnas rnam par dbyen la rab tu zhugs/ /sprul pa de 'dra kun
368b6(phal chen): dang ldan gyur cig / sprul pa'i dngos la spyod par rjes song bas/ /sprul pa'i dngos po nam yang gtong ba med/ /de ni byang chub spyod pa'i sa mchog tu/ /sprul pa'i
368b7(phal chen): dngos ldan rjes su spyad pas na/ /sprul pa ci 'drar rnam pa kun zhi ba/ /sprul pa de 'dra'i tshul la rnam par gnas/ /de bas 'gro kun sprul pa rab tu shes/ /skye dgu'i
369a1(phal chen): las kyi rnam pa mtha' yas pas/ /sprul pa'i dngos dang mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam/ /sprul pa'i mtha' rtogs shin tu rnam par dben/ /
369a2(phal chen): mi yi mgon po thams cad sprul par shes/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas ji snyed gang bzhugs pa/ /smon lam gang btab spyod pa spyad pa'i rgyu/ /des ni mi gtso thams cad
369a3(phal chen): sprul pa yin/ /gang gis sems can rnam dag sprul pa yis/ /byams dang snying rje chen po shin tu yangs/ /de ltar sprul pa rnam phye shes pa ni/ /de dag byin rlabs 'phrul
369a4(phal chen): snang byed pa'o/ /de dag 'jig rten rnam par rtog pa med/ /sprul pa'i dngos tshul 'gro ba thams cad shes/ /'gro ba'i las kyi rnam pa gang yod pa'i/ /'jig rten
369a5(phal chen): de dag sprul pa'i sas bsgrubs pa'o/ /sprul pa'i mdzod mang rnam par phye ba la/ /zhugs shing byang chub spyad pa spyod byas pa/ /de dag sna tshogs bye brag rnam pa mang / /
369a6(phal chen): 'jig rten las kyi rnam pas byas pa bzhin/ /sprul pa rnam par rtog pa med pa ste/ /sprul pa nam yang yongs su rtog pa med/ /rtog dang rnam par rtog pas yid dben
369a7(phal chen): pa| |sprul pa bzhin du de dag spyod pa yin/ /sprul pa rgya mtsho shes pas khong du chud/ /sprul pa'i dngos pos 'jig rten rgyas kyang 'debs/ /sprul pa'i mi gnas 'gro
369b1(phal chen): ba med pa ste/ /sprul pa ji bzhin de bzhin ye shes so/ /de ni nam mkha' gnas med ji bzhin du/ /bzod pa bcu pa'i tshul la rab tu 'jug /de ni mkha' 'drar chos rnams
369b2(phal chen): kun byas shing / /sems can sems can med par nam mkha' shes/ /de ni nam mkha' lta bu'i shes ldan te/ /de la chags pa gang yang yod pa min/ /ji ltar nam mkha'
369b3(phal chen): sna tshogs ma yin pa/ /de ltar 'jig rten chags med rab tu shes/ /de ni bzod pa mkha' 'dra'i mthu ldan pas/ /mi zad nam mkha' bzhin du zad pa med/ /de ni
369b4(phal chen): mkha' 'dra'i spyod yul thob gyur kyang / /mkha' la rnam par rtog par mi byed do/ /nam mkha' la ni ngo bo nyid med de/ /nam mkha'i sa mtshams nam yang chad pa med/ /
369b5(phal chen): mkha' la bye brag tha dad yod pa min/ /de ni mkha' 'dra'i blo yi stobs dang ldan/ /mkha' la mthar thug rtsa ba med pa ste/ /nam mkha' la ni mtha' dbus yod pa min/ /
369b6(phal chen): mkha' la rnam pa tha dad de bzhin med/ /ye shes stobs kyang nam mkha' de dang 'dra/ /brtan pas de 'dra'i chos nyid rab shes te/ /ji ltar nam mkha' skyes pa med pa dang / /
369b7(phal chen): ji ltar mkha' la 'gag pa med tshul du/ /de 'dra'i chos nyid dam pa des thob bo/ /nam mkha' 'dra ba'i chos la de gnas shing / /phyogs rnams kun gyi 'gro ba kun ston to/ /
370a1(phal chen): bdud kyi dkrugs ma thams cad bcom byas shing / /mkha' 'dra'i bzod pa'i tshul la shin tu brtan/ /des ni mkha' 'drar mtshan nyid med pa
370a2(phal chen): kun| |'jig rten ji snyed mtshan nyid tha dad pa/ /mtshan nyid mtshan 'das mtshan ma med tshul du/ /kun kyang yang dag mkha' dang 'dra bar byed/ /gang la dus gsum
370a3(phal chen): thams cad gnas pa yin/ /chos nyid mkha' 'dra des ni shes byas shing / /de ni rnam par phye ba gcig tshul gyis/ /'gro ba thams cad nam mkha'i tshul du shes/ /
370a4(phal chen): de ni nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes lus/ /de ni nam mkha' lta bu'i sgra dbyangs ldan/ /de ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin lus can te/ /ye shes nam mkha' lta bur zhi bas
370a5(phal chen): gnas/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyi spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ /bzod pa bcu po 'di dag de dag gi /bzod pa'i stobs la de dag rab gnas pa/ /'jig rten phan pa'i don du bshad
370a6(phal chen): cing bstan/ /'di yi tshul la brtan pa bslabs pa rnams/ /ye shes 'di la shin tu mthu che ste/ /chos kyi mthu dang ye shes mthur yang ldan/ /byang chub tshul rjes bsam
370a7(phal chen): pa'i sems dang ldan/ /bzod pa 'di yi tshul la zhugs pa ni/ /ye shes stobs kyis chags pa med la 'jug /'jig rten lhar bcas de yi zil gyis mnon/ /'jig rten
370b1(phal chen): dag tu 'khor lo bla med bskor/ /de dag spyod tshul shin tu rgya che bas/ /de dag tshad ni 'jig rten kun na med/ /skyes bu 'dul ba dpe zla med pa yi/ /ye shes rgya mtsho'i tshul
370b2(phal chen): la de dag zhugs/ /bdag med sems kyis 'jig rten spyod pa'i tshe/ /chos kyis rnam dag gyur pa'i yid ldan pas/ /bstan pa de dag 'di 'dra'i chos la 'jug /chos nyid
370b3(phal chen): des kyang 'jig rten tshim par byed/ /'gro ba'i tshad ni thams cad shes par nus/ /sems can ma lus thams cad bgrang bar nus/ /rdul gcig rtse la ma lus zhing bgrang
370b4(phal chen): nus| |mkhas pa'i yon tan de dag mtha' yas so/ /sangs rgyas sras po skyes bu chen po la/ /bzod pa bcu po 'di dag yod pa ni/ /ye shes spyod yul sgor yang 'gro kun
370b5(phal chen): gyis| |tshad du bgrang bar nus pa yod pa min/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ bzod pa'i le'u ste/ sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o// //bam po drug cu rtsa gnyis pa/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ grangs ma mchis pa
370b6(phal chen): shin tu bstan pa zhes bgyi ba dang / grangs ma mchis pa'i grangs ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba de/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na grangs ma mchis pa bstan pa lags/ tshad ma
371a1(phal chen): mchis pa dang / mu ma mchis pa dang / kun tu mtha' yas pa dang / bgrang du mi rung ba dang / mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang / bsam gyis mi
371a2(phal chen): khyab pa dang / gzhal du ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa'i yang brjod du ma mchis pa lags na ji ltar bstan par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
371a3(phal chen): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /skyes bu dam pa/ legs so/ /legs so/ /skyes bu dam pa/ de ltar khyod
371a4(phal chen): kyis 'jig rten thams cad grangs kyi rjes su 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mkhyen pa'i don 'di/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
371a5(phal chen): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la zhu bar bsam pa legs so/ /legs so/ /de bas na skyes bu dam pa legs par nyon la rab tu yid la gzung zhig dang bstan par bya'o//
371a6(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi rgyal po bcom ldan 'das la phyir nyan to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad
371a7(phal chen): ces bka' stsal to/ /skyes bu dam pa/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ brgya stong phrag brgya na bye ba'o/ /bye ba bye ba na khod khod do/ /khod khod khod khod na thad dgu'o/ /thad
371b1(phal chen): dgu thad dgu na khrig khrig go / khrig khrig khrig khrig na thams thams so/ /thams thams thams thams na myad myid do/ /myad myid myad myid na gang ya'o/ /gang ya gang ya na
371b2(phal chen): ban bun no/ /ban bun ban bun na phyar phyur ro/ /phyar phyur phyar phyur na lcag lcig go /lcag lcig lcag lcig na byang bying ngo / /byang bying byang bying na chem chem mo/ /chem chem chem
371b3(phal chen): chem na phyal phyol lo/ /phyal phyol phyal phyol na khyud khyud do/ /khyud khyud khyud khyud na zar zer ro/ /zar zer zar zer na khrib khrib bo/ /khrib khrib khrib khrib na ya gangs so//
371b4(phal chen): ya gangs ya gangs na cho ma'o/ /cho ma cho ma na khram khrim mo/ /khram khrim khram khrim na nab nub bo/ /nab nub nab nub na sang sang ngo / /sang sang sang sang na brgyud yas
371b5(phal chen): so| |brgyud yas rgyud yas na gtang yas so/ /gtang yas gtang yas na bkra yar ro/ /bkra yar bkra yar na gsa' yas so/ /gsa' yas gsa' yas na mtshungs
371b6(phal chen): med do/ /mtshungs med mtshungs med na lam lum mo/ /lam lum lam lum na yal yol lo/ /yal yol yal yol na khral khrul lo/ /khral khrul khral khrul na thud
